I must be more careful."},{"id":1057,"text":"Impossible! How are you able to dodge my attacks?!"},{"id":1058,"text":"Grrr! You are good, son of Teo... I see through your attack!"},{"id":1063,"text":"Here, let me show you how it's done!"},{"id":1064,"text":"Better than I expected... Come on, once more!"},{"id":1067,"text":"I never even dreamed this day would come...∠But I fight for the Empire, and you for the Liberation Army."},{"id":1068,"text":"Forgive me..."},{"id":1069,"text":"You really...have grown..."},{"id":1070,"text":"Let us begin, my son."},{"id":1071,"text":"Show me how strong you have become!"},{"id":1072,"text":"My sword is the sword of His Majesty the Emperor.∠I shall not hold back!"},{"id":1073,"text":"Impressive..."},{"id":1074,"text":"Can you see through this attack?"},{"id":1075,"text":"Always on the defensive... The fiery spirit of youth∠has returned to me!"},{"id":1153,"text":"If this is fate, so be it."},{"id":1154,"text":"M-Master Warren! I can't do it∠alone..."},{"id":1159,"text":"I'll show you the true meaning∠of strength!"},{"id":1160,"text":"Let's see how you fare against∠the swiftness of this blade!"},{"id":1161,"text":"You mean YOU'RE my opponent?∠Hohoho!"},{"id":1162,"text":"Sorry...I always side with the∠winning team!"},{"id":1163,"text":"Keep up, if you want to stay∠alive!"},{"id":1164,"text":"An opportunity to test out my∠techniques, I suppose."},{"id":1165,"text":"Kirkis... Where have you gone?"},{"id":1166,"text":"Heeheehee! Let's see if you can∠keep up with me!"},{"id":1167,"text":"I pack quite a punch, you know!"},{"id":1168,"text":"For my friends, I shall gladly∠give my life!"},{"id":1169,"text":"Awwwooo! Follow me, everyone!"},{"id":1170,"text":"I am Alen, the Flame General!"},{"id":1171,"text":"I am Grenseal, the Lightning∠General!"},{"id":1172,"text":"Ya better not get scared now,∠boys!"},{"id":1173,"text":"This one's for you, bro!"},{"id":1174,"text":"Let's go, let's go, LET'S GO!!!"},{"id":1175,"text":"Leave it to me, my lord."},{"id":1176,"text":"I'm more than just my father's∠son!"},{"id":1177,"text":"I'll do it just like Master∠Mathiu taught me..."},{"id":1178,"text":"Oh dear, I simply despise∠violence..."},{"id":1179,"text":"GRRROOOAAAGGGHHH!!!"},{"id":1180,"text":"I'm a Kobold warrior too!"},{"id":1181,"text":"Hah! I'm not about to lose to∠some lowly humans!"},{"id":1182,"text":"Oh, hold on a minute! I'll just∠get ready..."},{"id":1183,"text":"Allow me to handle this, my∠lord."},{"id":1184,"text":"Take THIS!!!"},{"id":1185,"text":"I do not use my fists without∠good reason...but very well."},{"id":1186,"text":"I never miss my target!"},{"id":1187,"text":"You know I'm a dancer, not a∠fighter, right?"},{"id":1188,"text":"I'll never forgive you for∠harming the land!"},{"id":1189,"text":"The dragon that sleeps inside∠me has awakened!"},{"id":1190,"text":"I am the grim reaper... Don't∠make more work for me!"},{"id":1191,"text":"I'm not too strong, so go easy∠on me!"},{"id":1192,"text":"I swear by the honor of the∠Knights of Maximillian!"},{"id":1193,"text":"I shall avenge my master!"},{"id":1194,"text":"For me, this is just another∠game."},{"id":1195,"text":"All that lifting and carrying's∠made me pretty strong!"},{"id":1196,"text":"I must put an end to the sad∠melody of war!"},{"id":1197,"text":"I can help out a little in∠battle, too!"},{"id":1198,"text":"The die has been cast, as they∠say..."},{"id":1199,"text":"Dear me! Then I'll take you∠on!"},{"id":1204,"text":"I'm only good with machinery,∠not fighting!"},{"id":1205,"text":"Oh dear. I should have read∠some books about combat, too..."},{"id":1206,"text":"This is outside my area of∠expertise..."},{"id":1207,"text":"This isn't a job for a∠painter..."},{"id":1208,"text":"Let's finish this up so I can∠take a bath and go to sleep!"},{"id":1209,"text":"I will do what I can."},{"id":1210,"text":"Just think how ashamed you'll∠be if you lose to a middle-aged∠woman like me!"},{"id":1211,"text":"Wh-Wh-What? Huh? Magic?∠You want me to use magic?"},{"id":1212,"text":"All right! I'll fight, too!"},{"id":1213,"text":"Very well... I shall show you∠my magical powers!"},{"id":1214,"text":"Hmmm? Want to see my magic,∠do you?"},{"id":1215,"text":"Forward, brave warriors!∠Forward to battle!"},{"id":1216,"text":"Cooking requires a lot of∠strength, you know?"},{"id":1217,"text":"Let's finish this quickly, or∠my stew will get cold."},{"id":1218,"text":"This is light work compared to∠training as a blacksmith!"},{"id":1219,"text":"You good-for-nothings! I'll∠beat ya into shape!"},{"id":1220,"text":"Huh? Where's my hammer gone?"},{"id":1221,"text":"Just you wait! You'll be sorry∠ya messed with me!"},{"id":1222,"text":"I'm gonna show you all how∠much heart I've got!"},{"id":1223,"text":"Anything else you'd like me to∠get in stock for the Liberation∠Army?"},{"id":1224,"text":"There is still work that I must∠do."},{"id":1225,"text":"Looks like this will be my∠final job..."},{"id":1226,"text":"This isn't even any of my∠business...but I'll still shoot∠anyone who gets in my way!"},{"id":1227,"text":"You're dead!"},{"id":1228,"text":"O hundred runes that dwell within∠me, I call upon your power!"},{"id":1229,"text":"Charge!!!"},{"id":1230,"text":"■"},{"id":1231,"text":"■"},{"id":1232,"text":"Here we go!"},{"id":1233,"text":"Never heard of the mighty Viktor?"},{"id":1234,"text":"Let's go!"},{"id":1235,"text":"By the name of my sword, Kirinji,∠I shall defeat you!"},{"id":1236,"text":"Everyone...I leave the rest to∠you..."},{"id":1237,"text":"Y-Young Master..."},{"id":1238,"text":"Dammit! They got me..."},{"id":1239,"text":"What a place...to die..."},{"id":1240,"text":"You gotta be kiddin' me!"},{"id":1241,"text":"Bah! I give up!"},{"id":1258,"text":"Sorry, everybody..."},{"id":1259,"text":"This is as far as I can go."},{"id":1260,"text":"I'll be waitin' for ya in hell,∠scumbags!"},{"id":1261,"text":"I suppose this too...is just as∠nature intended..."},{"id":1262,"text":"This isn't even anything to do∠with me..."},{"id":1263,"text":"I'm going to take a little rest∠now..."},{"id":1264,"text":"Good bye...everyone..."},{"id":1265,"text":"What a place to die!"},{"id":1266,"text":"It seems I, too, have grown old..."},{"id":1267,"text":"I have attained enlightenment..."},{"id":1268,"text":"Master Warren...I am sorry I could∠not be of assistance..."},{"id":1269,"text":"Uaaaaggghhh! Such is the∠way of the world..."},{"id":1274,"text":"I suppose I did well to get this∠far..."},{"id":1275,"text":"Impossible... I refuse to accept∠this!"},{"id":1276,"text":"How unlike me... EEEEEK!!!"},{"id":1326,"text":"I wasn't strong enough..."},{"id":1327,"text":"An old man like me is of no use∠anyway..."},{"id":1328,"text":"How fleeting this life was..."},{"id":1329,"text":"Sing a sad song for me, my∠friends..."},{"id":1330,"text":"Good bye...everybody..."},{"id":1331,"text":"Ahhhhhhhhhhhh..."},{"id":1332,"text":"But I haven't even finished my∠apprenticeship..."},{"id":1333,"text":"Looks like this is the end!"},{"id":1334,"text":"Somebody, please...take my∠hammer..."},{"id":1335,"text":"H-Hey, wait! Seven years ago, during the Succession∠War, Gregminster was in shambles.∨Now look at this magnificent city.∠It's all thanks to the∠Emperor. We owe him everything."},{"id":1002000058,"text":"Oh boy! So this is the city of Gregminster, huh? Sure puts∠my hometown to shame."},{"id":1002000059,"text":"Tsk. Gregminster has gone to the dogs with bumpkins∠wanderin' the streets. Don'tcha agree?"},{"id":1002000060,"text":"Well, just take a look at this urn. Heeheehee. Didn't∠expect much since one of those Furballs left it behind.∨Boy, was I wrong! Had it appraised and turns out it's∠a Celadon Urn. Talk about lucking out!"},{"id":1002000061,"text":"I'm from a town called Rockland in the east.∠I seem to be lost...∨Sorry, but could you tell me where General Milich lives?∨What? ☆10H-He lives there? In that tacky...☆2um, I mean...∠☆4unique house?∠Th-Thank you..."},{"id":1002000062,"text":"Hey! What do you think you're doing here?∨This is the residence of Imperial General Teo McDohl.∨What? You're his son?∠Ah! Please forgive my manners."},{"id":1002000063,"text":"Rumor has it there's a skilled blacksmith in Lenankamp.∠A friend of mine is always bragging he got his sword∠tempered there.∨Might go have mine seen to as well."},{"id":1002000064,"text":"Wait! You there!"},{"id":1002000065,"text":"There's talk of rebels lurking in Gregminster.∠Could you be..."},{"id":1002000066,"text":"You all look real shady to me!"},{"id":1002000067,"text":"We shouldn't be here."},{"id":1002000068,"text":"Ever heard of orbs? Bring one to this rune sage here∠and he'll equip it for you. Then you can use all the magic∠you want."},{"id":1002000069,"text":"I've got my hands full right now. This is the key step in∠making a delicious stew."},{"id":1002000070,"text":"Y-Young Master! It-It hurts!∠Please, stop!"},{"id":1002000071,"text":"Wait! D-Don't do that...∠Hahahaha... No... Y-Young Master!∠Ahahah... Please stop!"},{"id":1002000072,"text":"The meal will be ready soon. Until then, please rest∠in your room."},{"id":1002000073,"text":"Martial Arts Notebook, Talk With Your Fists, Pahn's Diary..."},{"id":1002000074,"text":"Y-Young Master!∠Don't read people's books without permission."},{"id":1002000075,"text":"∠     Pahn's Diary∨? 4th:∠Breakfast - Toast and eggs∠Lunch - Sandwiches∠Dinner - Potato croquettes∨? 5th:∠Breakfast - Toast and eggs∠Lunch - Rice balls∠Dinner - Roast beef∨? 6th: Breakfast - Toast and..."},{"id":1002000076,"text":"∠   Cleo's Diary..."},{"id":1002000077,"text":"Young Master. You shouldn't be rummaging through∠a woman's belongings."},{"id":1002000078,"text":"∠     Cleo's Diary∨∠There's a lock on it."},{"id":1002000079,"text":"∠     Pahn's Diary∨Yesterday's Menu∠Steamed chicken, seafood salad, cheese-filled omelette,∠Gremio's special stew, inarizushi..."},{"id":1002000080,"text":"I'll let you in on something.∠Ever heard of orbs? Well, they pack a mean punch."},{"id":1002000081,"text":"∠     Spicy Stew"},{"id":1002000082,"text":"∠   ♂㈱'s Diary"},{"id":1002000083,"text":"Welcome, sir...∠Ah, if it isn't General Teo's boy.∨What's the matter then? If it's rest you're needing,∠just run along back home.∠As for the bar... Well, you're a bit∠too young for that."},{"id":1002000084,"text":"Well, well, what brings you here?∠If it's rest you're needing, run along back home.∨Or is there a reason you can't? Have you been messing with∠Gremio again?"},{"id":1002000085,"text":"Aha, you can settle this dispute. Let's have you decide.∠Decide on what, you say?∨The Six Great Generals... Well, now they're down to five.∠Which do you say is the strongest?"},{"id":1002000086,"text":"No one seems to get it. The greatest general of the Empire∠is hands down Teo McDohl, the Invincible General.∨Don't you agree?"},{"id":1002000087,"text":"Outta the Five Great Generals, it's gotta be Kasim Hazil,∠the best of the bunch with a sword.∨Greatest swordsman, greatest general. Ain't that obvious?"},{"id":1002000088,"text":"Sonya Shulen, commander of the Royal Navy. Not only∠a skilled swordswoman, but she also knows her magic.∠And those looks... Holy smokes!∨She's the full package. Don't tell me you don't agree."},{"id":1002000089,"text":"Greatest general? ☆9Why that's gotta be the invincible∠Kwanda Rosman. Saved Emperor Barbarossa's neck plenty∠of times.∨General Kwanda is a brilliant soldier. I wanna be just like∠him."},{"id":1002000090,"text":"Oh, um... Well, if you ask me, Milich the Flower General∠is also pretty strong.∨He's a top-tier swordsman and magic user who always dresses∠in the most exquisite outfits..."},{"id":1002000091,"text":"Go away. I'm exhausted from searching for people all night."},{"id":1002000092,"text":"I can't believe General Teo's son was in cahoots with the∠rebels!"},{"id":1002000093,"text":"Damn! I was so hungry, I couldn't help myself...∠Now what do I do?"},{"id":1002000094,"text":"Best not to wander about too much, Young Master..."},{"id":1002000095,"text":"Stay.∠Don't stay.∠Save."},{"id":1002000096,"text":"Gregminster, huh? It's a world apart from the poor village∠I grew up in..."},{"id":1002000097,"text":"Imperial City my foot! They tax us up the wazoo just so∠they can live off the fat of the land!"},{"id":1002000098,"text":"Say, how about you and I go traveling together? Life's all∠about the adventure.∨See new places, make new friends, have a whirlwind romance!∠That's right. Let the journey begin!∨☆6And...☆4I would be very much obliged if you could start by∠paying for my room here."},{"id":1002000099,"text":"Mr. Gremio, yesterday's feast went well, I take it?∨I'll come by to pick up your tab at the end of the month∠as usual."},{"id":1002000100,"text":"Thinkin' of shopping here?∠Don't do it. You'll get swindled."},{"id":1002000101,"text":"Shut up!∠Get outta here if you're gonna mess with my business!"},{"id":1002000102,"text":"Ah, welcome."},{"id":1002000103,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱.∠I heard General Teo is heading north. I pray he will return∠safely.∨You must make your father proud in his absence."},{"id":1002000104,"text":"You remind me of him, ♂㈱. Especially your lips."},{"id":1002000105,"text":"♂㈱, after tomorrow, you won't see your father∠for a while.∨Spend time with him while you can."},{"id":1002000106,"text":"Don't be silly, Sonya. The boy's gonna take you seriously."},{"id":1002000107,"text":"I see. So, General Teo has already headed north.∨If only I could join him... But I too have my∠responsibilities as an imperial general.∨Will you come visit me from time to time, ♂㈱?∠Just looking at you makes me feel better."},{"id":1002000108,"text":"This is my gift to you, ♂㈱. Will you accept it?"},{"id":1002000109,"text":"Although it's best if you don't rely on herbs if you can∠help it."},{"id":1002000110,"text":"General Sonya has been a shadow of herself since learning∠that General Teo was to head north..."},{"id":1002000111,"text":"General Sonya herself made the request to the Emperor.∠She is now guarding the Floating Fortress of Shasarazade."},{"id":1002000112,"text":"♂㈱,☆10 I need to have a word with Sonya.∠You head home first."},{"id":1002000113,"text":"∠     Sonya's Diary∨I heard Teo is departing for the north.☆9∠What did I expect? He's a soldier.∠Still, my heart is broken.∠I hope he returns safely."},{"id":1002000114,"text":"Poor General Sonya. She's not herself. It must be because∠General Teo has gone north..."},{"id":1002000115,"text":"∠     Sonya's Diary∨Teo has gone north.∠I'm glad I could spend last night with him,∠even if it was only for a short time."},{"id":1002000116,"text":"∠    Warm Stew"},{"id":1002000117,"text":"We won't see General Teo for a while, ♂㈱.∠Doesn't that make you sad?"},{"id":1002000118,"text":"∠     Hot Stew∨∠☆2Owww!"},{"id":1002000119,"text":"Seven years ago, those were good days. The Emperor was∠a great man back then. But now..."},{"id":1002000120,"text":"If he doesn't hurry, he'll be late for his audience.∠What's General Milich doing?∨General Milich!∠It's time to go!"},{"id":1002000121,"text":"General Milich has gone west to quash the rebellion."},{"id":1002000122,"text":"General Milich is urgently needed in the west, but he's∠still selecting his wardrobe."},{"id":1002000123,"text":"∠    Massive Cavalier Hat"},{"id":1002000124,"text":"∠   Glittery Tuxedo"},{"id":1002000125,"text":"∠   Bright Red Fringed Cape"},{"id":1002000126,"text":"∠   Orange Compression Tights"},{"id":1002000127,"text":"∠   Rainbow Pantaloons"},{"id":1002000128,"text":"∠    Green Suspender Pants"},{"id":1002000129,"text":"∠   Floral Print Shirt"},{"id":1002000130,"text":"∠   Leopard Print Cloak"},{"id":1002000131,"text":"∠    Pink Boots"},{"id":1002000132,"text":"∠  Checkered Beret"},{"id":1002000133,"text":"∠  Fruit-Pattern Tie"},{"id":1002000134,"text":"∠  Luxurious Cloak∠     Sprinkled with Sapphires"},{"id":1002000135,"text":"∠   See-Through Bodysuit"},{"id":1002000136,"text":"∠   Striped Slacks"},{"id":1002000137,"text":"∠  Sea Otter Print T-shirt"},{"id":1002000138,"text":"∠    Negligee"},{"id":1002000139,"text":"∠ Tricorne with Bobble"},{"id":1002000140,"text":"∠  Spiky Leather Jacket∠     with Safety Pins"},{"id":1002000141,"text":"∠   Watermelon-Pattern∠       Summer Sweater"},{"id":1002000142,"text":"∠ Khaki Riding Pants Embroidered∠      with Golden Butterflies"},{"id":1002000143,"text":"∠ Elegant Party Dress∠    with Peacock Feathers"},{"id":1002000144,"text":"∠   Extra-Long∠       Hand-Knitted Scarf"},{"id":1002000145,"text":"∠  Black Half-Length Coat∠        Tinted with Red"},{"id":1002000146,"text":"∠ Peppermint Green∠          Blazer"},{"id":1002000147,"text":"Ah! So sorry, my darling boy, but I don't have time to sign∠anything just now."},{"id":1002000148,"text":"Hmmm. I do like this outfit, but that one comes in∠a gorgeous shade...∨Tell me, boy, which do you prefer?∨Oh? My, if it isn't Teo's son...∠♂㈱, wasn't it?∨You see, the Emperor has summoned me.∠And I feel that it's∠my civic duty to arrive in a suitably dazzling ensemble."},{"id":1002000149,"text":"I'll be leaving the capital for a while, just like your∠father.∨There've been uprisings against the Emperor of late.∠Quite sad really. Rest assured that I, Milich Oppenheimer,∠will bring a swift end to them."},{"id":1002000150,"text":"Ted's Diary∠? day of ?∠Went hunting with ♂㈱ today.∨♂㈱ caught two more∠rabbits than I did,∠but my rabbits were bigger.\""},{"id":1002000151,"text":"The stew boils and boils,∠turning the potatoes∠and carrots into mush."},{"id":1002000152,"text":"Something smells burnt."},{"id":1002000153,"text":"W-Welcome home, Young Master. ☆10H-H-How did it go?☆10∠Did you get nervous in front of the Emperor?∨I was sooo, so worried... But I guess it all went well."},{"id":1002000154,"text":"Quit worrying so much, Gremio."},{"id":1002000155,"text":"Wha—!∠Ah... I didn't see you there, Master Teo."},{"id":1002000156,"text":"What? Didn't see me? It's like the only thing you care about∠is ♂㈱."},{"id":1002000157,"text":"M-My apologies, Master Teo.☆10∠By the way, Young Master, Ted came by to congratulate you.∨Oh dear! ☆10The stew! The stew!"},{"id":1002000158,"text":"I heard the news, ♂㈱! You met the Emperor,∠didn't you? Come on! I wanna know all about it.∨Just this once, I'm begging you. Tell me what you talked∠about. Wait, let's go to your room. Come on! Please?"},{"id":1002000159,"text":"Hahaha. Easy now, Ted. I'm sure ♂㈱ is exhausted∠from the whole ordeal.∨There's still a while before supper.∠You two have plenty∠of time to talk."},{"id":1002000160,"text":"You're right.∠Let's go to your room,♂㈱.∨And get ready, 'cause I'm gonna make you tell me everything."},{"id":1002000161,"text":"Young Master. I told you to knock before entering∠a lady's room.∨Well, in this case it's fine since it's my room.∠How did your audience go? Were you nervous?"},{"id":1002000162,"text":"You must be exhausted after everything that happened.∨Why not go to your room and have a good rest?"},{"id":1002000163,"text":"That's right, ♂㈱.∠Come on and tell me all about it."},{"id":1002000164,"text":"Zzzz..."},{"id":1002000165,"text":"Whoa!∠What?! What the—?∨Hm? Huh? Ah! Young Master, you're back already? I started∠dozing off while waiting for supper...∨Oh right! How was your audience with the Emperor?"},{"id":1002000166,"text":"*yawn* *mumble*∠Hey, Gremio! When's supper gonna be ready?∨Hm? Y-Young Master, is that you? When did you get back?∠I started dozing off while waiting for supper... ∠Oh right! How was your audience with the Emperor?"},{"id":1002000167,"text":"Think I'll nap again until dinner is ready.☆9∠You must be tired as well, Young Master. Why not get some∠rest yourself?"},{"id":1002000168,"text":"Just this once, I'm asking you for a favor, ♂㈱.∨You've gotta let me join your entourage.∨Master Teo took me in when I was an orphan. I wanna repay∠him. You get it, don't you?"},{"id":1002000169,"text":"I knew I could count on you! You're a real friend!∠All right, now for the important stuff.∨What was the Emperor like? Oh, and what about that Court∠Magician, Lady Windy? I keep hearing about her. Was she∠pretty?∨Come on, spill the beans."},{"id":1002000170,"text":"Please.∠I wanna work for the Imperial Guard too. Come on,∠just this once, I'm begging you."},{"id":1002000171,"text":"Oh, come on. We're friends, aren't we?"},{"id":1002000172,"text":"Hey, quit messing around.∨You were gonna ask me to join all along, right? I see right∠through you, buddy."},{"id":1002000173,"text":"All right, now let's talk about the important stuff.∨What was the Emperor like? And what about thatCourt∠Magician, Lady Windy? I keep hearing about her. Was she∠pretty?∨Come on, spill the beans."},{"id":1002000174,"text":"I see. I wish I could meet this Lady Windy in person.∠☆12∨Hey, ♂㈱...☆10∨Well, um, hahah... How do I put this..."},{"id":1002000175,"text":"You see, ♂㈱, there's something I wanna tell you.∨You can keep a secret, right? I know you can!"},{"id":1002000176,"text":"Young Master! Ted!∠Supper's ready!"},{"id":1002000177,"text":"Hm? Hey, looks like it's time to eat.∠Let's go, ♂㈱. We can always talk some other time."},{"id":1002000178,"text":"What's the matter? Go on and take a seat."},{"id":1002000179,"text":"Young Master, it'll be a while before you have supper with∠your father again.∨Best enjoy it while you can."},{"id":1002000180,"text":"Oh-ho! Now, that's one fine meal. Boy, is it making my mouth∠water."},{"id":1002000181,"text":"Gremio's cooking is the best.∨Why do you think I'm here all the time, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1002000182,"text":"Come on and take a seat, Young Master. Dinner will get cold."},{"id":1002000183,"text":"Now that your glasses are filled, ☆10I've something to tell∠all of you.∨Tomorrow morning, I must travel north.∨While I am gone, ♂㈱ will take charge of this∠household. I hope you will all give him your support."},{"id":1002000185,"text":"Gremio."},{"id":1002000186,"text":"Y-Yes, sir?"},{"id":1002000187,"text":"You've looked after ♂㈱ since he was a child.∨He's grown into a fine young man, and it's all thanks to∠you. I'm grateful."},{"id":1002000188,"text":"Sir, I've done...nothing more than my duty.∨Besides, it's been my pleasure to serve the Young Master."},{"id":1002000189,"text":"Thank you, Gremio. Keep an eye on him while I'm gone.∨Cleo, Pahn, I'm counting on you two to help look after∠♂㈱ as well."},{"id":1002000190,"text":"Yes, Master Teo."},{"id":1002000191,"text":"Of course, sir. We'll take good care of the Young Master."},{"id":1002000192,"text":"As for you Ted, I hope you'll always be a good friend to∠♂㈱."},{"id":1002000193,"text":"♂㈱ knows I'm not going anywhere, even if he∠wanted me to.∠Isn't that right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1002000194,"text":"Let's leave it at that or the food will get cold.∠Everyone, raise your glasses."},{"id":1002000195,"text":"To my son, ♂㈱, and to the glory of the Empire."},{"id":1002000196,"text":"Ted's here to congratulate you. It's nice having friends,∠isn't it?"},{"id":1002000197,"text":"Pull his ear.∠Tickle him.∠Don't bother him."},{"id":1002000198,"text":"Scare him.∠Leave him alone."},{"id":1002000199,"text":"Of course it's fine!∠I'm not sure."},{"id":1002000200,"text":"has joined your group!"},{"id":1002000201,"text":"Looks like I won't be seeing your face for a while,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1002000202,"text":"Shall I wake him?"},{"id":1002000203,"text":"No, let him sleep. It's not like I won't ever see the boy∠again.∨☆6...∨Look after him, Gremio."},{"id":1002000204,"text":"I will, Master Teo."},{"id":1002000205,"text":"Oh, did I wake you?∠Good morning, Young Master.∨Your father departed while you were asleep.∠That's what comes from always oversleeping...∨From today, you will be serving as a member of the∠Imperial Army.∨We must get ready to report to Commander Kraze."},{"id":1002000206,"text":"Hmm? *yawn*∠Lemme sleep just a little longer."},{"id":1002000207,"text":"...So on our next day off...∨Oh, look who decided to show up. You're late, Young Master.∠Today's your first day on the job.∨Can't wait to get started. Whether it's fighting bandits∠on Mt. Seifu or monsters in Lake Toran, I'm your guy."},{"id":1002000208,"text":"Get over yourself already.☆9 All you ever think about∠is fighting.∨Our job is to protect the Young Master."},{"id":1002000209,"text":"Yeah, yeah. I know.∠Come on, let's get to the palace."},{"id":1002000210,"text":"Hey, wait for me, ♂㈱. You weren't thinking of∠leaving me behind, were you?∨You'd be lonely without me. Right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1002000211,"text":"Well, well, if it isn't Teo's boy. You're late. Can't have∠you pampered all your life, can we?∨This is your first assignment. I'll only tell you once,∠so listen carefully.∨Northeast of Gregminster lies the Magician's Island.∠There, the seer Leknaat resides.∨You are to travel there and retrieve her Astral∠Predications.☆9∠Excuse me? ☆9☆2Are you listening?∠Then repeat the location of the Magician's Island."},{"id":1002000212,"text":"Northeast of Gregminster.∠"},{"id":1002000213,"text":"Hmph.∠Well, at least you're not deaf."},{"id":1002000214,"text":"Northwest of Gregminster.∠"},{"id":1002000215,"text":"Are your ears blocked? The Magician's Island is northeast∠of here. Pay attention."},{"id":1002000216,"text":"Somewhere on this planet.∠"},{"id":1002000217,"text":"Think you can treat me like an idiot just because you're∠the son of a great general?∨Go ahead and keep up that attitude. Let's see what happens."},{"id":1002000218,"text":"Hmph.∨Anyway, no boat goes to Magician's Island, so I've summoned∠a Dragon Knight to take you there.∨He'll be waiting in front of the stable to take you to the∠island on his dragon.∨Oh, and by the way, the seer Leknaat is the younger sister∠of Windy, the Court Magician, so you'd best behave yourself."},{"id":1002000219,"text":"The Dragon Knight is waiting in front of the stable.☆9∠What? Where's the stable?∨☆2It's somewhere in this castle! Go find it for yourself!∠Quit making my job more difficult! Off with you!"},{"id":1002000220,"text":"I was so excited about your first job...∨Turns out it's just an errand. As if we were children.∠Man, I wish it were something more thrilling..."},{"id":1002000221,"text":"Don't be like that, Pahn.∨Besides, the Astral Predications are super important for∠ruling the Empire. It's not as bad as you make it sound."},{"id":1002000222,"text":"Indeed. And this job doesn't pose much risk...∨Oh, not to imply you're unreliable in any way, Young Master."},{"id":1002000223,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Looks like we'll get to ride a dragon∠and meet an actual Dragon Knight!∨Man, Dragon Knights are the coolest. Come on, no time∠to lose!"},{"id":1002000224,"text":"Are you the guys from the Imperial Guard? I'm Futch,∠apprentice Dragon Knight. And this is my dragon, Black.∨Come on, Black, say hello."},{"id":1002000225,"text":"*roar*"},{"id":1002000226,"text":"Heehee. Cute, isn't he? ☆9So, you're going to Magician's∠Island, huh? Black'll get us there in no time."},{"id":1002000227,"text":"Wait, you're a Dragon Knight? But you're just∠a kid."},{"id":1002000228,"text":"Look who's talking! You're no more than a kid yourself."},{"id":1002000229,"text":"Me? A kid? I happen to be 300 years..."},{"id":1002000230,"text":"Okay, okay. Enough bickering. We should get going."},{"id":1002000231,"text":"Lemme go, Gremio! He just called me a kid!"},{"id":1002000232,"text":"Oh brother, we're sure off to a rocky start."},{"id":1002000233,"text":"Futch, was it? Let's just calm down now. We're gonna be∠needing that lift."},{"id":1002000234,"text":"Fine. Hurry up then and climb on Black's back."},{"id":1002000235,"text":"All right, everyone ready? Hold tight, or you'll get thrown∠off.∨Not that I'd mind if a certain someone fell off."},{"id":1002000236,"text":"What'd you say?!"},{"id":1002000237,"text":"Careful. Stop fighting in the basket."},{"id":1002000238,"text":"All right, Black. Let's go!"},{"id":1002000239,"text":"Phew! Home sweet home at last."},{"id":1002000240,"text":"I'll prepare supper right away, Young Master."},{"id":1002000241,"text":"Phew! Boy, am I stuffed.∨Sure beats all the dried meat we've been eating lately.∠Haven't had a proper meal like this in forever."},{"id":1002000242,"text":"What're you on about? You'd eat anything so long as it∠filled your stomach."},{"id":1002000243,"text":"Guilty as charged. Hahahah!"},{"id":1002000244,"text":"I've made some tea, Young Master."},{"id":1002000245,"text":"Young Master, do you miss your father?"},{"id":1002000246,"text":"Not really.∠"},{"id":1002000247,"text":"I see. You're a strong, independent man now.∨If only Master Teo could see how much you've grown."},{"id":1002000248,"text":"A little...∠"},{"id":1002000249,"text":"I see. I'm not trying to mother you, but if you need∠anything, I'm here for you..."},{"id":1002000250,"text":"I'm fine with you here, babe."},{"id":1002000251,"text":"Young Master! Who taught you to speak like that?∨Pahn! Are you behind this?"},{"id":1002000252,"text":"It's been raining a lot."},{"id":1002000253,"text":"There's something I've noticed, Young Master.∨The Imperial Army seems to have gained something of a∠notorious reputation."},{"id":1002000254,"text":"True. It's definitely fallen out of favor compared to back∠when we fought in the War of Succession."},{"id":1002000255,"text":"I blame people like Kraze and Kanaan with their despotic∠attitudes."},{"id":1002000256,"text":"I wonder how long we'll have to serve under Kraze."},{"id":1002000257,"text":"Ted's been gone for a while. He said he'd be back soon as∠his errand was done.∨The stew's starting to get cold."},{"id":1002000258,"text":"*groaning*"},{"id":1002000259,"text":"Young Master, what in the world...☆12∨Cleo! Pahn! Give me a hand!"},{"id":1002000260,"text":"Ted! What happened? Are you okay?"},{"id":1002000261,"text":"There's so much blood. And the wound, it's not natural.∠Is it magic?"},{"id":1002000262,"text":"What're you doing? We need to get him inside.∠Give us a hand, Young Master."},{"id":1002000263,"text":"Help.∠"},{"id":1002000264,"text":"Okay, ready? Put your hands on my shoulder, and...∨☆5One, two!"},{"id":1002000265,"text":"Don't help."},{"id":1002000266,"text":"☆2Young Master! ☆4Why're you just standing there?!"},{"id":1002000267,"text":"Calm down now. Look what just happened to his best friend.∠Obviously, he's in a state of shock.∨I'll give you a hand.∠Please stand aside, Young Master."},{"id":1002000268,"text":"What could possibly have happened? ☆10Was he attacked∠by thieves on the way back from the palace?∨But then why a magic wound?"},{"id":1002000269,"text":"Look. He's coming around."},{"id":1002000270,"text":"☆6*groaning*☆10∨Huh?☆11∨☆3♂㈱... Wh-Where am I?∠Are they here?∠The Imperial Guard...are they still not here yet?∨☆2H-Help me, ♂㈱."},{"id":1002000271,"text":"Don't worry. You're okay now.∨Take a moment to calm down and tell us what happened."},{"id":1002000272,"text":"Gr-Gremio...☆10 I..."},{"id":1002000273,"text":"Hey, can you hurry it up? I'm starving over here."},{"id":1002000274,"text":"Pipe down and wait. Commander Kraze is speaking with Lady∠Windy right now."},{"id":1002000275,"text":"Hmph.∠All right, Ted. Come with me."},{"id":1002000276,"text":"Fine."},{"id":1002000277,"text":"It's been a while, little man.∨Three hundred years, and you haven't aged a day.∠How I envy you."},{"id":1002000278,"text":"☆2You! You're that witch!"},{"id":1002000279,"text":"So, you remember me. I'm flattered.∨Of course, I never forgot you. Not for a moment. Now then,∠hand over the rune on your right hand."},{"id":1002000280,"text":"No way! You're the last person I'd ever let have it.∠I'd rather..."},{"id":1002000281,"text":"☆3What do you think you're doing?!"},{"id":1002000282,"text":"O Soul Eater, the Cursed Rune, manifest thy power..."},{"id":1002000283,"text":"Don't be foolish. Using its power here will destroy∠you as well!"},{"id":1002000284,"text":"♂㈱, p-please..."},{"id":1002000285,"text":"Ted? Hey, buddy."},{"id":1002000286,"text":"It's no use. He's passed out again."},{"id":1002000287,"text":"What's going on? Sounds like he was being chased by∠the Imperial Guard.∨You don't think..."},{"id":1002000288,"text":"☆2 That Ted did something? Of course not!"},{"id":1002000289,"text":"Well, I'm not so sure. ☆10Cleo, maybe we should inform∠the Imperial Guard."},{"id":1002000290,"text":"☆3Why? The Young Master's best friend would never act against∠the Empire!∨What need is there to inform the Guard? Are you suggesting—"},{"id":1002000291,"text":"I'm just being cautious. We can't afford to have any trouble∠while Master Teo is away."},{"id":1002000292,"text":"Hmm. Well, let's at least wait until Ted wakes up."},{"id":1002000293,"text":"Ted said something about a \"Soul Eater.\" I've heard that∠name somewhere before."},{"id":1002000294,"text":"No need to worry. This is Ted we're talking about☆5...☆11∠Of course he's innocent."},{"id":1002000295,"text":"Young Master...☆12∨Ted's fever still hasn't gone down. I'll go wake the∠shopkeeper and buy some medicine."},{"id":1002000296,"text":"The rain still hasn't let up."},{"id":1002000297,"text":"I don't like this rain. Gives me the shivers."},{"id":1002000298,"text":"*groans*☆10"},{"id":1002000299,"text":"He's coming around."},{"id":1002000300,"text":"♂㈱...∨.........∨S-Sorry...☆10for all the trouble."},{"id":1002000301,"text":"Nevermind that. What did you mean earlier by \"Soul Eater\"?"},{"id":1002000302,"text":"♂㈱... Just this once, I'm begging you...∨P-Please, will you do something for me?"},{"id":1002000303,"text":"No.∠"},{"id":1002000304,"text":"Don't say that, ♂㈱... Just this once, I'm begging∠you. Hear me out..."},{"id":1002000305,"text":"You're right...∨I know it's always \"just this once\" with me...but this∠really is the last time.∠I'm begging you..."},{"id":1002000306,"text":"Come on, ♂㈱. I'm in pain...∠Please hurry..."},{"id":1002000307,"text":"What is it, Ted?∠"},{"id":1002000308,"text":"♂㈱...  Take off my...right glove..."},{"id":1002000309,"text":"What's this?"},{"id":1002000310,"text":"Wait, is this...one of the 27 True Runes?"},{"id":1002000311,"text":"Yes, it is. This one is the Soul Eater, the Cursed Rune...∨It's what caused all of this... The reason Court Magician∠Windy is after me..."},{"id":1002000312,"text":"Why would Lady Windy do such a thing?"},{"id":1002000313,"text":"I-I'm not sure what her end goal is... but that woman∠is after this rune.∨I've wandered the world...for 300 years, fleeing her∠clutches...∨Never thought...she'd find me here. My mistake was∠using the rune's power...at Mt. Seifu."},{"id":1002000314,"text":"So that's what you used to take out the Queen Ant∠on Mt. Seifu."},{"id":1002000315,"text":"♂㈱...☆12∨With this wound, I'll never escape that woman...∨I...I know it's unfair to drag our friendship into this...∨Especially knowing...it may bring you misfortune.∨☆10But...☆10You...☆3Y-You're the only one I can ask!∠Please, I'm begging you! Protect this rune!∨☆4Th-This Cursed Rune...can't fall into Windy's hands.∠Th-There's no one I can trust but you. Please, take it..."},{"id":1002000316,"text":"No."},{"id":1002000317,"text":"You're the only one...I can count on..."},{"id":1002000318,"text":"Don't let...my 300 years of suffering be for nothing..."},{"id":1002000319,"text":"♂㈱. You're the only...friend I've got...∨P-Please..."},{"id":1002000320,"text":"Okay, Ted. You can count on me.∠"},{"id":1002000321,"text":"I-I'm sorry... ♂㈱.∨This rune may bring you misery... Hate me all you want∠if it does.∨But please... You can never let Windy get hold of it.☆11∠Give me your right hand...☆10♂㈱..."},{"id":1002000322,"text":"There... Now I can...rest peacefully..."},{"id":1002000323,"text":"Wh-What was that?"},{"id":1002000324,"text":"It came from our front door. Come on, Gremio."},{"id":1002000325,"text":"O-Okay, Cleo."},{"id":1002000326,"text":"♂㈱... I haven't slept soundly once in the last∠300 years...∨Now, I can finally...sleep..."},{"id":1002000327,"text":"............"},{"id":1002000328,"text":"So, Master McDohl's son is here as well.∨Why don't you go ahead and hand over Ted? We know he's∠here. We were informed by Pahn, who is loyal to the Empire."},{"id":1002000329,"text":"Pahn! You!"},{"id":1002000330,"text":"Why, Pahn?!"},{"id":1002000331,"text":"I can't allow any trouble to occur in Master Teo's absence.∨My hands are tied. ☆9I won't betray his trust like that.∠Please understand."},{"id":1002000332,"text":"Come on. Bring out Ted."},{"id":1002000333,"text":"Not gonna happen, Kraze.∨You may be the commander of the Imperial Guard, but you∠can't just barge into Master Teo's house without a valid∠reason."},{"id":1002000334,"text":"That's right. I swear on my hatchet we won't let you pass."},{"id":1002000335,"text":"W-Wait..."},{"id":1002000336,"text":"Hmph. Ready to give yourself up?"},{"id":1002000337,"text":"♂㈱... They still think I have the Soul Eater.∨I'll act as a distraction while you escape."},{"id":1002000338,"text":"But what about you, Ted?"},{"id":1002000340,"text":"Don't worry about me, ♂㈱. I'll manage to get∠away somehow."},{"id":1002000341,"text":"I believe in you, and I want you to believe in me too."},{"id":1002000342,"text":"Don't disappoint me. You of all people should know how∠I feel."},{"id":1002000343,"text":"All right."},{"id":1002000344,"text":"Young Master! There's no way Ted can escape with that∠wound."},{"id":1002000345,"text":"Quiet, Gremio. He knows that too.∨We've got to get away so he can keep his promise to Ted.∠Isn't that right, Young Master?"},{"id":1002000346,"text":"☆2H-Hurry... Go!"},{"id":1002000347,"text":"Very well. Young Master, let's escape through the back door∠in the kitchen."},{"id":1002000348,"text":"Th-Thank you, ♂㈱.∨In the past 300 years, you alone were my...∠one true friend..."},{"id":1002000349,"text":"It's locked."},{"id":1002000350,"text":"Hey, who the hell are you? This is Master Grady's mansion.∨You're trespassing! State your purpose or be gone."},{"id":1002000351,"text":"☆2What did you say?! I'm Kanaan, second-in-command to∠Imperial Guard Commander Kraze!∨Now tell Grady to get out here!"},{"id":1002000352,"text":"What?! ☆10☆2Y-Yes, sir. Right away.∠Please wait a moment."},{"id":1002000353,"text":"Who is it? Villagers here to complain again? Chase them off."},{"id":1002000354,"text":"No, sir. They're from the Imperial Guard."},{"id":1002000356,"text":"Ah! Welcome, welcome, friends of the Imperial Guard.∠What brings you to our humble country town?∨Forgive my manners. Please, do come in."},{"id":1002000357,"text":"Hmm. Seems like you're doing well for yourself here."},{"id":1002000358,"text":"Oh no, not at all, sir."},{"id":1002000359,"text":"Well, no matter. ☆9You know why we're here, don't you?"},{"id":1002000360,"text":"Of course, sir. It's about our taxes, isn't it?∠We're in something of a pickle ourselves.∨Bandits have taken up residence in nearby Mt. Seifu, and∠they've been pillaging the surrounding villages.∨That's why we've been late in collecting taxes and∠delivering them to you. But I'm glad our problem is now∠solved."},{"id":1002000361,"text":"Solved? What do you mean?"},{"id":1002000362,"text":"I'm referring to your arrival, of course.∨Trouncing country bandits should be child's play for the∠courageous Imperial Guard.∨Nothing you'd lose sleep over, I'm sure."},{"id":1002000363,"text":"Bwahahaha! Of course not.☆14∠Hmm. ☆10Bandits, you say?☆14∨W-Well, shouldn't be a problem. We'll crush them like∠insects. Hahahaha!"},{"id":1002000364,"text":"Wait, but our mission..."},{"id":1002000365,"text":"Hahah! Boy, am I excited. I'm dying for a good fight."},{"id":1002000366,"text":"Me too. Let's teach those bandits a lesson.∠Right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1002000367,"text":"You bet."},{"id":1002000368,"text":"Young Master, I'm not sure this is wise."},{"id":1002000369,"text":"Oh well. Boys'll be boys."},{"id":1002000370,"text":"∠We should return home first."},{"id":1002000371,"text":"What? I'm the leader of this party.∨We go where I command. Now shut up and follow me,∠you cowards."},{"id":1002000372,"text":"All right, we leave immediately. Don't fall behind."},{"id":1002000373,"text":"Very well, but do you know where Mt. Seifu is?"},{"id":1002000374,"text":"Sh-Shut up, I was about to ask."},{"id":1002000375,"text":"Mt. Seifu is just east of Rockland."},{"id":1002000376,"text":"Fine, now let's go!"},{"id":1002000377,"text":"Phew! We're finally at Mt. Seifu. No turning tail and∠retreating when the bandits show up."},{"id":1002000378,"text":"Speak for yourself."},{"id":1002000379,"text":"Here we go!∨Pahn, you take the lead."},{"id":1002000380,"text":"Why me?"},{"id":1002000381,"text":"Quit whining and get to it. I'm the leader, so I'll go last."},{"id":1002000382,"text":"Psh!"},{"id":1002000383,"text":"Heehee. Isn't this thrilling, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1002000384,"text":"Ted, please don't put these ideas in his head.∨You mustn't behave recklessly, Young Master. On my honor,∠I will protect you."},{"id":1002000385,"text":"Come on, let's go!"},{"id":1002000386,"text":"Damn, she's strong! We're no match for her!"},{"id":1002000387,"text":"Not looking good. We're done for at this rate..."},{"id":1002000388,"text":"Fools! Wh-What're you talking about? You must protect me!"},{"id":1002000389,"text":"Young Master, let's retreat. I'll keep you safe."},{"id":1002000390,"text":"I'm not sure we can escape."},{"id":1002000391,"text":"Do something!"},{"id":1002000392,"text":"♂㈱, everyone, stand back. I have an idea."},{"id":1002000393,"text":"I'm counting on you, Ted.∠"},{"id":1002000394,"text":"I've got this.∨Have I ever let you down?"},{"id":1002000395,"text":"Don't do anything reckless, Ted."},{"id":1002000396,"text":"Don't worry, ♂㈱. I've got this.☆12∨But thanks anyway. Appreciate the concern."},{"id":1002000397,"text":"Wh-What the hell...?"},{"id":1002000398,"text":"T-Ted! What in the world was that?"},{"id":1002000399,"text":"I'm sorry, ♂㈱. I can't explain right now.∨There's something I wanna tell you when we get home.∠Just don't ask until then.∨Come on, let's finish off the bandits and head back to∠Gregminster."},{"id":1002000400,"text":"Hmm. So this is what Commander Kraze was talking about..."},{"id":1002000401,"text":"Well, what a rare treat. Looks like we have vistors.∠What can I do for you?"},{"id":1002000402,"text":"Listen up, bandit scum.∨I am Kanaan, Vice Commander of the Imperial Guard to∠Golden Emperor Barbarossa. I've come to bring you to justice.∨Now lay down your arms and surrender, you tax-pilfering∠leeches."},{"id":1002000403,"text":"Hear that? He says we're tax-pilfering leeches.∠Someone's got the wrong idea.∨Listen up, you petty bureaucrat. I'm Varkas the Whirlwind∠Axe. Sydonia, you introduce yourself as well."},{"id":1002000404,"text":"Heh. Waste of time."},{"id":1002000405,"text":"Excuse my associate. ☆9That right there is our marksman,∠Sydonia.∨Best go home before you get hurt, you tax-thieving Imperial∠Guard curs."},{"id":1002000406,"text":"How dare you... I was renowned throughout the Empire as..."},{"id":1002000407,"text":"You idiot! Don't get involved."},{"id":1002000408,"text":"Listen up, bandits. Surrender now while you can or you'll∠regret it."},{"id":1002000409,"text":"You really wanna do this? Come on, let's take 'em out!"},{"id":1002000410,"text":"Wh-Whoaaa! They're actually attacking...∨Wh-Wh-What're you all doing? Hurry up and fight! Fight!"},{"id":1002000411,"text":"Tsk. You guys are useless.∠Outta the way. I'll take care of this myself.∠Give me a hand, Sydonia."},{"id":1002000412,"text":"Heh."},{"id":1002000413,"text":"Ready to surrender? Hahaha!"},{"id":1002000414,"text":"Phew... Are you okay, Young Master?"},{"id":1002000415,"text":"Heeheehee. This is what happens when you defy me."},{"id":1002000416,"text":"You didn't do anything."},{"id":1002000417,"text":"Damn it. How was I defeated by imperial dogs?"},{"id":1002000418,"text":"Right then, seize the bandit scum."},{"id":1002000419,"text":"Welcome back, Master Kanaan. What of the bandits?∨What? You caught them? I'll go get Master Grady.∠Please wait a moment."},{"id":1002000420,"text":"Back so soon? What can I say? I'm impressed.∨You wasted no time apprehending these tax thieves."},{"id":1002000421,"text":"Tax thieves? You're the tax thief!"},{"id":1002000422,"text":"We'll lock them up in our prison cell."},{"id":1002000423,"text":"Master Kanaan."},{"id":1002000424,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1002000425,"text":"Please, take this. A small token of gratitude from our∠village."},{"id":1002000426,"text":"Ah, well, thank you."},{"id":1002000427,"text":"Quite the dangerous sum. I'll hold on to it for safekeeping."},{"id":1002000428,"text":"Well, we've managed to apprehend the bandits, thanks to∠my exploits.∨Let's hurry back to Gregminster. I can't wait to report∠my success to Commander Kraze."},{"id":1002000429,"text":"All right, this is as far as you need to go. I'll go report∠to Commander Kraze.∨You all can head home and rest. You know, I really am∠a nice guy."},{"id":1002000430,"text":"Oh yeah, real nice. Enough to make me cry.∠The bastard's gonna take all the credit for himself."},{"id":1002000431,"text":"Let it go Pahn. Wasn't much of an achievement anyway.∠Besides, I'm exhausted. I wanna go home and kick my feet up."},{"id":1002000432,"text":"Home sweet home at last, Young Master. I'll cook up∠something special."},{"id":1002000433,"text":"Yeah! Your cooking is the best, Gremio."},{"id":1002000434,"text":"Ted, you're coming with me."},{"id":1002000435,"text":"Hm? What's this about?"},{"id":1002000436,"text":"Oh, nothing much. It won't take long. Just come along."},{"id":1002000437,"text":"All right, sir. Go on home first, ♂㈱.∠I'll see you there later.∨I've got something to tell you..."},{"id":1002000438,"text":"Come on, Ted."},{"id":1002000439,"text":"Ah, members of the Imperial Guard. Did you leave∠something behind?"},{"id":1002000440,"text":"You acquired 10,000 potch!"},{"id":1002000441,"text":"You lost 10,000 potch!"},{"id":1002000442,"text":"All right, we're done here! Now let's get the hell off∠this mountain!"},{"id":1002000443,"text":"Heeheehee... That idiot sure is a lot faster on the way∠down."},{"id":1002000444,"text":"Come on! What's keeping you all? A hero's welcome awaits us∠in Rockland! Hahahahaha!"},{"id":1002000445,"text":"Young Master, we can't leave until we've defeated the∠bandits."},{"id":1002000446,"text":""},{"id":1002000447,"text":"■"},{"id":1002000448,"text":""},{"id":1002000449,"text":"What in blazes is going on here? Imperial soldiers running∠around and you scurry in soaked to the bones.∨What?∨Oh well, nevermind. I'm sure you have your reasons.∠Don't worry. You can stay here. I'll put it on your tab."},{"id":1002000450,"text":"Thank you so much."},{"id":1002000451,"text":"Young Master. Now that it's come to this, we'd best lay low∠for a while.∨How could this have happened...?"},{"id":1002000452,"text":"The only way we can return to the Empire is to go north∠and seek help from Master Teo.∨But first we must find a way to flee Gregminster..."},{"id":1002000453,"text":"Young Master. Please don't wander about too much."},{"id":1002000454,"text":"☆2Whoa! ☆4Owww... Watch where you're going, you little squirt.∨I get called on duty during my day off to search for someone∠all night. And just when I finally have a moment to catch∠my breath..."},{"id":1002000455,"text":"Shut up, idiot.∠"},{"id":1002000456,"text":"How dare you speak to me that way. We're imperial soldiers,∠your protectors!"},{"id":1002000457,"text":"(We need to stay inconspicuous.)"},{"id":1002000458,"text":"Hey. Hold it right there, half-pint. Just gonna run into me∠and not apologize? Is that how your parents raised you?"},{"id":1002000459,"text":"Huh? ☆9Wait just a minute. I recognize you from somewhere."},{"id":1002000460,"text":"Y-Young Master, are you all right?"},{"id":1002000461,"text":"Hey, you! What the hell are you doing?"},{"id":1002000462,"text":"Who are you people? And what's this \"Young Master\" ∠business? "},{"id":1002000463,"text":"Wait! Let me see his face. He looks like that one we're∠after, the McDohl kid.  "},{"id":1002000464,"text":"Wh-What did you say?"},{"id":1002000465,"text":"If this escalates any further we're in trouble."},{"id":1002000466,"text":"We'll hold them off, Young Master. You escape while you can."},{"id":1002000467,"text":"Guess we have no choice. Let's do this..."},{"id":1002000468,"text":"All right, okay, calm down, buddy. You too, O Great∠Imperial Sirs. C'mon, just think about it.∨Why would fugitives still be hanging around here? No one∠would be that stupid."},{"id":1002000469,"text":"W-Well, I suppose. But just in case..."},{"id":1002000470,"text":"C'mon, you're scaring the poor kid. Look, just leave this∠to me. I'll kick them out."},{"id":1002000471,"text":"Hey, wait a second..."},{"id":1002000472,"text":"Forget it. No need to always be sticking our necks out∠for the Empire.  "},{"id":1002000473,"text":"Wait! It's that guy!"},{"id":1002000474,"text":"Thank you. You really saved us there."},{"id":1002000475,"text":"Right back at ya. I was wonderin' how I was gonna talk∠myself outta payin' for my meal."},{"id":1002000476,"text":"Hold on! So you're saying..."},{"id":1002000477,"text":"You used us to get a free meal?"},{"id":1002000478,"text":"Oh, c'mon, it worked out for all of us. Well, see ya around.∠Thanks for helpin' me out."},{"id":1002000479,"text":"We're not rebels!  "},{"id":1002000480,"text":"Couldn't care less either way. More importantly, how do you∠plan on gettin' outta here?∨I've got an idea, if you're up for it. I do this kind of∠thing all the time. Wanna give it a try?"},{"id":1002000481,"text":"I don't trust you.∠"},{"id":1002000482,"text":"I agree, Young Master. I don't trust him either."},{"id":1002000483,"text":"Oh, come on."},{"id":1002000484,"text":"Fine then. Suit yourself."},{"id":1002000485,"text":"I don't trust him, but what other choice do we have?"},{"id":1002000486,"text":"Exactly. Ya see? She gets it."},{"id":1002000487,"text":"Okay, help us out."},{"id":1002000488,"text":"All right, leave it to me. There's just one condition."},{"id":1002000489,"text":"Uh-oh, here we go."},{"id":1002000490,"text":"Don't worry. It's nothin' crazy. If you manage to escape,∠there's someone I want you to meet.∨That's it. Not a bad deal, right? Now that that's outta the way, ∠let's move.∨First, we'll head to the city gates. Trust me, I'm not handin' ∠you over to the imperial forces."},{"id":1002000491,"text":"Okay then, I'll go talk to them. Just sit tight."},{"id":1002000492,"text":"All clear. Make sure to keep your faces hidden."},{"id":1002000493,"text":"☆6Whew! ☆4Sure is sunny today. Think I'll just rest∠in the shade..."},{"id":1002000494,"text":"*huff puff*∠We did it. I thought my heart would explode."},{"id":1002000495,"text":"So, how'd you manage to pull that off?"},{"id":1002000496,"text":"Ah, it was nothin' really. ☆9Just some good ol' fashioned∠bribery. Imperial soldiers talk a mean game, but money's∠their weakness.∨The capital is corrupt to its core and it's comin' apart∠at the seams."},{"id":1002000497,"text":"What a tragedy."},{"id":1002000498,"text":"But... How did you bribe him? Didn't you say you had∠no money?"},{"id":1002000499,"text":"Why would I use my own money to help you escape?"},{"id":1002000500,"text":"What?∨Hey! My wallet's gone! When did you...?"},{"id":1002000501,"text":"Here, you can have it back. Better keep an eye on it∠this time.∨Now for our promise. You didn't forget, did you? So,∠kiddo..."},{"id":1002000502,"text":"That's Master ♂㈱ to you!"},{"id":1002000503,"text":"Okay, Master ♂㈱. There's someone I'd like all of∠you to meet in Lenankamp. Will you come along?"},{"id":1002000504,"text":"A promise is a promise.∠"},{"id":1002000505,"text":"All right, now let's get outta this place. Lenankamp is∠just south of here."},{"id":1002000506,"text":"Where's Lenankamp?"},{"id":1002000507,"text":"Seriously? What're they teaching you young nobles?∠It's just a quick trip south. C'mon, let's go."},{"id":1002000508,"text":"Well, well, well..."},{"id":1002000509,"text":"If it isn't Master McDohl's boy. What are you...?∠Nevermind, come with me!"},{"id":1002000510,"text":"What's the matter? You look worried. Heh heh.∠Yeah, I know. You're that rebel McDohl kid, aren't you?"},{"id":1003000028,"text":"Look, I saw what happened. I really did. The bandits were∠fleeing east to Mt. Seifu. They're hiding there now."},{"id":1003000029,"text":"Hey, mister. You a member of the Imperial Army? ☆9∠You're not, are you? You would've roughed me up by now."},{"id":1003000030,"text":"∠     This Grave Houses A Troubled Man∨\"Loneliness is a slow-acting yet deadly poison.\""},{"id":1003000031,"text":"∠   These are the Last Words of a Woman Found on the Street∨\"Clive, please forgive me for not dying at your hands.\""},{"id":1003000032,"text":"I see... So my life has been in vain."},{"id":1003000033,"text":"∠    An Average Mother Lies Here∨\"Good night. Until we meet again.\""},{"id":1003000034,"text":"∠   Here Lies An Unknown Warrior∨\"For me, the battlefield was life itself.\""},{"id":1003000035,"text":"My, what a rare sight. We don't have many visitors to our∠remote village."},{"id":1003000036,"text":"You're from the imperial capital? I'm sure it's far livelier∠than here in Rockland."},{"id":1003000037,"text":"It's locked."},{"id":1003000038,"text":"∠    A Pretty Deep Well∨∠      \"No loitering\""},{"id":1003000039,"text":"Yup, this is Rockland. So called 'cause it's a wasteland∠full of rocks."},{"id":1003000040,"text":"What's that? Sure, I know where it is. The commander's house∠is the one at the end of the road. His name's Grady, a real∠two-faced bastard."},{"id":1003000041,"text":"∠     The Grave of a Farmer∨\"Where there was gentle sunlight,∠I could grow anything.\""},{"id":1003000042,"text":"∠     Herein Lies a Poet∨\"I leave my verse here as proof that I lived.∠That will be my epitaph.\""},{"id":1003000043,"text":"Members of the Imperial Guard, this is the way out."},{"id":1003000044,"text":"You bastard! How dare you muddy my shiny boots!"},{"id":1003000045,"text":"Who the hell are you all? Buzz off!"},{"id":1003000046,"text":"Fight.∠Don't fight."},{"id":1003000047,"text":"How about it, man? Wanna play a game?"},{"id":1003000048,"text":"Rumor has it the Emperor changed many years ago, but in∠a rural town like this, it doesn't really matter who's∠on the throne."},{"id":1003000049,"text":"No matter how hard I work, life only gets harder.∠And it's all thanks to that Grad...∨Um, I mean, nothing... Nothing at all. Heh heh..."},{"id":1003000050,"text":"I'm... hungry. ☆10So hungry..."},{"id":1003000051,"text":"Welcome."},{"id":1003000052,"text":"Empire? ☆9Rebellion? ☆9Like I care about any of that.∠I just wanna live my life here in peace."},{"id":1003000053,"text":"You fellas from the Imperial Army?∨What happened to this place? It wasn't like this before...∠What in the world is Emperor Barbarossa doing?"},{"id":1003000054,"text":"Who are you folk? If it's food you're after, we don't have∠any here!∨Soon as we make somethin', they snatch it away from us!"},{"id":1003000055,"text":"Welcome to Rockland. For 30 potch a person, you get∠a fluffy straw bed and a nice warm breakfast."},{"id":1003000056,"text":"Rum, mead, sake, brandy, you name it, we've got it all.∠But none for you quite yet. Come back in a year or two."},{"id":1003000057,"text":"So sorry. We're out of booze."},{"id":1003000058,"text":"Then what's that you've got lined up back there?"},{"id":1003000059,"text":"Ahaha... I can't serve that ghastly swill to esteemed∠imperial guests such as yourselves."},{"id":1003000060,"text":"Whaddaya want? I don't take kindly to bein' disturbed∠while I'm enjoyin' a drink."},{"id":1003000061,"text":"Nothing improves a drink like good food and a good view.∨And nothing ruins it like the footsteps of imperial∠soldiers."},{"id":1003000062,"text":"If you're done, then get the hell outta here."},{"id":1003000063,"text":"Can I help you? Have I got something on my face?∠Well, I am one good-☆8looking fella."},{"id":1003000064,"text":"Wait, no way! Isn't that the Imperial Guard uniform?∠That's amazing. Man, I'm jealous!"},{"id":1003000065,"text":"Hahaha! Pretty impressive, isn't it?"},{"id":1003000066,"text":"Absolutely. Oh boy! All that good food is keeping you nice∠and chunky, huh?"},{"id":1003000067,"text":"That's amazing! Amazing! Is it true you folk captured∠those bandits?"},{"id":1003000068,"text":"Hahahaha! Yes, siree!"},{"id":1003000069,"text":"Know what else is amazing? You don't even realize∠you've been swindled."},{"id":1003000070,"text":"Hahahahahaha... Huh?"},{"id":1003000072,"text":"A year ago, no one needed weapons, but nowadays the streets∠are teeming with danger."},{"id":1003000073,"text":"How about it? Wanna buy one? I'll give you a bargain."},{"id":1003000079,"text":"I don't care who they are! I'm busy! Hurry up and...∨What? ☆11Imperial Guard?∨Did you say Imperial Guard? Why didn't you say so earlier,∠you idiot!"},{"id":1003000123,"text":"I'm sorry, but I am unable to explain right now.∨♂㈱, there's something I have to tell you after∠we return home. Until then, please don't ask about it.∨Well then, let's bust up these bandits and go back to∠Gregminster!"},{"id":1003000170,"text":""},{"id":1003000171,"text":""},{"id":1003000172,"text":""},{"id":1003000173,"text":"Who're you? If you've no business here, then clear off.∨Or do you wanna be strung up like those bandits?∠Hahahahaha!"},{"id":1003000174,"text":"Security is tight. Sneaking in won't be easy."},{"id":1003000175,"text":"Just leave it to me. I'm used to this kinda thing."},{"id":1003000176,"text":"Help! Fire! The Grady mansion is on fire!"},{"id":1003000177,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1003000178,"text":"Viktor! What've you done? Don't tell me you..."},{"id":1003000179,"text":"Heeheehee. Don't know what you're talkin' about. Must be∠all the dry weather we're having."},{"id":1003000180,"text":"Aargh... What's going on? My eyes are blurry, I can't...∠Hey! You're those imperial soldiers! What're you doing∠here? Came to mock me, didn't you!"},{"id":1003000181,"text":"Of course we didn't. If we knew what Grady was up to,∠we would never have helped him."},{"id":1003000182,"text":"As it happens, we're also fugitives now. We're here to∠rescue you."},{"id":1003000183,"text":"Thanks. Give my associate a hand too, will ya?"},{"id":1003000184,"text":"Heh. That won't be necessary."},{"id":1003000185,"text":"Sydonia, you bastard! If you could get free, why didn't you∠escape earlier?"},{"id":1003000186,"text":"Heh. Can't very well escape on my own, can I?"},{"id":1003000187,"text":"Sydonia... ☆11Why, you..."},{"id":1003000188,"text":"Hey, we'd better get outta here quick."},{"id":1003000189,"text":"T-T-Traitors! Not only did you defy the Emperor, you freed∠the bandits...∨And...and... You set my house on fire! You'll pay for this!"},{"id":1003000190,"text":"Oh yeah? You want to settle this now? You're not the only∠one with an axe to grind.∨How about I carve out your eyeballs?"},{"id":1003000191,"text":"What? ☆9Well, ☆9um..."},{"id":1003000192,"text":"Heh. I'll settle for tearing him to pieces."},{"id":1003000193,"text":"What?! ☆9Um, ☆9well, ☆9ehem...∨Just wait until Commander Kraze hears about what happened.∠You'll get what's coming to you!"},{"id":1003000194,"text":"Cleo. Do you think we'll ever be able to return to the∠Empire?"},{"id":1003000195,"text":"I don't know."},{"id":1003000196,"text":"Y-Young Master."},{"id":1003000197,"text":"Hahahaha! Don't worry. Where there's a will to survive,∠there's a way."},{"id":1003000198,"text":"Looks like we're indebted to the Liberation Army now.∨Tell Lady Odessa ☆9∠that if she ever needs help, Varkas∠and Sydonia will run to her aid.∨Goodbye then. Perhaps we'll meet again someday."},{"id":1003000199,"text":"Nothing like a hard day's work. Come on, let's get back∠to Lenankamp.∨♂㈱, why don't you spend a little more time with∠the Liberation Army? What do you say?"},{"id":1003000200,"text":"Young Master, once we return to Lenankamp, let's plot our∠next course of action. There's no time to waste."},{"id":1003000201,"text":"♂㈱! You came back! Thank you. This solves∠our problem!"},{"id":1003000202,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1003000203,"text":"Odessa! You're not planning what I think you are!"},{"id":1003000204,"text":"Yes, I am."},{"id":1003000205,"text":"What? What is it? What's goin' on?"},{"id":1003000206,"text":"♂㈱, take a look at this."},{"id":1003000207,"text":"Wait, what is it? Show me as well."},{"id":1003000208,"text":"What the hell is this?"},{"id":1003000209,"text":"Blueprints for Fire Spears."},{"id":1003000210,"text":"Fire Spears?"},{"id":1003000211,"text":"Yes. The Imperial Army sees us as an insignificant threat. ☆9∠But there'll come a day when we can face them head-on. ☆9∨When that day arrives, Fire Spears will come in handy."},{"id":1003000212,"text":"That's why we paid good money to purchase these from∠the Dwarf Mines."},{"id":1003000213,"text":"♂㈱, this blueprint needs to reach the Liberation∠Army's secret factory.∨But we can't leave this hideout abandoned. ☆9So I'd like∠to ask you to take on this job."},{"id":1003000214,"text":"Enough! We're part of the Imperial Army!∨How can you expect us to betray the Empire like that? ☆9∠Let's go, Young Master! No need for us to stay here∠any longer!"},{"id":1003000215,"text":"Wait!"},{"id":1003000216,"text":"Don't you know what the Empire is doing? ☆9What the people∠truly want? ☆9Or are you going to feign ignorance?∨Gremio, ☆9you saw it with your own eyes, ☆9heard it∠with your own ears.∨Will you ignore the truth despite all you've seen and heard?∨What about you, ♂㈱? ☆9Still want to go back∠to the Empire? ☆9Go back to being General McDohl's∠little boy?"},{"id":1003000217,"text":"My father is his own man, and so am I.∠"},{"id":1003000218,"text":"Now, hold on a second, Young Master. Keep talking like that∠and we'll never be allowed to rejoin the Imperial Army.∨Is that what you want? Come on, Cleo, talk some sense∠into him."},{"id":1003000219,"text":"Where the Young Master goes, I follow.∨My job is to protect him. Those are my orders from Master∠Teo."},{"id":1003000221,"text":"I am a soldier of the Imperial Army."},{"id":1003000222,"text":"All right... I understand. I've no intention of forcing∠my beliefs on you.∨But...☆9if you change your mind, I want you to come back here."},{"id":1003000223,"text":"♂㈱! I knew you'd come back. Will you help us?"},{"id":1003000224,"text":"I will.∠"},{"id":1003000225,"text":"Thank you."},{"id":1003000226,"text":"Well..."},{"id":1003000227,"text":"I see. So you haven't made up your mind yet. That's fine.∠I can wait."},{"id":1003000228,"text":"♂㈱, let me start by explaining.∨These here are blueprints for Fire Spears. They need to be∠delivered to the Liberation Army's secret factory."},{"id":1003000229,"text":"Northwest of Lenankamp, across the river, you'll find∠Mt. Tigerwolf.∨Beyond that mountain is a village called Sarady. A messenger∠from the secret factory should be waiting for you there."},{"id":1003000230,"text":"Odessa, I don't understand. Why do you insist on trusting∠this guy? They could be imperial spies for all we know.∨Are you sure you want to give him the blueprints that hold∠the fate of the Liberation Army?"},{"id":1003000231,"text":"Don't worry. ☆9I'm going with them."},{"id":1003000232,"text":"What?! If you're going, I'm going too."},{"id":1003000233,"text":"Flik. Who'll protect this place if you come along?∨It's time you start acting like a leader."},{"id":1003000234,"text":"Don't worry, Flik. I'll keep Odessa safe. In return,∠you look after the hideout."},{"id":1003000235,"text":"It's settled then. Let's head for Mt. Tigerwolf."},{"id":1003000236,"text":"How could you?! ☆9Y-Young Master, this man is unhinged!"},{"id":1003000237,"text":"Heh..."},{"id":1003000238,"text":"Yowch... Almost got burned there."},{"id":1004000016,"text":"Whose weapon do you want to∠upgrade?"},{"id":1004000017,"text":"There is nothing more I can do."},{"id":1004000019,"text":"Whose rune piece do you want to∠attach?"},{"id":1004000021,"text":"That is not a rune piece."},{"id":1004000023,"text":"Would you like to remove the∠current rune piece?"},{"id":1004000024,"text":"The rune piece has been attached to∠your weapon."},{"id":1004000032,"text":"Choose an orb."},{"id":1004000033,"text":"That is not an orb."},{"id":1004000034,"text":"It can't be attached."},{"id":1004000038,"text":"You can't remove the rune."},{"id":1004000039,"text":"The rune has been returned to its orb."},{"id":1004000055,"text":"If you're looking for a place to stay, I suggest the Keyaki∠Inn. It's just up ahead."},{"id":1004000056,"text":"Think it's true that General Teo is moving north?∠If there's war, it'll be bad for business."},{"id":1004000057,"text":"Occasionally you see a suspicious group of people sneak∠into the Keyaki Inn and never come out. When do you think∠they leave?"},{"id":1004000058,"text":"That's the Liberation Army's hideout? If I'd known that,∠I would've joined them myself."},{"id":1004000059,"text":"Someone told me that the hideout of the Liberation Army∠was in this town. Maybe they were lying..."},{"id":1004000060,"text":"Rumor has it there's a group of rebels currently on the run.∠Wouldn't happen to be you folk by any chance?"},{"id":1004000061,"text":"Heeheehee. So the Liberation Army's hideout was here∠after all. I'm sure they've all been caught by now."},{"id":1004000062,"text":"Now that the Liberation Army is done for, things'll quiet∠down around here."},{"id":1004000063,"text":"I'll let you in on something. Heehee.∨You know how monsters occasionally leave behind urns?∠Some of them are actually quite valuable. Heehee.∨If you were to take them to an appraiser... Heehee."},{"id":1004000064,"text":"My goodness... Looks like I've been robbed. Guess I'm partly∠to blame for not locking the door."},{"id":1004000065,"text":"That darn tomboy daughter of mine. \"Adventure calls\" my foot.∠All she does is make her mother and I worry."},{"id":1004000066,"text":"Oh, you're not from these parts, are you? We have a daughter∠named Meg. If you run into her somewhere, tell her to∠at least come home to visit."},{"id":1004000067,"text":"Now that I've got plenty of goods, where should I peddle∠them? Rockland in the east? ☆9Or west across Mt. Tigerwolf∠to Sarady?∨Wherever I go, I'll be making a killing."},{"id":1004000068,"text":"I can't believe it! I only left for a moment, and someone∠broke in. They took my whole fortune!"},{"id":1004000069,"text":"Welcome to the rune store."},{"id":1004000070,"text":"Welcome. This is the armor store."},{"id":1004000071,"text":"This is the blacksmith."},{"id":1004000072,"text":"Hello there. Welcome to the item store."},{"id":1004000073,"text":"Young Master, it isn't safe to go up there now."},{"id":1004000074,"text":"Wh-What should we do, Young Master?"},{"id":1004000075,"text":"I hear a voice... I think it's coming from the clock."},{"id":1004000076,"text":"Please, ♂㈱. Help save them."},{"id":1004000077,"text":"Just so we're clear, I don't trust any of you yet. ☆9∠Including you, Viktor."},{"id":1004000078,"text":"Rockland is east of the imperial capital. It's northeast∠from here in Lenankamp."},{"id":1004000079,"text":"Please. Do something to save Varkas and Sydonia!"},{"id":1004000080,"text":"So, you returned safely."},{"id":1004000081,"text":"I wasn't counting on you in the first place."},{"id":1004000082,"text":"If anything happens to Odessa, you'll regret it.∠I'll make sure of that."},{"id":1004000083,"text":"Welcome home, sir. I'm glad to see you're well."},{"id":1004000084,"text":"Please, could you help us? You're our last hope."},{"id":1004000085,"text":"Mt. Tigerwolf is across the river to the northwest. Beyond∠that is Sarady."},{"id":1004000086,"text":"*sob* How did this...happen? Enjoy a stay at the Keyaki...∠*sob*..."},{"id":1004000087,"text":"Come on, wipe away those tears! I can do this. Enjoy a stay∠at the Keyaki Inn! Only 70 potch per person!"},{"id":1004000088,"text":"We're finally here, ♂㈱. ☆9Welcome to Lenankamp.∠Not much of a town, but the local brew is excellent.∨Not that you can try it, of course! ☆10☆6Hahahahaha!∨☆4Well then, time to make myself useful. I gotta go take∠care of some business. I may be late, so have a look around."},{"id":1004000089,"text":"Who's this person Viktor wants us to meet? You know,∠there's something about that guy I don't quite trust."},{"id":1004000090,"text":"No idea. Anyway, what should we do now? I'm dying to take∠a shower."},{"id":1004000091,"text":"Welcome to Keyaki Inn. An overnight stay is 70 potch∠per person. I'll even throw in breakfast."},{"id":1004000093,"text":"Don't stay."},{"id":1004000094,"text":"Oh, you're friends of Viktor? In that case, I'll prepare∠our best rooms for you."},{"id":1004000095,"text":"Looks like that... What was his name—Viktor?—never∠came back."},{"id":1004000096,"text":"We don't have many other options. Let's wait a while longer,∠and if he doesn't turn up, we'll head north.∨I'm sure Master Teo will be able to help us."},{"id":1004000097,"text":"...∨Hey, Cleo. ☆9Why did Pahn...?"},{"id":1004000098,"text":"Just leave it, Gremio..."},{"id":1004000099,"text":"Wh-What could the ruckus be at this hour?"},{"id":1004000100,"text":"We've received reports that fugitives are staying at this∠inn. We'll be conducting an investigation now."},{"id":1004000101,"text":"Please, sir, all our guests are asleep."},{"id":1004000102,"text":"Shut up! Are you willingly harboring rebels?"},{"id":1004000103,"text":"☆2They're after us, Young Master! That Viktor fellow must've∠ratted us out! I knew we shouldn't have trusted him!"},{"id":1004000104,"text":"This is not looking good. If we stay here, they'll find us."},{"id":1004000105,"text":"Wh-What should we do, Young Master?"},{"id":1004000106,"text":"Let's fight.∠"},{"id":1004000107,"text":"V-Very well, Young Master. I, Gremio, will protect you∠with my life..."},{"id":1004000108,"text":"Are you serious? There's way too many of them. Both of you∠need to calm down."},{"id":1004000109,"text":"I'm scared. Let's run."},{"id":1004000110,"text":"I-I agree. We'll escape through this window."},{"id":1004000111,"text":"Hurry. *grunts* Huh?∨It's jammed. ☆7It...won't...open!"},{"id":1004000112,"text":"Come on! That name sounds familiar."},{"id":1004000127,"text":"You don't mean...from the Rebel Army?"},{"id":1004000128,"text":"Well, we much prefer to call ourselves the Liberation Army.∠But you can call us what you like.∨Allow me to introduce myself.
