They sure are well off for a bunch of vagabonds!∠Looks like I'll be living it up for a while."},{"id":1006000062,"text":"Hey, Ledon! How's business? Aha! Booming today, from the∠look of it."},{"id":1006000063,"text":"Why, if it isn't Boss Kessler. Always at your service.∠As you can see, I've just finished work for the day."},{"id":1006000064,"text":"Aha! That's a fine-looking lady in their company.∠...Wait, hold on a second. Isn't this...∨Hey, Ledon! What've you done, you fool?!"},{"id":1006000065,"text":"Wh-What do you mean?"},{"id":1006000066,"text":"Do you have any idea who this woman is?!"},{"id":1006000067,"text":"My guess would be some ignorant traveler."},{"id":1006000068,"text":"Idiot! Even an imbecile like you must know of Lady Odessa,∠leader of the Liberation Army!"},{"id":1006000069,"text":"You kidding, Boss? Even a child knows who Lady Odessa is...∨Wait, are you telling me this is her?"},{"id":1006000070,"text":"Yes, I am. Now hurry up and prepare the antidote."},{"id":1006000071,"text":"Uh, let's see, rabbit's tail, rose leaves, pinch of sugar..."},{"id":1006000072,"text":"Listen, Ledon. If anything happens to Lady Odessa, you can∠kiss that thick head of yours goodbye."},{"id":1006000073,"text":"Eep! Rose's tail, sugar leaves, pinch of rabbit..."},{"id":1006000074,"text":"Forgive me, Lady Odessa. Though completely unintentional,∠I nearly committed the gravest error of my life.∨If you'd like, I'll make this fool Ledon pay with his—"},{"id":1006000075,"text":"P-Please, Boss! I'm quite attached to my head!"},{"id":1006000076,"text":"Don't be silly. That said, I'll need to be more careful in∠the future.∨Flik tells me I'm too trusting of people. Maybe he's right."},{"id":1006000077,"text":"By way of apology, please stay the night here. I'll do my∠best to accommodate you."},{"id":1006000078,"text":"No more poisoned tea, you hear?"},{"id":1006000079,"text":"*mild snoring*"},{"id":1006000080,"text":"Zzz... Zzz..."},{"id":1006000081,"text":"*loud snoring*"},{"id":1006000082,"text":"*gentle breathing*"},{"id":1006000083,"text":"You also a member of the Liberation Army? ☆12No, you're not?∨Lady Odessa really is incredible. She's serious about∠overthrowing the Empire.∨Plenty of people are unhappy with how things are, but she's∠the only one doing something about it.∨I hate the Empire as well, and what've I got to show for it?∠I'm just a loathsome bandit. ☆11Lady Odessa's our only hope."},{"id":1006000084,"text":"Trust me, no more poisoned tea. I learned my lesson this∠time."},{"id":1006000085,"text":"Good morning, Young Master."},{"id":1006000086,"text":"You're up early, ♂㈱."},{"id":1006000087,"text":"........."},{"id":1006000088,"text":"Hey Gremio, why's Cleo in such a bad mood?"},{"id":1006000089,"text":"Leave her be, Viktor. She's not much of a morning person."},{"id":1006000090,"text":"Looks like everyone's here. Right, today we reach Sarady."},{"id":1006000091,"text":"Leaving so soon? Let me unlock the door."},{"id":1006000092,"text":"We're meant to meet with a messenger from the secret factory∠at an inn in this village.∨But I'm not sure where it is."},{"id":1006000093,"text":"It's a small village. We'll find it soon enough."},{"id":1006000094,"text":"This seems to be the inn. Let's get some lodgings while we∠wait for the messenger."},{"id":1006000095,"text":"Can't sleep, ♂㈱?∨Guess I'm not the only one.∨But on nights when I'm restless, I like to feel the night∠breeze.∨It soothes and calms me. ☆11∨Hey, ♂㈱. Mind if I tell you something?"},{"id":1006000096,"text":"What is it?∠"},{"id":1006000097,"text":"Kessler from Mt. Tigerwolf, ☆9Flik, Humphrey, Sanchez, ☆9∠they all have high hopes for me.∨But you know what? Sometimes I want to run away from it∠all. ☆9I'm afraid of not living up to their expectations.∨What do you plan to do now? ☆9Will you return to the Empire?"},{"id":1006000098,"text":"Of course.∠"},{"id":1006000099,"text":"I see.∨Then next time we meet, it may be as enemies.∨♂㈱, just as I am bound by my fate, so too are you∠bound by yours.∨But remember this. ☆9Even after you return to the Empire,∠you must see with your own eyes, think for yourself,∠and follow your heart.∨That's the most important thing."},{"id":1006000100,"text":"I don't know."},{"id":1006000101,"text":"Think about it. You're capable of choosing right from wrong.∨Your father is one of the great generals of the Empire.∠Perhaps you can return to a life of peace.∨But remember this. ☆10You can't ignore what you've seen, ☆9∠what you've felt.∨To do so would be a terrible sin..."},{"id":1006000102,"text":"I'm not interested."},{"id":1006000103,"text":"I see... ☆9Then let me ask you something.∨Do you still want to return to the Empire?"},{"id":1006000104,"text":"Of course I do.∠"},{"id":1006000105,"text":"Of course. Your father is Teo McDohl, a brave general of the∠Empire.∨My uncle, Leon Silverberg, also fought alongside the Emperor∠in the War of Succession seven years ago.∨Like you, I grew up among the nobility.∨I turned a blind eye to the injustice and discontent that∠permeates the Empire.∨But one day, I realized I was more than just a child of the ∠Silverberg family. I was Odessa, an independent woman.∨You must also live to be remembered as ♂㈱ ∠McDohl, rather than just the son of Teo. ∠☆9Don't forget who you are."},{"id":1006000107,"text":"Then why do you think Gremio and Cleo follow you?"},{"id":1006000108,"text":"Because my father ordered them to.∠"},{"id":1006000109,"text":"That's not true, ♂㈱. They follow you because∠they love you.∨No one risks their life simply to follow orders.∨Cleo and Gremio want to protect you. There's something∠about you that makes them feel this way.∨Don't forget that."},{"id":1006000110,"text":"I'm not sure."},{"id":1006000111,"text":"They follow you because they love you.∨No one risks their life simply to follow orders.∨Cleo and Gremio want to protect you. ☆9There's something∠about you that makes them feel this way.∨Don't forget that."},{"id":1006000112,"text":"☆1Who's there?!"},{"id":1006000113,"text":"My name is Kage. I come as an envoy of Sir Mose, who heads∠the secret factory."},{"id":1006000114,"text":"Mose certainly does keep strange company.∨How is he? I received a letter from him mentioning his∠pigeon was sick.∠I find it hard to picture Mose nursing a pigeon."},{"id":1006000115,"text":"Very hard indeed, especially as Sir Mose keeps no pigeons. "},{"id":1006000116,"text":"I'm sorry, but I had to test you."},{"id":1006000117,"text":"I would never betray a client while under contract."},{"id":1006000118,"text":"Here are the blueprints for the Fire Spear."},{"id":1006000119,"text":"Please deliver them safely. The Liberation Army's future∠depends on it."},{"id":1006000120,"text":"Understood. ☆9I shall take my leave of you now."},{"id":1006000121,"text":"It's getting late, ♂㈱. We'd best get some rest."},{"id":1006000122,"text":"What do you mean, you took care of business?"},{"id":1006000123,"text":"Heehee. Between the two of us last night. Didn't we,∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1006000124,"text":"Come to think of it, his bed was empty late last night."},{"id":1006000125,"text":"☆2Y-Y-Young M-Master, what were you up to? Something you∠can't tell me?"},{"id":1006000126,"text":"Come on, ♂㈱. Shall we?"},{"id":1006000127,"text":"☆2Y-Y-Young M-Master!"},{"id":1006000128,"text":"Let's go, Gremio."},{"id":1006000129,"text":"There's something mysterious about you.∨When you're around, I feel more compassionate.∨Viktor must've brought you because he saw that same quality.∨There are many in the Liberation Army. ☆9Humphrey, ☆9Sanchez,∠☆9Mose, ☆9and...Flik.∨But none of them have ☆9such captivating eyes...like you do.∠Eyes that draw people in. ☆10∨You know...if something were to happen to me..."},{"id":1006000130,"text":"You must be tired. Hurry back to your bed.∨I'm sorry for dragging you into this strange conversation."},{"id":1006000132,"text":"Welcome."},{"id":1006000133,"text":"Hello? Are you guests? It's been years since we had any.∠Lodging will be 50 potch each."},{"id":1006000135,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. I'm going in."},{"id":1006000136,"text":"Welp, guess I was mistaken. I got so excited for a second∠there..."},{"id":1006000137,"text":"Welcome, come on in. We don't get many guests here.∠I'll give you a bargain, 50 potch each."},{"id":1007000001,"text":"The Fortress of Kwaba is currently under strict lockdown.∠State your business or be refused entry."},{"id":1007000002,"text":"The Fortress of Kwaba and the Floating Fortress of∠Shasarazade are the Empire's last line of defense.∠So long as they stand, the imperial capital is safe."},{"id":1007000003,"text":"General Ain Gide is an old friend of General Teo's."},{"id":1007000004,"text":"When we arrived here, the Fortress of Kwaba was already∠a shell of its former self."},{"id":1007000005,"text":"There's only a handful of soldiers left in Gregminster.∠We're counting on you, Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1007000006,"text":"The Fortress of Kwaba. ☆9It's guarded by Lord Ain Gide, an old∠friend of Master Teo.∨He doesn't know us, but he'll certainly recognize your face."},{"id":1007000007,"text":"Will we get away with it? I guess it's up to luck to decide."},{"id":1007000008,"text":"Don't worry, we'll be fine. Now let's choose some fake∠names.∨We'll need to make sure our stories line up."},{"id":1007000009,"text":"I'll be Roi then."},{"id":1007000010,"text":"Right, I'll be Maria."},{"id":1007000011,"text":"Never pictured you as a Maria."},{"id":1007000012,"text":"What's that supposed to mean?"},{"id":1007000013,"text":"W-Well, I guess I'll call myself...∨Schtolteheim Reinbach III. ☆10How's that sound?"},{"id":1007000014,"text":"......"},{"id":1007000015,"text":"......∨And you, Young Master?"},{"id":1007000016,"text":"Masamune.∠"},{"id":1007000017,"text":"Piisuke.∠"},{"id":1007000018,"text":"Schtolteheim Reinbach IV."},{"id":1007000019,"text":"All right, let's go! Roi, Maria, Masamune!"},{"id":1007000020,"text":"All right, let's go! Roi, Maria, Piisuke!"},{"id":1007000021,"text":"All right, let's go! Roi, Maria, Schtolteheim Reinbach IV!"},{"id":1007000022,"text":"You there! I'm talking to you!"},{"id":1007000023,"text":"What me, sir? I'm just a poor seller of jujubes, with hungry∠mouths to feed back home..."},{"id":1007000024,"text":"Not you! That little runt there. You look like the∠♂㈱ McDohl kid on the wanted posters..."},{"id":1007000025,"text":"What's the matter here?"},{"id":1007000026,"text":"Sir. This boy bears a striking resemblance to the fugitive,∠♂㈱ McDohl."},{"id":1007000027,"text":"♂㈱... ☆9Young man. Show me your face."},{"id":1007000028,"text":"Uh-oh. If Lord Ain gets a good look at him..."},{"id":1007000029,"text":"You bastard! ☆9☆2I've had it with you! You've been nothing but∠trouble for us!∨And completely useless to boot! Now what? You're suspected∠of being some kinda fugitive?∠You can't even breathe without causing problems!∨Sir, if you find him suspicious, I'll be willing to lop his∠head off right here and now."},{"id":1007000030,"text":"H-Hold on now..."},{"id":1007000031,"text":"No, sir. I couldn't live with the guilt of having harbored a∠wanted man. ☆9∠Prepare to die, you scoundrel!"},{"id":1007000032,"text":"W-Wait, stop!"},{"id":1007000033,"text":"Hm. Think about it, Rosh.∨There's no way the son of Teo McDohl would be caught dead∠dressing like a beggar. ☆9You're all free to go."},{"id":1007000034,"text":"But, sir..."},{"id":1007000035,"text":"It's okay, Rosh. Let them through."},{"id":1007000036,"text":"Forgive me, Young Master. Even if my intention was to save∠us from danger, I took it too far...∨I am ready to accept any form of punishment. Even my death,∠if necessary..."},{"id":1007000037,"text":"Come on, Gremio. Quit being a drama queen. We got away.∠That's all that matters.∨♂㈱'s got a big heart. I'm sure he understands."},{"id":1007000038,"text":"I'll have your head for this!∠"},{"id":1007000039,"text":"Young Master, surely you understand Gremio did what he did∠to save us."},{"id":1007000040,"text":"Enough with the threats, ♂㈱. You're taking this∠joke a little too far."},{"id":1007000041,"text":"I understand. What I did was unforgivable. I hope you will∠accept my death as a—"},{"id":1007000042,"text":"Whoa, whoa! Calm down folks! Let's just all take a deep∠breath!∠∨Hey, ♂㈱, I get you're upset, but do me a favor∠and forgive Gremio."},{"id":1007000043,"text":"I understand, Gremio."},{"id":1007000044,"text":"Y-Young Master..."},{"id":1007000045,"text":"Hey. Do you know where Mathiu lives?"},{"id":1007000046,"text":"「"},{"id":1007000047,"text":"Master Mathiu? He's gone out for a walk."},{"id":1007000048,"text":"Yes, I'm Mathiu. What can I do for you?"},{"id":1007000049,"text":"We've come here to honor Odessa's final wish.∨She wanted us to give you this earring."},{"id":1007000050,"text":"Final wish? ☆9What...?∨I see... So she's dead.∨She was a good kid before she got mixed up in all that∠nonsense."},{"id":1007000051,"text":"All that nonsense? ☆9Hold on a minute. So you're saying∠everything Odessa stood for was nonsense?"},{"id":1007000052,"text":"Yes. She acted foolishly. I knew it would eventually come∠to this.∨I can't accept the earring. Now please leave."},{"id":1007000053,"text":"I have nothing to do with Odessa anymore. Please leave."},{"id":1007000054,"text":"What's his problem? A real piece of work, if ya ask me."},{"id":1007000055,"text":"I agree. But why did Odessa ask us to meet with him?"},{"id":1007000056,"text":"Hey! Outta the way!"},{"id":1007000057,"text":"Those imperial soldiers were headed toward Mathiu's house."},{"id":1007000058,"text":"Wonder what's going on."},{"id":1007000059,"text":"What're you doing? Release that child."},{"id":1007000060,"text":"Mathiu Silverberg. ☆9You are hereby ordered back into the∠service of the Imperial Army.∨The greatest military strategist of our time shouldn't be∠whiling away his days in some wretched backwater village.∠You're the hero of the Battle of Kalekka, for heaven's sake!"},{"id":1007000061,"text":"☆2I refuse! I've had enough of war and conflict.∨These days, I'm nothing but a powerless recluse."},{"id":1007000062,"text":"Ah, if only it were that simple. Unfortunately for you,∠these orders come from Lord Kasim Hazil himself. We're to∠bring you by force if necessary."},{"id":1007000063,"text":"As I said, I've no intention of returning to the Empire."},{"id":1007000064,"text":"Is that so? Well, keep being unreasonable, and we'll see∠what happens to the boy.∨Say, how about a trip to the Banner Mines? They work them∠hard down there. Who knows if he'll survive..."},{"id":1007000065,"text":"☆2I don't wanna go! Please, Master Mathiu! Help me!"},{"id":1007000066,"text":"L-Let him go. Right now."},{"id":1007000067,"text":"Things are looking grim. What should we do, Young Master?"},{"id":1007000068,"text":"Help them, of course."},{"id":1007000069,"text":"Now that's what I like to hear!"},{"id":1007000070,"text":"Oh boy, we're in trouble yet again. Serving you is one hell∠of a commitment, Young Master."},{"id":1007000071,"text":"Oh, come on, Cleo. You know you love it.∠Let's go, Young Master."},{"id":1007000072,"text":"Let's see how this plays out."},{"id":1007000073,"text":"Or how about you agree to come with us and I let the boy go.∠Your move. What'll it be?"},{"id":1007000074,"text":"Shut up!∠*chomp*"},{"id":1007000075,"text":"Y-You brat! How dare you! Arrest them all!"},{"id":1007000076,"text":"Uh-oh. It's go time, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1007000077,"text":"Not so fast. You're gonna have to go through us first."},{"id":1007000078,"text":"Who the hell are you?"},{"id":1007000079,"text":"Survivors of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1007000080,"text":"Just some champions of justice who happened by."},{"id":1007000081,"text":"Whoever they are, seize them!"},{"id":1007000082,"text":"How horrible. All this killing in front of children..."},{"id":1007000083,"text":"I know who you are. You're ♂㈱, son of General∠Teo McDohl.∨How do I know that? Well, I still have a few friends within∠the Imperial Army who keep me in the loop."},{"id":1007000084,"text":"Those imperial soldiers called you Mathiu Silverberg."},{"id":1007000085,"text":"That's right. ☆9Odessa... Odessa Silverberg was my sister."},{"id":1007000086,"text":"Then why did you say those things about her?"},{"id":1007000087,"text":"You see, ☆9I made a decision ☆9to never again involve myself in∠any form of warfare or conflict.∨But not Odessa. ☆9No, she chose to fight for her beliefs.∠Always had to put herself in the middle of it all.∨...What did she tell you about me?"},{"id":1007000088,"text":"That you were Mathiu, a man who lived in Seika..."},{"id":1007000089,"text":"I see. ☆9I guess she never did forgive me.∨Odessa once said that only a coward would have power and∠not use it.∨The truth is I am a coward. I chose to be one rather than∠witness anything so horrible ever again.∨Even if it meant being renounced by my own sister."},{"id":1007000090,"text":"What did you witness?"},{"id":1007000091,"text":"I watched people die because of my own actions. ☆9Both friend∠and foe alike.∨But today, I've realized that running away was wrong. ☆9∠Closing my eyes to the world doesn't make it disappear.∨From this day onward, I will strive for what Odessa fought∠for."},{"id":1007000092,"text":"Then will you accept the earring?"},{"id":1007000093,"text":"Earring? ☆9∠...No.∨♂㈱, you should hold onto it."},{"id":1007000094,"text":"Why?"},{"id":1007000095,"text":"Here, ☆9look at what's inside the earring.∨There's a small map inscribed that shows the locations of the∠Liberation Army's hideouts.∠In other words, this belongs to the leader of the Army."},{"id":1007000096,"text":"But Lady Odessa..."},{"id":1007000097,"text":"I think Odessa would've wanted you to have it."},{"id":1007000098,"text":"I'm a skilled military strategist, but I'm no leader.∨I've seen you, ♂㈱. You have what it takes. ☆9Odessa∠must have thought so as well. ☆9That's why she sent you to me.∨Please, ♂㈱. Accept this earring, ☆9and take on∠Odessa's legacy ☆9as leader of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1007000099,"text":"I can't do it."},{"id":1007000100,"text":"I see. It's not an easy decision.∨Take some time to think about it, and come back with∠your answer."},{"id":1007000101,"text":"♂㈱, have you reached a decision? ∠Will you carry on Odessa's legacy?"},{"id":1007000102,"text":"I'll do it."},{"id":1007000103,"text":"Thank you, ♂㈱. ☆9Wait. From this time on, you are∠the leader of the Liberation Army.∨So I will address you as Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1007000104,"text":"Gremio, Cleo, what about the two of you? There's no going∠back to the Empire for either of you now."},{"id":1007000105,"text":"Whatever path you take, I'll follow, Young Master. I'm sure∠Master Teo will understand."},{"id":1007000106,"text":"Me too. I've just about had it with corrupt imperial∠soldiers."},{"id":1007000107,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, as your military strategist, allow∠me to offer you my first piece of advice.∨To revive the Liberation Army, you must recruit people. ☆9∠Those who are dissatisfied with the Empire.∨And to recruit people, you will need a headquarters."},{"id":1007000108,"text":"True. Our base at Lenankamp got burnt out too."},{"id":1007000109,"text":"No, I mean something much larger. A place that can∠withstand an assault by the Imperial Army.∨There's an abandoned castle in the middle of Lake Toran.∨I believe it will serve our purpose, if we can acquire it.∠I suggest you make your way to Kaku. It's a town on the∠shores of Lake Toran."},{"id":1007000110,"text":"You're not coming with us, Mathiu?"},{"id":1007000111,"text":"I must prepare for the move.∨And I'll need to give the children a year's worth∠of homework."},{"id":1007000112,"text":""},{"id":1007000113,"text":""},{"id":1007000114,"text":"has joined the Liberation Army!"},{"id":1007000115,"text":"Hey, kid. ☆10Take good care of your father."},{"id":1007000116,"text":"Hey there, my name's Chandler. I'm just a carefree peddler.∠East, west, I go wherever there's money to be made.∨I hope to have my own store someday."},{"id":1007000117,"text":"Hey there, my name's Chandler. I'm just a carefree peddler.∨Liberation Army? Nice, nice. You came to the right guy.∠I've got all the medicine and antitoxins you need."},{"id":1007000118,"text":"Recruit.∠Don't recruit."},{"id":1007000119,"text":"All right! Let's go check out this Liberation Army castle."},{"id":1007000120,"text":"Your loss. I'm a real useful guy to have around."},{"id":1007000121,"text":"has joined the party!"},{"id":1007000122,"text":"has joined your group!"},{"id":1007000123,"text":"has left the party!"},{"id":1007000124,"text":"Get on the boat."},{"id":1007000125,"text":"∠Don't get on the boat."},{"id":1007000126,"text":"Do it."},{"id":1007000127,"text":"∠Don't do it."},{"id":1007000128,"text":"It's locked!"},{"id":1008000097,"text":""},{"id":1008000098,"text":""},{"id":1008000099,"text":""},{"id":1010000001,"text":"It's my fault everyone was poisoned, Black. That dark figure∠I missed must've been behind it.∨That's why I gotta be the one to save them. You'll help me,∠won't you?"},{"id":1010000002,"text":"*roars*"},{"id":1010000003,"text":"All right, Black. Let's hurry!"},{"id":1010000004,"text":"All right, Black. Wait here. I'll be back in no time."},{"id":1010000005,"text":"Damn it, there's so many I can't tell which one's a∠Black Dragon Orchid.∨This one here looks the most similar to what that old man∠Liukan described."},{"id":1010000006,"text":"Indeed, that is a Black Dragon Orchid."},{"id":1010000007,"text":"Wh-Who are you?"},{"id":1010000008,"text":"I should ask you the same question, young man. Surely you∠must know that this is the Imperial Garden."},{"id":1010000009,"text":"Y-You're th-the Emperor."},{"id":1010000010,"text":"Never thought I'd encounter a flower thief while enjoying∠the breeze on a sleepless night. Judging by your outfit,∠you must be a Dragon Knight."},{"id":1010000011,"text":"Y-Yes, Your Majesty. I-I'm Futch, a Ninth Rank Dragon∠Knight."},{"id":1010000012,"text":"An apprentice Dragon Knight, eh? And what brings you here?"},{"id":1010000013,"text":"I-I came to p-pick a Black Dragon Orchid, Your Majesty.∠Pl-Please, let me go.∨I-I really need this orchid to wake up∠the dragons."},{"id":1010000014,"text":"Dragons? This must be Windy's doing again.∨Young man, leave this∠place immediately."},{"id":1010000015,"text":"Y-You're letting me go?"},{"id":1010000016,"text":"Hurry, while I'm still feeling generous."},{"id":1010000017,"text":"Y-Yes, Your Majesty."},{"id":1010000018,"text":"Whew! W-Was that really the Emperor?∨It must've been, judging by the way he carried himself.∠But he did seem different from the rumors. He even∠let me go...∨Anyway, we'd better hurry back now that I've got a∠Black Dragon Orchid. Right, Black?"},{"id":1010000019,"text":"*roars*"},{"id":1010000020,"text":"Ah, I'm just in time."},{"id":1010000021,"text":"Who the hell are you?! I already got a Black Dragon Orchid.∠Smell ya later!"},{"id":1010000022,"text":"What an insolent boy. I can see you need to be punished."},{"id":1010000023,"text":"*screams*"},{"id":1010000024,"text":"*roars*"},{"id":1010000025,"text":"If I go any further, someone might spot me."},{"id":1010000026,"text":"Futch.∨Futch.∨Come on, Futch.∨Wake up!"},{"id":1010000027,"text":"I should hurry up and get back to Black."},{"id":1011000001,"text":"Hey kid, did you see that? General Teo just passed by.∠Only in the imperial capital would you see that happen.∨What? You're the son of General Teo?∨Seriously?!"},{"id":1011000002,"text":"Young man, aren't you the son of General Teo? What?∠You're working for the Imperial Guard?!∠Guess the apple doesn't fall far from the tree."},{"id":1011000003,"text":"How are you, Young Master ♂㈱? Have you gotten∠used to serving in the Imperial Guard?"},{"id":1011000004,"text":"Take a look at this. See right there on my cloak? I got∠General Teo to sign it for me."},{"id":1011000005,"text":"That old creep Kraze ​keeps undressing me with his eyes!∠His pudgy second-in-command grosses me out too."},{"id":1011000006,"text":"I had high hopes when I heard a Dragon Knight was coming,∠but it's just some little punk.∨Talk about a disappointment."},{"id":1011000007,"text":"Quit staring, hayseed. Never seen a dragon like this before?"},{"id":1011000008,"text":"What did you call me?!"},{"id":1011000009,"text":"Calm down now. Let's hurry to Commander Kraze's office."},{"id":1011000010,"text":"I hear General Teo is moving to quash the rebels.∠Liberation Army? Give me a break. They're nothing but a∠bunch of rabble-rousers.∨I'll take 'em out myself one of these days.∠Ha ha ha ha ha ha!"},{"id":1011000011,"text":"I hear Lady Leknaat, who lives on the Magician's Island,∠is just as beautiful as Lady Windy.∨How is it fair that two of the most gorgeous women just∠happen to be sisters?"},{"id":1011000012,"text":"If Lady Windy and Lady Leknaat are sisters, then why don't∠they live together?∨Could it be that they don't get along?"},{"id":1011000013,"text":"Can you believe it? I just got covered in mud at the∠stables. It's awful.∠Where're the stables? They're just up ahead."},{"id":1011000014,"text":"Hm? What's the matter? You'd better hurry up and deliver∠those Astral Predications to Kraze."},{"id":1011000015,"text":"*roars*"},{"id":1011000016,"text":"Where'd you sneak in from? This is the office of Lord Kraze,∠Commander of the Imperial Guard!"},{"id":1011000017,"text":"Well, if it isn't General Teo's son! How you've grown!"},{"id":1011000018,"text":"What're you doing here, Young Master? You'd better go see∠Commander Kraze immediately."},{"id":1011000019,"text":"You're headed to Rockland next? Oh boy, that's tough.∨Rockland lies east of Gregminster in the middle of nowhere.∨But it's all for the good of the Empire. Safe travels."},{"id":1011000020,"text":"Hahaha! Take a look at my shiny boots! I've dreamed of∠joining the Imperial Guard ever since I was a boy."},{"id":1011000021,"text":"They let a little snot like you become a member of the∠Imperial Guard? What's the world come to?"},{"id":1011000022,"text":"Buzz off! Don't think you're special just 'cause you're the∠son of a Great General!"},{"id":1011000023,"text":"Where'd you appear from, boy? The audience hall is upstairs∠and Commander Kraze's office is next door."},{"id":1011000024,"text":"I see. So you're the son of that Great General Teo, huh?∠Well, good luck."},{"id":1011000025,"text":"So how did it go? It was an easy job, so I'm sure you∠pulled it off."},{"id":1011000026,"text":"Ah, Young Master ♂㈱. Have you finished your∠audience with the Emperor?"},{"id":1011000027,"text":"Master ♂㈱, your father will be worried if you∠wander around too much."},{"id":1011000028,"text":"How wonderful it is to serve under the Golden Emperor∠Barbarossa. It must be like a dream come true."},{"id":1011000029,"text":"You hear stories, but seeing it all for yourself is∠completely different. Besides, the Imperial Guards tend∠to talk things up a lot."},{"id":1011000030,"text":"The new Court Magician, Lady Windy, bears quite a striking∠resemblance to the late Lady Claudia."},{"id":1011000031,"text":"The Emperor appears to be very fond of Lady Windy.∠How I envy her!"},{"id":1011000032,"text":"I hear there's trouble up north. But with General Teo∠on his way, there's nothing to worry about."},{"id":1011000033,"text":"There's talk of some rebel group called the Liberation Army∠who actively oppose the Empire. A complete waste of time,∠if you ask me."},{"id":1011000034,"text":"If you wish to speak with Commander Kraze, stand∠respectfully in front of his desk when addressing him.∨Do you understand? Hmph."},{"id":1011000035,"text":"Starting with General Teo, the Five Great Generals have been∠departing the imperial capital one after another...∠Something smells fishy."},{"id":1011000036,"text":"Didn't I tell you to show up first thing in the morning?∠Or are you deaf as well as dumb?"},{"id":1011000037,"text":"∠     Shiny Armor"},{"id":1011000038,"text":"∠     Shiny Armor☆13∨∠Hmm? ☆13∨∠    You found 100 potch!"},{"id":1011000039,"text":"Who're they supposed to be? Bandits of Mt. Seifu?∨☆2Never heard of them! Just hand them over to Grady,∠the military commander of Rockland. Don't bother me with∠these trivialities!"},{"id":1011000040,"text":"What's wrong, ♂㈱? Are you nervous? ∠☆9Don't worry, the audience will be over before you know it.∨Just be yourself. The Emperor is stern, but there's no need∠to be afraid."},{"id":1011000041,"text":"So you're Teo's son ♂㈱, eh? Let me see your face.∨Hm...∨Hahahaha! A real noble countenance you've got, just like∠your old man. You'll be a big deal too. I guarantee it—or my ∠name isn't Kasim Hazil."},{"id":1011000042,"text":"Sure you want to be wandering about here? Don't you have an∠audience with the Emperor?"},{"id":1011000043,"text":"Well, if it isn't Teo. Looks like you've brought up a fine∠young man. I'm envious!"},{"id":1011000044,"text":"You're embarrassing me, Kasim."},{"id":1011000045,"text":"Still not my turn? How long do they plan on making the∠Great General Kasim Hazil wait?!"},{"id":1011000046,"text":"Y-You must be General Teo's son...err... So sorry, it's∠my nerves. I'm new to the job."},{"id":1011000047,"text":"Your audience with His Majesty is over. Please take∠your leaf...∨Err, um, I mean \"leave.\" Could you please leave? Whew!∠Somehow managed to save that one."},{"id":1011000048,"text":"Master ♂㈱, could you please wait in the∠antechamber for a while longer?"},{"id":1011000049,"text":"Your audience with the Emperor is over. Please take your∠leave."},{"id":1011000050,"text":"Master ♂㈱, there is still some time before your∠audience.∨Please wait here with your father."},{"id":1011000051,"text":"Why, Master ♂㈱. Did Lady Windy attend the∠audience as well?∨I've heard she bears a striking resemblance to the late∠Empress Claudia. It seems the Emperor has still not∠recovered from his loss..."},{"id":1011000052,"text":"Master Teo, ☆9Master ♂㈱. ☆9The Emperor is ready to∠receive you. This way, please."},{"id":1011000053,"text":"Announcing Teo McDohl, General of the Imperial Army, ☆10∠and his son, ♂㈱ McDohl. ☆14∨They have arrived for their audience with His Majesty,∠the Emperor."},{"id":1011000054,"text":"Welcome, Teo. How have you been of late?"},{"id":1011000055,"text":"Much as I was when I fought alongside you in the War of∠Succession, Your Majesty."},{"id":1011000056,"text":"That is most reassuring to hear. Wouldn't you agree, Windy?"},{"id":1011000057,"text":"Indeed. Words worthy of a Great General."},{"id":1011000058,"text":"Teo, I'm sure you've heard of the troubling developments∠up north. Will you travel there and secure the border?"},{"id":1011000059,"text":"Our conflict with the City-States of Jowston won't be easily∠resolved, but with General Teo McDohl on the job, we can∠rest easy."},{"id":1011000060,"text":"My beloved sword, Prakk, has brought me luck and protected∠me on many occasions. I wish for you to have it. Take it with∠you."},{"id":1011000061,"text":"Thank you, Your Majesty. I will do my utmost to live up to∠your expectations."},{"id":1011000062,"text":"I'm sure you will. Safe travels, Teo."},{"id":1011000063,"text":"You're a fine man, ☆9just like your father. I look forward to∠seeing you grow."},{"id":1011000064,"text":"Hahahaha, you truly are Teo's boy. ☆9Listen, ♂㈱.∨You are free to follow your own path. But for now, you still∠have much to learn serving under me. There'll be plenty of∠time to make your own choices in the future."},{"id":1011000065,"text":"Thank you for your kind words, Your Majesty."},{"id":1011000066,"text":"Master ♂㈱, you will serve under the command of∠Lord Kraze, Commander of the Imperial Guard."},{"id":1011000067,"text":"My, my. What a handsome young man you are. ∠I wish you luck, Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1011000068,"text":"We humbly take our leave, Your Majesty."},{"id":1011000069,"text":"I'm counting on you, Teo. As for you, ♂㈱, I expect∠great things from you. Perhaps one day you will even∠surpass your father."},{"id":1011000070,"text":"This is Kraze's office. You'll be reporting to him from∠tomorrow. Go in and pay him your respects."},{"id":1011000071,"text":"Don't worry. I'll be here waiting for you."},{"id":1011000072,"text":"Hmph. So you're Teo's boy? What's your name?∨♂㈱, huh?∨You may be the son of a Great General, but you'll get no∠special treatment from me, understood?∨Now go on home. Your first assignment starts tomorrow.∠Be here first thing in the morning."},{"id":1011000073,"text":"Still here? Didn't you hear me? I told you to go on home.∨Hmph. Your first assignment starts tomorrow. Don't be late!∠Understood?"},{"id":1011000074,"text":"Did you speak to him? To be honest, I'm surprised you were∠assigned to such a coward...∨Anyway, let's head home. Gremio must be worried sick."},{"id":1011000075,"text":"I will, Your Majesty.∠Not if I can help it."},{"id":1011000076,"text":"Have you paid your respects to Kraze?"},{"id":1011000077,"text":"So you must be Teo's boy, ♂㈱. ☆10Quite the noble∠visage you've got, young man.∨Listen, ♂㈱. Will you lend your strength to the∠Empire while your father is away protecting the north?"},{"id":1011000078,"text":"Come on, let's go home."},{"id":1011000132,"text":"I am an astrologer. My duty is to read the future through∠the stars.∨However, the future is not set in stone. ☆9All I can∠observe is the grand flow of things.∨♂㈱, you shoulder a heavy burden within the∠sweeping flow of time.∨You may be called upon to make painful choices and∠experience unmeasurable sorrow.∨I cannot say what fate ultimately awaits you.∨But know this... Your destiny is always in your own hands.∨Never forget that. You must choose what is right. ☆9Do you∠understand?"},{"id":1011000168,"text":"For some reason, this town hasn't shown up to pay its annual∠taxes."},{"id":1011076001,"text":"Sir Yuber, the Liberation Army is approaching."},{"id":1011076002,"text":"Liberation Army? Pfft...heehee... Bwahahaha!∨Against the might of our 100,000 troops, their pathetic band∠of rebels can hardly be called an army."},{"id":1011076003,"text":"Master ♂㈱, we've spotted the enemy army. ∠Th-They n-number about 100,000-strong."},{"id":1011076004,"text":"100,000?! That's impossible!"},{"id":1011076005,"text":"Most of that number must be monsters conjured by my sister.∨I will send them back to the underworld."},{"id":1011076006,"text":"O Gate Rune, return those summoned by thy kin to whence∠they came!"},{"id":1011076007,"text":"Sir Yuber! The monsters... They're vanishing!"},{"id":1011076008,"text":"What?! They must have Lady Windy's sister with them.∨Not to worry. She stands no chance against Lady Windy's∠magic on her own."},{"id":1011076009,"text":"I-It's no use. I'm not strong enough...to defeat my sister."},{"id":1011076010,"text":"I can use the Soul Eater—∠"},{"id":1011076011,"text":"You mustn't. You must never use that rune's power."},{"id":1011076012,"text":"But then...what do we do?"},{"id":1011076013,"text":"Inheritor of the Gate Rune, I will lend you my power."},{"id":1011076014,"text":"O Dragon Rune, grant her your inhuman power, your power∠that rends the heavens."},{"id":1011076015,"text":"S-Sir Yuber!"},{"id":1011076016,"text":"Have no fear. Even without the monsters, we still have the∠advantage.∨All troops, advance!"},{"id":1011076017,"text":"Tsk. This is it. The end of this Empire. Ah well, I have∠no regrets."},{"id":1011076018,"text":"Hah. Commander ♂㈱, looks like we're just in ∠time."},{"id":1011076019,"text":"I am Hanzo, head of the Rokkaku ninja. We've been hiding∠out in the fields waiting for this moment to arrive."},{"id":1011076020,"text":"Chief Hanzo! You're alive!"},{"id":1011076021,"text":"As you can see. But I had to keep it a secret. Forgive me."},{"id":1011076022,"text":"No, don't apologize..."},{"id":1011076023,"text":"By the way, ♂㈱, I don't see Kasumi with you...∨...Ah, so that's the way of it. Such is the fate of we∠ninja."},{"id":1011076024,"text":"You've come a long way, Commander ♂㈱.∨We of the Warriors' Village are here to stand with you.∠It's been a magnificent battle.∨The likes of which we have not seen for a long time. If only∠our father, Clift the Crusader, was here..."},{"id":1011076025,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, we don't have time to listen to this old∠geezer prattle on for hours.∨We gotta storm Gregminster!"},{"id":1013000063,"text":"Look at us, ♂㈱, back in Gregminster.∨And under very different circumstances from when we∠escaped.∨Now then, all that's left is to bring down Barbarossa.∠Time to take the palace, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1013000064,"text":"♂㈱, I mean Commander, take me with you.∨I want to avenge Odessa with my own hands. Please."},{"id":1013000065,"text":"Please be careful, Commander ♂㈱. We may have∠defeated the Imperial Army, but the Emperor himself is∠a formidable foe... *cough*"},{"id":1013000066,"text":"Sir Mathiu! You mustn't strain yourself. Being outside will∠only worsen your injuries."},{"id":1013000067,"text":"Please, ♂㈱, finish what my sister...what Odessa∠started."},{"id":1013000068,"text":"It's been a long time, Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1013000069,"text":"You... I remember now.∨You let us go at Kwaba Fortress, despite our piss-poor∠acting."},{"id":1013000070,"text":"Indeed. Your name was Schtolteheim Reinbach III, if I∠recall correctly."},{"id":1013000071,"text":"So? What do you want? We need you to step aside."},{"id":1013000072,"text":"I'm afraid I can't. I'm an imperial general after all."},{"id":1013000073,"text":"Don't you get it? The Imperial Army is finished!∠Stand aside. I'd hate to kill someone I owe a debt to."},{"id":1013000074,"text":"If the Imperial Army has fallen, so be it. I will not betray∠Emperor Barbarossa.∨I, Ain Gide, swore an oath of loyalty. If I were to betray him,∠who would he have left?∨Now, Master ♂㈱. If you wish to go any further, ∠you must do so over my dead body!"},{"id":1013000075,"text":"My Emperor... I'll go on ahead..."},{"id":1013000076,"text":"Fool... You had it all wrong."},{"id":1013000077,"text":"Yeah, he died for the wrong cause.∨But just as some things are worthless even if they're right,∠maybe some things can be worthwhile even if they're wrong."},{"id":1013000078,"text":"Well, well, ♂㈱, commander of the Liberation∠Army. You've come so far.∨Come look at my garden. The flowers are in full bloom.∠Beautiful, is it not? And yet it is all that remains of my∠Empire.∨♂㈱, ∠with my own hands, I will protect this garden. ∠I will defend the last piece of my Empire to the very end. ∠Dragon King Sword, give me your strength!"},{"id":1013000079,"text":"Grraaaaaagh!"},{"id":1013000080,"text":"Your Majesty!"},{"id":1013000081,"text":"Ah, Kasim..."},{"id":1013000082,"text":"You've changed, Your Majesty. Why? We believed in you..."},{"id":1013000083,"text":"Kasim, I miss the days we fought together side by side."},{"id":1013000084,"text":"You were misled by that woman... That Windy..."},{"id":1013000085,"text":"Barbarossa! Oh my, you've already lost?"},{"id":1013000086,"text":"How dare you insult the Emperor!"},{"id":1013000087,"text":"Oh, don't be silly."},{"id":1013000088,"text":"Y-Your Majesty..."},{"id":1013000089,"text":"Hahaha hahahaha! Now it's your turn, ♂㈱.∠The Empire has fallen.∨But your Soul Eater is still mine! Give it to me now!"},{"id":1013000090,"text":"Wh-Why do you spurn me, Soul Eater? You control life and∠death, devour souls.∨Don't you see we are meant for each other? Together, we can∠take our revenge on this wretched world.∨And yet you reject me! You, the most cursed of runes.∨Even you refuse to accept me!"},{"id":1013000091,"text":"Stop. That's enough, Windy."},{"id":1013000092,"text":"What are you doing? I'll destroy you with my magic!"},{"id":1013000093,"text":"It's no use, Windy. The Sovereign Rune on my Dragon King∠Sword wards off any form of magic.∨Even that of the Gate Rune."},{"id":1013000094,"text":"B-But you said the Black Rune..."},{"id":1013000095,"text":"I lied."},{"id":1013000096,"text":"Wh-What're you doing, Barbarossa?"},{"id":1013000097,"text":"I loved you."},{"id":1013000098,"text":"Liar. You only loved the part of me that reminded you of∠her!"},{"id":1013000099,"text":"That's not true. I wanted to erase the sorrow that lies∠deep within your eyes.∨The sorrow of one shunned by others. I loved you.∠But that was a mistake.∨My one and only mistake. And it cannot be forgiven."},{"id":1013000100,"text":"Please... Please don't do this to me, Barbarossa."},{"id":1013000101,"text":"I have only myself to blame for the loss of my Empire.∨♂㈱, what brave new world will you build in its∠stead?"},{"id":1013000102,"text":"Emperor Barbarossa!"},{"id":1013000103,"text":"Please, Emperor!"},{"id":1013000104,"text":"Your Majesty!"},{"id":1013000105,"text":"Farewell!"},{"id":1013000106,"text":"It's the end of the Emperor."},{"id":1013000107,"text":"Yes, and the end of the Empire."},{"id":1013000108,"text":"This palace ain't gonna hold much longer. We'd better∠escape."},{"id":1013000109,"text":"It's those Liberation Army dogs! Don't let them out of here∠alive!"},{"id":1013000110,"text":"♂㈱, I'll hold 'em off. You go on ahead."},{"id":1013000111,"text":"Don't be ridiculous, Viktor.∠"},{"id":1013000112,"text":"This country still needs you, ♂㈱.∨As for me, whatever rises from the ashes of the Empire,∠I won't be much use to it once the fightin's done.∨Look, it'll be fine. Don't worry. I'll be right behind you.∠Flik! Take care of ♂㈱!"},{"id":1013000113,"text":"Don't take too long."},{"id":1013000114,"text":"Who do ya think I am? I'm Viktor the Victorious! I'll be∠right behind ya, so don't you worry."},{"id":1013000115,"text":"Let's go, Commander. He's doing it for all of us."},{"id":1013000116,"text":"Now then, boys, step on up if you're ready to die!∠You'll have to rip the heart from my chest before I stop∠fightin'!"},{"id":1013000117,"text":"Careful, you fool!"},{"id":1013000118,"text":"♂㈱, Odessa chose you... She chose you to rebuild∠this country.∨No way I'm letting you get killed here. I'd never hear the end of ∠it when I see her in the afterlife...∨Go, ♂㈱... Finish what we've sought for so long...∠What Odessa fought and died for... Hurry, go..."},{"id":1013000119,"text":"I can't leave you here.∠"},{"id":1013000120,"text":"Don't worry. Viktor and I...will be right behind you..."},{"id":1013000121,"text":"Go now, or I swear I'll cut my own throat!"},{"id":1013000122,"text":"Go, ♂㈱! Don't let Odessa down."},{"id":1013000123,"text":"Don't you die here, Flik."},{"id":1013000124,"text":"It's a little early for me to see Odessa again.∨Our reunion can wait until I prove my worth."},{"id":1013000125,"text":"Where's ♂㈱?"},{"id":1013000126,"text":"He went on ahead."},{"id":1013000127,"text":"Now we can fight to our hearts' content."},{"id":1013000128,"text":"Yeah, too bad it's you I'm fighting alongside."},{"id":1013000129,"text":"♂㈱ fled this way! We must avenge the Emperor!"},{"id":1013000130,"text":"Let's go, Celestial Sword!"},{"id":1013000131,"text":"Jeez. Work me to death, why don't you."},{"id":1013000132,"text":"I swear on my sword, Odessa, you shall not pass!"},{"id":1013000133,"text":"Look! We won! I can't believe it. We won!"},{"id":1013000134,"text":"Yes, the Empire has finally met its end."},{"id":1013000135,"text":"We did it, we really did it, Sylvina."},{"id":1013000136,"text":"Kirkis!"},{"id":1013000137,"text":"It's finally over, Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1013000138,"text":"Our Empire has fallen..."},{"id":1013000139,"text":"L-Look, Tengaar! We won! We defeated the Empire!"},{"id":1013000140,"text":"O-Ow! Ow! Quit pulling me so hard!"},{"id":1013000141,"text":"O-Oh, s-sorry."},{"id":1013000142,"text":"Guess that means Black has been avenged..."},{"id":1013000143,"text":"...It's over."},{"id":1013000144,"text":"Hey, old man! Glad you got to be a part of all this before∠kicking the bucket?!"},{"id":1013000145,"text":"Quit calling me \"old man\"!"},{"id":1013000146,"text":"Master Liukan, those voices... Have we won?"},{"id":1013000147,"text":"Yes, that's right."},{"id":1013000148,"text":"I see...∨Master Liukan, I've long despised war.∨I always felt it wrong to take the life of another, no∠matter the reason.∨Yet as a military strategist, I've been responsible for∠the loss of countless lives. I wonder if I made the right∠choice...∨Perhaps I should have stayed in that village, whiling away∠the years fishing..."},{"id":1013000149,"text":"Well, Sir Mathiu...the answer to that question..."},{"id":1013000150,"text":"Have you fallen asleep, Sir Mathiu? Rest in peace, my friend.∨You accomplished so very much..."},{"id":1013000151,"text":"Well, well, ♂㈱, commander of the Liberation ∠Army. You've come so far."},{"id":1013000152,"text":"Come look at my garden. The flowers are in full bloom.∠Beautiful, is it not? And yet it is all that remains of my∠Empire."},{"id":1013000153,"text":"♂㈱.∨With my own hands, I will protect this garden.∠I will defend the last piece of my Empire to the bitter end."},{"id":1013000154,"text":"Dragon King Sword, give me your strength!"},{"id":1013000156,"text":"Let's go! ♂㈱! You must live! You must finish what∠Odessa started!"},{"id":1013000157,"text":"So much for the \"Golden Emperor.\""},{"id":1014000001,"text":"We'll be right behind you."},{"id":1014000002,"text":"Your Majesty..."},{"id":1014000003,"text":"Emperor Barbarossa..."},{"id":1014000004,"text":"Run. This place won't last much longer."},{"id":1014000060,"text":"♂㈱, Odessa chose you... ∠She chose you to rebuild this country.∨No way I'm letting you get killed here. I'd never hear the end ∠of it when I see her in the afterlife..∨Go, ♂㈱... ∠Finish what we've waited for for so long...∠What Odessa fought and died for... Hurry, go..."},{"id":1027000030,"text":"Guess children grow up even without their parents' help.∠With my kid, it's all \"Master Mathiu this, Master Mathiu∠that\" now. Never listens to me anymore."},{"id":1027000031,"text":"That up there is Master Mathiu's house. Used to be some∠important fella, from what I've heard. Now he runs a∠school for children."},{"id":1027000032,"text":"Wonder where Master Mathiu ran off to. Such a shame. ∠He was a great teacher. My kid sure does miss him."},{"id":1027000033,"text":"Heard the Imperials attacked the Liberation Army's hideout.∠But at least it seems Odessa's safe. As long as she's fine,∠we're fine."},{"id":1027000034,"text":"Master Mathiu? He's gone out for a walk."},{"id":1027000035,"text":"I wish Master Mathiu would come back. Do you think he will∠once I finish all my homework?"},{"id":1027000036,"text":"Wanna hear a secret? Oh, but you can't tell anyone, okay? ☆9∠I've decided I'm gonna marry Master Mathiu."},{"id":1027000037,"text":"I like Master Mathiu, but he gives us so much homework."},{"id":1027000038,"text":"Master Mathiu looked sooo scary that day..."},{"id":1027000039,"text":"    Weekly Motto∨∠  \"Let's be good to our mothers and fathers.\""},{"id":1027000040,"text":"Master Mathiuuu, I finished all my homework! Please come∠back nooow!"},{"id":1027000041,"text":"I wish Master Mathiu would hurry up and come home...∠I was gonna marry him..."},{"id":1027000042,"text":"To get to the castle on Lake Toran, I suggest you make∠your way to Kaku."},{"id":1027000043,"text":"Whaaat? You, leader of the Liberation Army?∠You sure you aren't pullin' my leg?"},{"id":1027000044,"text":"I found a sealing orb, but it's damaged. What're the odds!∠Here I was thinking I'd also be able to use magic..."},{"id":1027000045,"text":"My hobby is fishing. I often visit Kaku to go fish there.∠It's a little ways southwest from here."},{"id":1027000046,"text":"Huh? Who're you? What'd you want? You friends with that ∠rich brat Sheena too? He's been pestering me a lot lately."},{"id":1027000048,"text":"It's the house just up those steps."},{"id":1027000054,"text":"Yes. She acted foolishly. I knew it would eventually come∠to this.∨I can't accept the earring. Now please leave."},{"id":1027000055,"text":"Odessa and I have nothing to do with each other anymore.∠Please leave."},{"id":1027000056,"text":"What's his problem? A real piece of work, if you ask me."},{"id":1027000060,"text":"What's going on? I'm curious."},{"id":1027000063,"text":"☆2I refuse! ☆4I've had enough of war and conflict.∨These days, I'm nothing but a powerless recluse."},{"id":1027000070,"text":"Help them, of course.∠"},{"id":1027000081,"text":"Survivors of the Liberation Army.∠"},{"id":1027000083,"text":"What?! ☆10Are you trying to interfere? ☆2Looks like we're∠dealing with rebels! Seize them!"},{"id":1027000088,"text":"Then why did you say those things about her?"},{"id":1027000096,"text":"Why?∠"},{"id":1027000101,"text":"I can't do it.∠"},{"id":1027000105,"text":"Thank you, ♂㈱. ☆9Wait. From this moment on, ∠you are the leader of the Liberation Army.∨So I will address you as Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1027000110,"text":"True. This is the item store."},{"id":1027000119,"text":"Welcome to the rune store."},{"id":1027000120,"text":"This is an inn. It'll be 100 potch a night per person."},{"id":1027000122,"text":"You bastard! Tried to fool us, did you? You're Mathiu!"},{"id":1027000123,"text":"Well, well, if it isn't ♂㈱. Glad to see you're∠safe.∨Me? Well, they found out I was hiding you.∨Don't worry, I'm fine now. I'm no fighter, but I do know∠how to make a mean soup.∨Your battle-weary warriors would be kept well-fed.∠How about it, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1027000125,"text":"Well well, if it isn't ♂㈱. Glad to see you're∠safe.∨Me? Well, they found out I was hiding you.∨What've you been up to?∠What? You joined the Liberation Army? And have your own∠castle now?∨Then hey, let me join you. I'm no fighter, but I do know∠how to make a mean soup.∨Your battle-weary warriors would be kept well-fed.∠How about it, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1027000127,"text":"Great, I'll bring my stuff over right away."},{"id":1027000128,"text":"I see. That's too bad. Come see me if you change your mind."},{"id":1027000129,"text":"Hey, did you hear the rumors? Keep this between you and me.∨Apparently, Odessa, the leader of the Liberation Army, has∠gone missing."},{"id":1027000130,"text":"Hey, you! That's right. I'm talking to you. Aren't you the∠new leader of the Liberation Army?∨Nothing gets past Ol' Onil here. I also happen to know the∠Liberation Army is short on people.∨Well then, how 'bout I lend you a hand?"},{"id":1027000131,"text":"Recruit.∠Don't recruit."},{"id":1027000132,"text":"That's the spirit. I'll be getting myself right on over to∠♂① Castle then. Don't worry, I already know∠where it is."},{"id":1027000133,"text":"I see... Well, maybe you'll change your mind."},{"id":1027000134,"text":"Cooking is my lifelong passion, but I've yet to own my own∠restaurant.∨I wish there were somewhere I could put my culinary skills∠to good use."},{"id":1027000135,"text":"Ah, I see Madame Marie has joined the Liberation Army.∨Now that's someone I'd be happy to work with.∨Commander ♂㈱, how about I join your army, ∠too? Fighting isn't the only important skill, you know."},{"id":1027000136,"text":"Thank you so much. I'll cook up exquisite meals that make∠your mouth water."},{"id":1027000137,"text":"Oh, that's too bad. Do you not trust my culinary skills?"},{"id":1027000138,"text":"It's you. You're the one who took Master Mathiu.∠Don't try to hide it.∨Master Mathiu said he'd never get involved in another war,∠but you just had to drag him back. Why?!"},{"id":1027000139,"text":"It was Mathiu's choice.∠This isn't just any ordinary war.∠......"},{"id":1027000140,"text":"Liar. There's no way he'd choose war.∨Forget it, I'll ask Master Mathiu myself.∨Where is he? ♂①...?∨You mean the castle on Lake Toran? You'd better not be lying∠to me."},{"id":1027000141,"text":"War is war. It's all the same in the end.∨Forget it, I'll ask Master Mathiu myself.∨Where is he? ♂①...?∨You mean the castle on Lake Toran? You'd better not be lying∠to me."},{"id":1027000142,"text":"Forget it, I'll ask Master Mathiu myself.∨Where is he? ♂①...?∨You mean the castle on Lake Toran? You'd better not be lying∠to me."},{"id":1027000143,"text":"Sorry, I'm busy right now."},{"id":1027000144,"text":"Hey you, why don't we have some fun together? I mean it.∠My family's rich, you know?"},{"id":1027000145,"text":"Whaaat? Seriously?!"},{"id":1027000146,"text":"Of course. I'm the son of Lepant of Kouan. You've heard of∠him, haven't you?"},{"id":1027000147,"text":"Sure you're not lying?"},{"id":1027000150,"text":"Hey, Sheena."},{"id":1027000151,"text":"Uh-oh... Dad!"},{"id":1027000152,"text":"I thought you were going on a journey to \"broaden your∠horizons\"?"},{"id":1027000153,"text":"Uh, w-well... As you can see..."},{"id":1027000154,"text":"By broaden your horizons, you meant chasing after women?!∠You come with me! I'll knock some sense into you!"},{"id":1027000155,"text":"Ow! All right, all right! Quit pulling my ear!"},{"id":1028000040,"text":"This is a tavern. Now order somethin' or leave."},{"id":1028000041,"text":"Who're you folk? Friends of Tai Ho? You should speak to∠Yam Koo downstairs."},{"id":1028000042,"text":"What is it? Need somethin' from Tai Ho? A boat to∠Toran Castle? ☆9Can't make any promises there. Tai Ho tends∠to decide stuff like that on a whim."},{"id":1028000043,"text":"Tai Ho's taking you to Toran Castle? What the heck is he∠thinking?"},{"id":1028000044,"text":"Jeez, that guy is unpredictable."},{"id":1028000045,"text":"You folk ready? Then let's set sail."},{"id":1028000046,"text":"Yes.∠No."},{"id":1028000047,"text":"We're the Liberation Army."},{"id":1028000048,"text":"Now that the fog has cleared, we'll be able to fish safely."},{"id":1028000049,"text":"That Tai Ho fella is a real daredevil."},{"id":1028000050,"text":"That castle in Toran is now the Liberation Army's∠headquarters. They've renamed it ♂① Castle.∠Pretty cool if ya ask me."},{"id":1028000051,"text":"This area is currently occupied by the Imperial Army under∠the command of General Teo. Those with no business here∠cannot dock their boat!"},{"id":1028000052,"text":"*meow*"},{"id":1028000053,"text":"Hey there, welcome to Kaku. We're a fishing village."},{"id":1028000054,"text":"There's plenty of shady folk around these parts. I suggest∠ya don't wander about too much."},{"id":1028000055,"text":"See that fog across the lake? There's an ancient castle∠there. Word is it's home to monsters..."},{"id":1028000056,"text":"You've found Lotte's cat!"},{"id":1028000057,"text":"L-Lady Odessa is dead? I-I can't believe it..."},{"id":1028000058,"text":"Flik is inside. He's in a state of shock..."},{"id":1028000059,"text":"I agree with Flik. You're not our leader."},{"id":1028000060,"text":"We managed to escape the attack on our hideout and fled∠west, but Milich and his men chased us down."},{"id":1028000061,"text":"Is that castle across the lake the new Liberation Army∠HQ? Flik should stop being so stubborn..."},{"id":1028000062,"text":"\"The Liberation Army may be small now, but someday...\"∠That's what Lady Odessa used to always tell us."},{"id":1028000063,"text":"What? You want to take a boat to Toran Castle? You gotta∠be kidding. That place is crawling with monsters."},{"id":1028000064,"text":"Toran Castle? That's where they say the mist monster lives.∠No one would be foolish enough to venture there."},{"id":1028000065,"text":"Come on, you can't be serious. Only that nutcase Tai Ho∠would even think of sailing there."},{"id":1028000066,"text":"Tai Ho? If you're looking for that old fool, he's...∨Hey! It's you! I've finally found you, you rotten scoundrel!"},{"id":1028000067,"text":"Wh-Wh-What is it?∠What've I done to upset you?"},{"id":1028000068,"text":"What've you done? Oh, you're not escaping this, mister!∨You messed with the wrong woman. I'm Camille the∠She-Devil! And I'll collect your debt, even from beyond the∠grave!"},{"id":1028000069,"text":"What's this all about? Is she Gremio's girl?"},{"id":1028000070,"text":"Beats me."},{"id":1028000071,"text":"Come on, pay up the money you owe.∨Right here, right now, in cash! I've been trying to find you∠for the past two months!"},{"id":1028000072,"text":"You're in debt, Gremio?"},{"id":1028000073,"text":"No, of course not!"},{"id":1028000074,"text":"Trying to weasel your way out, huh? Well, unfortunately∠for you, I've got proof. Take a good look!"},{"id":1028000075,"text":"Hmm... Let's see. Ah, this is the bill for Master Teo's∠banquet. There's also my tab at the tavern.∨Wh-Wh-What?! You want me to pay all this right now?"},{"id":1028000076,"text":"You heard me. All of it! Right now! Cough it up!"},{"id":1028000077,"text":"Lemme see that, Gremio."},{"id":1028000078,"text":"Whaaat?!∨L-Look, we're in somethin' of a tight spot at the moment∠and unfortunately short on potch.∨By the way, young lady, you seem to be acquainted with∠Tai Ho."},{"id":1028000079,"text":"Well, yes, I know him."},{"id":1028000080,"text":"Could you perhaps tell us where he is?"},{"id":1028000081,"text":"Sure, after you pay back what you owe. I'm running a∠business over here."},{"id":1028000082,"text":"Then how about this? We're short on money right now.∨But once we find Tai Ho, we may be able to get some. And as∠soon as we have the money, we'll pay you back."},{"id":1028000083,"text":"Hmmm... ☆9☆2Wait, you're trying to trick me!"},{"id":1028000084,"text":"A-Absolutely not!"},{"id":1028000085,"text":"Tsk. What a bunch of bums.∨Fine, we'll do it your way. But I'm sticking around until∠you pay everything off."},{"id":1028000086,"text":"has joined your group!"},{"id":1028000087,"text":"So, where can we find Tai Ho?"},{"id":1028000088,"text":"He's usually down in his gambling den.∠Ask the barman there."},{"id":1028000089,"text":"We recruited a real oddball this time."},{"id":1028000090,"text":"What?! You wanna take a boat to Toran Castle? You're a funny∠bunch, aren't you?∨That place is teeming with monsters. I'd be risking my life∠taking you there.∨Look, if I'm gonna put my life on the line, I need you to∠make an equally risky gamble."},{"id":1028000091,"text":"You're gonna have to wager all the money you have.∠Every last potch. So how about it? Will you make the bet?"},{"id":1028000092,"text":"I will.∠"},{"id":1028000093,"text":"All right, let's do this. No backing out now."},{"id":1028000094,"text":"Oho, you're quite the lucky guy. Just so happens I make∠a habit of going along with folk who're lucky.∨Hey, Yam Koo, let's go prepare the boat."},{"id":1028000095,"text":"Fine, fine. Here we go again with another reckless∠adventure."},{"id":1028000096,"text":"Alright then, folks. We'll be waiting at the docks."},{"id":1028000097,"text":"Aw, c'mon, don't get down like that. I just got lucky.∠Go scrounge up some more money and come on back.∨I'll be happy to take it off your hands again."},{"id":1028000098,"text":"Actually, I quit."},{"id":1028000099,"text":"Smart choice. Run on home and cry to mommy."},{"id":1028000100,"text":"Now, let's see... What should we wager?∨Hang on, you're completely broke! Look, kid, if you wanna∠accept my bet, you'll need at least 1,000 potch on you.∠Got it?"},{"id":1028000101,"text":"Hey there, we're ready when you are."},{"id":1028000102,"text":"This is an item store."},{"id":1028000103,"text":"Oh, are you staying the night? It's 150 potch per person."},{"id":1028000104,"text":"Wanna upgrade a weapon? Sure, leave it to me."},{"id":1028000105,"text":"We sell all the armor you need."},{"id":1028000106,"text":"Hey, excuse me. You're not allowed there."},{"id":1028000108,"text":"♂㈱, Viktor. I've been expecting you two."},{"id":1028000109,"text":"Forgive me, Flik. I failed Odessa, and now she's..."},{"id":1028000110,"text":"Quit blaming yourself, Viktor.∨Odessa used to say to me, \"You should be more aware of your∠role as a leader.\"∨Those words have been coming back to haunt me. Perhaps she∠knew her death was imminent. And yet I couldn't live up to∠her expectations."},{"id":1028000111,"text":"Flik..."},{"id":1028000112,"text":"I've been so enraged by her death, I even forget my purpose∠for coming here. No wonder she gave up on me.∨......∨♂㈱, I still cannot accept you as our leader, but∠now is not the time for personal grievances.∨That's why I want to ask...will you fight∠alongside us?"},{"id":1028000114,"text":"Wh-What?∨......∨I'll ask once more. Please. Fight alongside us."},{"id":1028000115,"text":"There's no time to argue. If we don't act soon, the men we∠left behind will be massacred.∨I beg you. Please, let's fight together."},{"id":1028000116,"text":"C'mon, ♂㈱. Now isn't the time to be messin'∠around. Let's fight together."},{"id":1028000117,"text":"Of course."},{"id":1028000118,"text":"Good. Thank you. Now we can rescue those we left behind.∨Well then, I'll assemble our troops and take them to the∠castle on the lake."},{"id":1028000119,"text":"♂㈱, we should head back to the castle too."},{"id":1028000120,"text":"Please, listen to me. I happen to be an inventor.∨After much hard work, I've devised something that surpasses∠even the work of the dwarves.∨But not a single castle lord understands the significance∠of my creation. What did I invent, you ask?∠I call it an \"elevator.\""},{"id":1028000122,"text":"What?! You? You're the leader of the Liberation Army?∨Why, of course! Of course! Of course I'll assist you!∠Liberating inventions require a liberated world!"},{"id":1028000123,"text":"Don't recruit."},{"id":1028000124,"text":"Don't you realize how convenient it would be to not have to∠climb up and down stairs?"},{"id":1028000125,"text":"Hold on, I recognize you... You're the guy who made off with∠my best customer, Tai Ho.∨You got some nerve."},{"id":1028000126,"text":"So how about it, boss? Wanna play a round? Tell you what.∠If you win, I'll join you."},{"id":1028000127,"text":"Play.∠Don't play."},{"id":1028000128,"text":"All right, let's do this."},{"id":1028000129,"text":"You're a lucky guy, and lucky guys can accomplish∠anything. Think I'll throw my chips in with you."},{"id":1028000130,"text":"Tough luck. Guess you still haven't earned the respect∠of the dice gods."},{"id":1028000131,"text":"Don't play."},{"id":1028000132,"text":"That's a shame. There's a certain poetry to staking it all∠on a roll of the dice."},{"id":1028000133,"text":"Huh? Who are you people? The Liberation Army? Then you're∠fighting the Imperials...∨Oh, but I'm busy right now. I'm trying to find someone.∨Hey, maybe you know him. His name is Juppo. He's my uncle∠as well as a trickster."},{"id":1028000134,"text":"I-It's really you, Uncle Juppo! I've been looking all over∠for you!"},{"id":1028000135,"text":"M-Meg? What're you doing here! Wh-Wh-Wh-Wha?!"},{"id":1028000136,"text":"Hee hee. I was hoping you'd teach me your tricks, Uncle.∨Wow... So you're a member of the Liberation Army, huh?"},{"id":1028000137,"text":"I-I, uh..."},{"id":1028000138,"text":"Then I'm joining the Liberation Army too!"},{"id":1028000139,"text":"N-No, you mustn't!"},{"id":1028000140,"text":"La-la-la! I'm not listening. Hey, Mr. ♂㈱, can I∠join the Liberation Army too?"},{"id":1028000142,"text":"Yippee! Now Uncle Juppo can teach me his tricks."},{"id":1028000143,"text":"I never agreed to teach you..."},{"id":1028000144,"text":"Lucky meee!"},{"id":1028000145,"text":"......"},{"id":1028000147,"text":"Doesn't matter what you say. I'm still tagging along."},{"id":1028000148,"text":"Wh-What the..."},{"id":1028000149,"text":"I've made up my mind. And you can't change it."},{"id":1028000159,"text":"You rolled 1."},{"id":1028000160,"text":"You rolled 2."},{"id":1028000161,"text":"You rolled 3."},{"id":1028000162,"text":"You rolled 4."},{"id":1028000163,"text":"You rolled 5."},{"id":1028000164,"text":"You rolled 6."},{"id":1028000165,"text":"I rolled 1."},{"id":1028000166,"text":"I rolled 2."},{"id":1028000167,"text":"I rolled 3."},{"id":1028000168,"text":"I rolled 4."},{"id":1028000169,"text":"I rolled 5."},{"id":1028000170,"text":"I rolled 6."},{"id":1028000171,"text":"Gotta work on that aim..."},{"id":1028000172,"text":"That's a 1, 2, 3, so gotta pay double."},{"id":1028000173,"text":"That's a 4, 5, 6, so gotta pay double."},{"id":1028000174,"text":"That's a Storm, it's worth triple."},{"id":1028000175,"text":"That's a Storm of three 1s, it'll cost the roller triple."},{"id":1028000176,"text":"No score."},{"id":1028000177,"text":"Your turn, ♂㈱."},{"id":1028000178,"text":"My turn."},{"id":1028000179,"text":"How much do you wanna bet?"},{"id":1028000180,"text":"You sure?"},{"id":1028000181,"text":"No bluffing, ♂㈱."},{"id":1028000182,"text":"This here is my gambling joint. Wanna play?"},{"id":1028000183,"text":"Wanna know how to play the game?"},{"id":1028000184,"text":"Wanna go another round?"},{"id":1028000185,"text":"It all comes down to luck in the end. Come back when you∠feel like playing again."},{"id":1028000186,"text":"You win, ♂㈱."},{"id":1028000187,"text":"I win."},{"id":1028000188,"text":"We're tied."},{"id":1028000189,"text":"Oh, are you broke?"},{"id":1028000190,"text":"This is a game where you and I take turns throwing dice.∠Whoever rolls the higher number wins, of course.∨You roll three dice at once, and if two come out the same,∠the number on the third die is your score.∨If you get 4-5-6 or three of any number other than 1,∠you're in luck. But 1-2-3 or three 1s is unlucky.∨If you fail to roll a hand after three tries, or if your∠dice go out of bounds, you lose. So watch carefully where∠you throw the dice.∨Want me to repeat that?"},{"id":1028000191,"text":"Let's begin."},{"id":1028000192,"text":"No messing around, ♂㈱."},{"id":1028000193,"text":"An unsatisfying conclusion. Let's keep playing until one of∠us wins!"},{"id":1028000194,"text":"If you win more than 5,000 potch off me, I'll admit defeat!"},{"id":1028000195,"text":"Is that all you've got left? That won't be enough to roll∠the dice. Come back when you've saved up more."},{"id":1028000196,"text":"If you bet all your winnings so far, I'll accept the∠challenge. Wanna continue?"},{"id":1029000030,"text":"You acquired the legendary sword Kirinji!"},{"id":1029000031,"text":"has joined your party!"},{"id":1029000032,"text":"Young Master, didn't you come all this way to recruit∠Lepant?"},{"id":1029000033,"text":"And Pahn as well..."},{"id":1029000035,"text":"Young Master...I mean, Commander ♂㈱. Please,∠forgive Pahn."},{"id":1029000036,"text":"I'd like to ask the same as well."},{"id":1029000037,"text":"The village of Kouan survives thanks to Master Lepant. Yet∠that new military commander..."},{"id":1029000038,"text":"These days, Master Lepant keeps his gates locked and won't∠let anyone see him."},{"id":1029000039,"text":"There's no telling what the Imperials will do if you go∠against them. That new commander seems pretty nasty as∠well."},{"id":1029000040,"text":"I never doubted Master Lepant. Now I hear he's chased off∠that military commander Kraze."},{"id":1029000041,"text":"I heard even Master Lepant's joined the Liberation Army."},{"id":1029000042,"text":"This village has always managed just fine, even without∠a military commander."},{"id":1029000043,"text":"This is Master Lepant's mansion. I'm Giovanni, his∠manservant."},{"id":1029000044,"text":"Damn it, there's gotta be a better way."},{"id":1029000045,"text":"My apologies. Master Lepant is too busy to see you∠right now."},{"id":1029000046,"text":"And just when will he be available?"},{"id":1029000047,"text":"Well, it could be tomorrow, the day after, a month from now,∠or perhaps in a year's time..."},{"id":1029000048,"text":"I've had enough of you. Run along home or I'll have to∠start using force!"},{"id":1029000049,"text":"Going to Lepant's mansion? Tee hee hee. I wouldn't bother,∠you'd be wasting your time.∨Of course, if you insist, I won't stop you from going.∠But I have a better proposal... Tee hee hee!"},{"id":1029000050,"text":"Tee hee hee! So you went to Lepant's mansion?∨A bunch of amateurs like you could spend years banging on∠the front door, and you'd still never see him.∨How about it then? Care to hear my proposal? I can guarantee∠you a meeting with Lepant."},{"id":1029000051,"text":"Tell us your proposal.∠"},{"id":1029000052,"text":"Okay then. But this isn't the right place. Let's get a room∠at the inn."},{"id":1029000053,"text":"I don't trust you."},{"id":1029000054,"text":"Is that so? Go ahead and waste your life away then, idiots."},{"id":1029000055,"text":"Ready to hear me out now?"},{"id":1029000056,"text":"Fine then. Let's hear this proposal of yours."},{"id":1029000057,"text":"Heh heh. Patience, patience. Do you know why Lepant never∠has any visitors?"},{"id":1029000058,"text":"Why is that?"},{"id":1029000059,"text":"He doesn't want to get mixed up with individuals like you∠who defy the Empire. That's why he refuses to meet anyone."},{"id":1029000060,"text":"But why? That's not what Mathiu told us."},{"id":1029000061,"text":"Who knows? Anyway, here's the interesting part.∨Lepant treasures two things above all else: His wife, Eileen∠and his legendary sword, Kirinji."},{"id":1029000062,"text":"So..."},{"id":1029000063,"text":"Heeheehee. If you steal Kirinji, Lepant will come after∠you no matter what.∨It'll give you the chance to talk with him, blackmail him,∠or whatever you like. You get the picture, right?"},{"id":1029000064,"text":"I see. So how do we rob him of this Kirinji?"},{"id":1029000065,"text":"Tee hee hee. Leave that to me. Wait here a while, then come∠to Lepant's mansion.∨I'll see ya there. Tee hee hee hee."},{"id":1029000066,"text":"Are we playing at being thieves now? This is pathetic."},{"id":1029000067,"text":"No one's playing. We are thieves."},{"id":1029000068,"text":"It's time. Let's get going."},{"id":1029000069,"text":"You're here. All right, wait here a minute."},{"id":1029000070,"text":"There, that should do it. You can go in now."},{"id":1029000071,"text":"Aren't you coming with us?"},{"id":1029000072,"text":"My job here is done. The rest is up to you. I'll be waiting∠out here."},{"id":1029000073,"text":"Jeez, you scared me! Who are you people? Thieves? Nice to∠meet you."},{"id":1029000074,"text":"And who are you?"},{"id":1029000075,"text":"Who am I? I'm Juppo the Trickster. And who are you folk?"},{"id":1029000076,"text":"Trickster? Are you the one who set these annoying traps?"},{"id":1029000077,"text":"I sure am. So how are they? Quite the delightful bits of∠artifice, eh?"},{"id":1029000078,"text":"You're kidding, right?"},{"id":1029000079,"text":"Hey, you better turn off those damn traps of yours right∠now."},{"id":1029000080,"text":"Hmmm. That might be difficult. The puppets∠I can shut down, but the big contraption...∠Well, there's not much I can do about it.∨Anyway, might as well enjoy yourselves,∠soldiers of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1029000081,"text":"So this must be Kirinji. I can see why they call it a∠legendary sword."},{"id":1029000082,"text":"Cleo, we got what we came for. Now let's get out of here."},{"id":1029000083,"text":"Quit being such a chicken, Gremio."},{"id":1029000084,"text":"If the Young Master of the McDohl family were to be caught∠for petty theft, we'd be the laughing stock of the Empire!"},{"id":1029000085,"text":"What took ya so long?! Do you have it?∨Ah, well done. Now let's hurry back to the inn."},{"id":1029000086,"text":"Well, well. I must say I'm impressed.∨I snuck in there once myself, but I ran into some strange∠puppets and ran off without taking anything."},{"id":1029000087,"text":"You knew about them, but you still made us go?"},{"id":1029000088,"text":"Hey, all's well that ends well, right? Anyway... Tee hee."},{"id":1029000089,"text":"You must be tired. How about some tea?"},{"id":1029000090,"text":"Tea?"},{"id":1029000091,"text":"Did you say tea?"},{"id":1029000092,"text":"Tea?!"},{"id":1029000093,"text":"Come, come. Nothing like a cup of tea to relax."},{"id":1029000094,"text":"Krin."},{"id":1029000095,"text":"Hm? What is it? Tee hee."},{"id":1029000096,"text":"How about you drink it first?"},{"id":1029000097,"text":"Oh, um, well, I didn't do any of the heavy lifting, so I'm∠not especially tired... Tee hee."},{"id":1029000098,"text":"That's what I thought. Think we're stupid enough to fall for∠somethin' so obvious?"},{"id":1029000099,"text":"Well, we did fall for it once."},{"id":1029000100,"text":"Pretty cheeky of you to think you could outsmart us."},{"id":1029000101,"text":"Come on out, thieves! The sooner you turn yourselves in,∠the easier it will go for you!"},{"id":1029000102,"text":"Well, that was quick. He found us already?"},{"id":1029000103,"text":"Heh heh. I told him where you were. So he'd capture you∠in your sleep."},{"id":1029000104,"text":"Let's go."},{"id":1029000105,"text":"Are you the one who stole my family heirloom? Return Kirinji∠to me at once, or you'll all pay the consequences."},{"id":1029000106,"text":"......∠"},{"id":1029000107,"text":"You thieving scum! Too scared to speak, are you?"},{"id":1029000108,"text":"What's the matter, Young Master? Let's tell him the truth."},{"id":1029000109,"text":"Master ♂㈱, have you forgotten what Mathiu∠said? This is the same Lepant. I think."},{"id":1029000110,"text":"Actually, Mathiu suggested we come see you."},{"id":1029000111,"text":"What? Mathiu? ☆10If Mathiu sent you, I'd like to help.∨But there are some things I cannot part with. I ask that you∠return Kirinji and be on your way."},{"id":1029000112,"text":"We need your help.∠"},{"id":1029000113,"text":"I appreciate the pains you've gone to, but when I think of∠those I care about getting hurt... I just can't do it."},{"id":1029000114,"text":"If I was only putting myself at risk, I'd gladly help you.∠But sadly that's not the case."},{"id":1029000115,"text":"I'm sorry, but I can't just walk away from my life here.∠My wife deserves better than that."},{"id":1029000116,"text":"I understand. We'll give you back your sword."},{"id":1029000117,"text":"You have my gratitude. Now, if you'll excuse me."},{"id":1029000118,"text":"Master!"},{"id":1029000119,"text":"Calm down, Giovanni. What's the matter?"},{"id":1029000120,"text":"It's M-Madam Eileen..."},{"id":1029000121,"text":"Has something happened to her?"},{"id":1029000122,"text":"The new military commander took her away! I tried to∠stop him, but—"},{"id":1029000123,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1029000124,"text":"Why did you kidnap my wife? This new commander of yours,∠get him out here, now!"},{"id":1029000125,"text":"Commander Kraze won't meet with anyone without an∠appointment."},{"id":1029000126,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1029000127,"text":"Who the hell are you?! Don't you know this mansion belongs∠to Commander Kraze?"},{"id":1029000128,"text":"Shut up, thief! You're one to talk!"},{"id":1029000129,"text":"That's a lot of opponents to handle, even for me.∨Hm? Hold on, it's you folk. Perfect timing. Lend me a hand."},{"id":1029000130,"text":"You again, ♂㈱! Thanks to you, I've been exiled to∠this country town in the middle of nowhere.∨First you interfere with my promotion! And now you dare to∠interfere with my pleasure."},{"id":1029000131,"text":"What?! Give Eileen back at once, you miserable filth."},{"id":1029000132,"text":"You're beyond redemption."},{"id":1029000133,"text":"Eileen!"},{"id":1029000134,"text":"Lepant!"},{"id":1029000135,"text":"Hmph. That's far enough. Don't come any closer. Wouldn't∠want this beautiful lady to get hurt now, would we?"},{"id":1029000136,"text":"What a bastard. He's rotten to the core. I can't believe we∠once took orders from him."},{"id":1029000137,"text":"Say what you will. I'm just looking out for number one.∨Oh, and let me reunite you with an old friend of yours.∠Hey! Come on out!"},{"id":1029000138,"text":"Pahn!"},{"id":1029000139,"text":"Hmph. Now then, Pahn. Seize them all. This is your chance∠to redeem General Teo's name."},{"id":1029000140,"text":"Pahn. Are you really going to listen to the likes of him?"},{"id":1029000141,"text":"Cleo, Gremio.∨Young Master..."},{"id":1029000142,"text":"Pahn..."},{"id":1029000143,"text":"Even now, I don't regret the choice I made that day."},{"id":1029000144,"text":"Yes. That's right, Pahn."},{"id":1029000145,"text":"But my heart still aches. I...I want to be true to myself.∨Time will judge whether my heart was in the right place."},{"id":1029000146,"text":"Wh-What are you talking about, Pahn?"},{"id":1029000147,"text":"You're a swine in human skin! Take this!"},{"id":1029000148,"text":"There seem to be a lot of people who really hate you."},{"id":1029000149,"text":"Hold on now, take it easy. Think of what'll become of your∠father, Teo, if anything were to happen to me."},{"id":1029000150,"text":"There'll be no mercy for you.∠Get lost."},{"id":1029000151,"text":"W-Wait, you don't really mean... H-Help, somebody!"},{"id":1029000152,"text":"Get lost."},{"id":1029000153,"text":"Young Master, why spare his life? He killed Ted."},{"id":1029000154,"text":"Gremio, don't question the Young Master's decision. He has∠a bigger heart than we do. We should be proud of him."},{"id":1029000155,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, it appears I, too, am now∠a fugitive.∨I turned a blind eye to the Empire's cruelties, just to∠protect my family. And look where it's gotten me."},{"id":1029000156,"text":"Yes?"},{"id":1029000157,"text":"I can no longer be your husband."},{"id":1029000158,"text":"Wh-Why, Lepant?"},{"id":1029000159,"text":"I'm joining the Liberation Army. It's likely I won't be∠able to return here."},{"id":1029000160,"text":"......∨You really are cruel sometimes. What kind of woman do you∠take me for?"},{"id":1029000161,"text":"If you come with me, you'll suffer."},{"id":1029000162,"text":"I've been ready for this, ever since I married you."},{"id":1029000163,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please allow me to be of help to∠you and the Liberation Army."},{"id":1029000164,"text":"I'll need some time to prepare. After that, I'll head to∠♂① immediately."},{"id":1029000165,"text":"Young Master, I mean Master ♂㈱, please let me∠join the Liberation Army.∨I'm in no position to ask for forgiveness, but I'd still like to∠serve under your command."},{"id":1029000166,"text":"There's no way I can forget what you did.∠"},{"id":1029000167,"text":"Please, Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1029000168,"text":"I'm so sorry...about what happened to Ted.∨I know I don't deserve to be here. Still, I want to join∠the Liberation Army."},{"id":1029000169,"text":"I see. So you still can't forgive me."},{"id":1029000170,"text":"Pahn, we could use you on our side."},{"id":1029000171,"text":"Y-Young Master...∨Thank you so much. I shall dedicate my life to your service,∠Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1029000172,"text":"You can't go in there! The military commander will be∠furious."},{"id":1029000173,"text":"Staying the night? It's 150 potch per person. I promise∠you'll sleep like a baby."},{"id":1029000174,"text":"Need help with armor? Leave it to me. Just choose whichever∠one you like."},{"id":1029000175,"text":"Shall I appraise something?"},{"id":1029000176,"text":"Clear"},{"id":1029000177,"text":"You lost 10 EXP!"},{"id":1029000178,"text":"Treasure"},{"id":1029000179,"text":"Monster"},{"id":1029000180,"text":"You gained 10 EXP!"},{"id":1029000181,"text":"?"},{"id":1029000182,"text":"Return"},{"id":1029000184,"text":"So how did it go?∠You couldn't pull it off? Bunch of amateurs.∠Oh well, let's call it a day for now."},{"id":1029000185,"text":"You'd better not fail this time."},{"id":1029000186,"text":"Eileen..."},{"id":1029000187,"text":"You! I can't believe you chickened out the other day.∠No running away this time."},{"id":1029000188,"text":"Thank you so much. In truth, Lepant's been dying to help∠you all."},{"id":1029000189,"text":"Master Lepant... Wh-Wh-What should I do?"},{"id":1029000190,"text":"Watch. A rope like this is easy-peasy. One, two, three!∠............"},{"id":1029000191,"text":"Could you untie it?"},{"id":1029000192,"text":"Lepant is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1029000193,"text":"Hi there. Me? As you can see, I'm just a warehouse guard.∨Are you members of the Liberation Army? You are?∠Mind if I ask something? Is the Liberation Army vault big?∨What? You don't have one yet? But do you plan on building∠a big one? I-I see.∨Commander ♂㈱, I've been hoping to become a∠member of the Liberation Army for quite some time.∠Please let me join you."},{"id":1029000195,"text":"Th-Thank you very much.
