L-L-Let's go build a big v-v-vault∠right away."},{"id":1029000197,"text":"I-I-I see... B-But when you do build a big vault, please∠let me know."},{"id":1029000198,"text":"Who are you? The Liberation Army, huh? I see..."},{"id":1029000199,"text":"Recruit.∠Don't recruit."},{"id":1029000200,"text":"Let me think... Hmmm."},{"id":1029000201,"text":"No way. I don't waste my time with weaklings."},{"id":1029000203,"text":"Fine. You look pretty strong, so I'll join you."},{"id":1029000204,"text":"Don't recruit."},{"id":1029000205,"text":"What is it? Is there something else you want?"},{"id":1030000001,"text":"Hahahaha! Is that all they've got? Turns out the Imperial∠Army is all bark and no bite."},{"id":1030000002,"text":"Phew! Oh, Young Master. Are you okay?"},{"id":1030000003,"text":"Good old Gremio. You sure haven't changed. Master∠♂㈱, let's attack immediately and finish them off."},{"id":1030000004,"text":"Wait, Commander ♂㈱. We shouldn't charge in∠blindly without understanding our opponent's strategy.∨I suggest we send out a reconnaissance team∠to assess the situation."},{"id":1030000005,"text":"Momentum is on our side. Let us keep going."},{"id":1030000006,"text":"Those damn roses. We can't get anywhere near the enemy.∠This is not looking good..."},{"id":1030000007,"text":"Perhaps we should send out a reconnaissance team after all."},{"id":1030000008,"text":"∠I agree. Let's assess the situation first."},{"id":1030000009,"text":"All right, I'm comin' along, ♂㈱."},{"id":1030000010,"text":"I'll join you as well. I've yet to accept you∠as my commander.∨This will be a good opportunity to observe if you truly have∠what it takes to be a leader."},{"id":1030000011,"text":"And of course, I will go too, Young Master."},{"id":1030000012,"text":"Gremio... Stay here."},{"id":1030000013,"text":"What're you talking about, Viktor? Who will protect the∠Young Master if I'm not there?"},{"id":1030000014,"text":"Don't you get it, Gremio? ♂㈱ can take care of∠himself now. He's the leader of the Liberation Army, for∠cryin' out loud!∨Not some kid who needs your protection."},{"id":1030000015,"text":"B-But that's no reason why I shouldn't go with you."},{"id":1030000016,"text":"After leavin' my village, I spent years travelin' from∠place to place. I met folks from all walks of life,∠experienced all kinds of things.∨That's why I sometimes get these hunches.∨Gremio, you gotta stay here."},{"id":1030000017,"text":"This must be some kind of joke. Young Master, you wouldn't∠actually leave me behind, would you?"},{"id":1030000018,"text":"Stay here, Gremio."},{"id":1030000019,"text":"Young Master? Are you in on this joke as well?"},{"id":1030000020,"text":"I swore an oath to your father that I would keep you safe∠no matter what.∨Please, Young Master. Take me with you. I swear on my life∠I will protect you."},{"id":1030000021,"text":"Please, Young Master. Take me with you."},{"id":1030000022,"text":"Give it up, Gremio. You'll only get in the way."},{"id":1030000023,"text":"Y-Young Master..."},{"id":1030000024,"text":"∠Fine. Come with us."},{"id":1030000025,"text":"Thank you, Young Master."},{"id":1030000026,"text":"Kindness alone doesn't make a leader, ♂㈱."},{"id":1030000027,"text":"You are entering General Milich's domain. Do not advance∠any further."},{"id":1030000028,"text":"No! We've caught the enemy off guard. This is our chance∠to attack! All of you, follow me!"},{"id":1030000029,"text":"Viktor is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1030000030,"text":"Flik is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1030000031,"text":"Gremio is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1030000032,"text":"Would you like to switch party members?"},{"id":1030000034,"text":"Safe travels."},{"id":1030000043,"text":"Well, well, it's been a while. Wait, you haven't forgotten∠me, have you?∨Who do you think taught you how to fight with that∠staff? Though you were just a wee lad back then.∨Me? I've been thinking of journeying west, but I can't get∠my travel documents approved."},{"id":1030000044,"text":"Aha, now there's a familiar face. Still keeping up with∠what I taught you about using that staff?∨So the stories are true. ♂㈱, you really are the∠leader of the Liberation Army. No, I'm not judging. It's the∠path you've chosen.∨Still, I'd hate to imagine what Teo would think.∨All right, kiddo, your old pal Kai has got your back.∠As a master with this bo staff, I'm worth at least 100 men.∠Hahahaha!"},{"id":1030000045,"text":"The name's Quincy. I may be just a hunter now, but someday∠I'll make a name for myself."},{"id":1030000047,"text":"Join you? Well, lemme think. Liberation Army, Imperial Army,∠still hard to tell who the winner will be.∨I wanna make sure I bet on the winning horse. So I'll∠consider joining you when you have a few more recruits.∠Say about ♂④ more."},{"id":1030000048,"text":"All right, I'm in. I'll cast my lot with the Liberation∠Army. Now let's win this war."},{"id":1030000049,"text":"If you're not inviting me to join you, then you're not a very∠keen judge of character.∨Wouldn't wanna work for a commander who doesn't know∠a good thing when he sees it."},{"id":1031000001,"text":"This place is a real-life haunted house."},{"id":1031000002,"text":"Are you guys sure there's treasure here?"},{"id":1031000003,"text":"I don't know. Viktor was the one who said there was."},{"id":1031000004,"text":"Wow, this place is something else. Must be teeming with∠monsters. Can't wait to take ‘em out!"},{"id":1031000005,"text":"Hold on, you're going as well? Please be careful."},{"id":1031000006,"text":"Of course I am. As if I'd sit here twiddling my thumbs and∠miss out on the adventure of a lifetime!"},{"id":1031000007,"text":"Looks like we found the big boss."},{"id":1031000008,"text":"Serves you right, acting like a big shot when you're already∠dead."},{"id":1031000009,"text":"Look, the fog..."},{"id":1031000010,"text":"Guess this one was responsible for creating it all."},{"id":1031000011,"text":"There, now the castle is finally ours. How about we give it∠a name?"},{"id":1031000012,"text":"Sounds like fun. How about Dragon Castle?"},{"id":1031000013,"text":"Orange Castle!"},{"id":1031000014,"text":"I say we call it ♂㈱ Castle."},{"id":1031000015,"text":"What name would you like, Young Master?"},{"id":1031000016,"text":"♂①, huh? I like it. Let's go with that."},{"id":1031000017,"text":"Well played, Gremio."},{"id":1031000018,"text":"Congratulations, Commander ♂㈱. Let this day be∠known as the Founding Day of the new Liberation Army."},{"id":1031000019,"text":"Great idea! Let's celebrate tonight!"},{"id":1031000020,"text":"Hey, what about my money?"},{"id":1031000021,"text":"Now isn't the time for such trivialities, lady. There'll be∠time for that later."},{"id":1031000022,"text":"It's been a while, ♂㈱. You have finally started∠on your own path.∨Today I come bearing gifts. Here is the first one. Please,∠accept it."},{"id":1031000023,"text":"This is the Stone Tablet of Promise. Your true strength lies∠in the comrades who share your vision.∨Go forth and recruit others. The names of your new allies∠will be carved onto the Tablet. As for your other gift..."},{"id":1031000024,"text":"Long time no see. Remember me? I'm Luc, Lady Leknaat's∠number one apprentice."},{"id":1031000025,"text":"His powers should serve the Liberation Army well.∨♂㈱, history has only just been set in motion.∠Do not lose heart.∨We shall meet again someday."},{"id":1031000026,"text":"So it looks like I'll be joining you. Thanks for having me."},{"id":1031000027,"text":"I'm certain Lady Leknaat just wanted to be rid of him."},{"id":1031000028,"text":"Yeah... Kinda agree."},{"id":1031000029,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the castle is now ours. It's time∠to turn our efforts to gathering more allies.∨A man by the name of Lepant lives in the town of Kouan.∠I suggest we recruit him. He's certain to be useful."},{"id":1031000030,"text":"What was it like inside? Want to head back to Kaku?"},{"id":1031000031,"text":"Let's return to Kaku.∠Not yet."},{"id":1031002001,"text":"Well, well. It's been a while, ♂㈱. Looks like we∠both managed to survive."},{"id":1031002002,"text":"Come on, Sydonia. You say something as well."},{"id":1031002003,"text":"Heh. Well met."},{"id":1031002004,"text":"A-Anyway, where's Lady Odessa? I'd like to pay my respects."},{"id":1031002005,"text":"L-Lady Odessa is..."},{"id":1031002006,"text":"Odessa has gone north for reasons we can't discuss now.∨Commander ♂㈱ is our leader while she is away."},{"id":1031002007,"text":"North, huh? Wait, hold on... You're the leader now,∠♂㈱? I'm seeing you in a whole new light."},{"id":1031002008,"text":"Commander ♂㈱.∨How about we hold a banquet in honor of Lepant,∠Varkas, and Sydonia, and all our other new friends?"},{"id":1031002009,"text":"All right, let no expense be spared.∠"},{"id":1031002010,"text":"Well said! You really are a leader of the people."},{"id":1031002011,"text":"I'm not so sure..."},{"id":1031002012,"text":"Great idea, Mathiu!∨Of course you agree, right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1031002013,"text":"Well then, I'll cook up some of my best dishes."},{"id":1031002014,"text":"Hahahahahaha!∠Bwahahaha!∠Hyahahahahaha!"},{"id":1031002015,"text":"How are you, Young Master? Enjoying yourself?"},{"id":1031002016,"text":"Pahn! Can't you eat a little more quietly?"},{"id":1031002017,"text":"Oh boy, nothing beats Gremio's cooking. Especially not that∠slop they serve in the Imperial Army..."},{"id":1031002018,"text":"I myself prefer a quiet drink."},{"id":1031002019,"text":"That gangly guy's cooking is pretty good. Maybe I'll put him∠to work somewhere until he pays off the money he owes me."},{"id":1031002020,"text":"♂㈱, the moon is a real beauty tonight."},{"id":1031002021,"text":"Tai Ho always acts without thinking. That's why I gotta keep∠an eye on him."},{"id":1031002022,"text":"Quite the merry group you've assembled, Commander∠♂㈱. I'm glad I came here."},{"id":1031002023,"text":"Lepant looks so happy. I'm sure he was fed up with the∠Empire."},{"id":1031002024,"text":"Whew! I followed my master here, but I never thought∠I'd end up living with bandits."},{"id":1031002025,"text":"Hey, Master ♂㈱! Let's crush those Imperials∠once and for all!"},{"id":1031002027,"text":"Look, Master ♂㈱, I doubt I'll be much use∠to your cause."},{"id":1031002028,"text":"These silver plates will fetch a handsome price if I sell∠them. Think I'll take one."},{"id":1031002029,"text":"Where are you going, Young Master? Off to bed so soon?"},{"id":1031002030,"text":"Look at you, you're drunk as a skunk. What a clown."},{"id":1031002031,"text":"♂㈱. That rune on your right hand...it's mine!"},{"id":1031002032,"text":"Master ♂㈱! Are you all right? You bastard!"},{"id":1031002033,"text":"How dare you infiltrate the Liberation Army's headquarters!"},{"id":1031002034,"text":"Pfft ha ha ha! Liberation Army, my foot. You really think you∠can defeat the Empire? What a bunch of fools you are."},{"id":1031002035,"text":"What did you say?!"},{"id":1031002036,"text":"Watch your back, ♂㈱. Lady Windy will stop at∠nothing to take what she wants!"},{"id":1031002037,"text":"I'll stand guard over Master ♂㈱."},{"id":1031002038,"text":"No, I'll be the one to protect him."},{"id":1031002039,"text":"Quit your bickering. Why don't you both just stand guard?"},{"id":1031002040,"text":"You can rest assured that I will protect you."},{"id":1031002041,"text":"Master ♂㈱, from today onward, I will stand∠guard over you."},{"id":1031002042,"text":"Varkas, Sydonia, what're you two doing here?"},{"id":1031002043,"text":"Well, we heard the rumors about you all and figured∠this would be a good opportunity to pay back our debt."},{"id":1031002044,"text":"Hahahahahaha! This is a blast!"},{"id":1031002045,"text":"Delicious! Especially after that horrible slop they serve∠in the Imperial Army."},{"id":1031002046,"text":"Quite the lively group of comrades, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1031002047,"text":"You shouldn't drink so much, dear..."},{"id":1031002048,"text":"This is fantastic! Good thing we came here. Right, Sydonia?"},{"id":1031002049,"text":"Heh... I guess so."},{"id":1031002081,"text":"Hooray!"},{"id":1031002082,"text":"Oh, Young Master. Is something the matter?"},{"id":1031002083,"text":"Woo hoo, wonder when supper will be ready."},{"id":1031002084,"text":"Master ♂㈱, are you thinking about your father?"},{"id":1031002085,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱! Why the long face? You'll give the rest∠of us the blues too!"},{"id":1031002086,"text":"Tsk. So when are you planning on paying up?"},{"id":1031002087,"text":"You have quite the impressive army here, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1031002088,"text":"I miss those good ol' carefree days of being a bandit."},{"id":1031002089,"text":"Heh."},{"id":1031002090,"text":"...Yo."},{"id":1031002091,"text":"Please look after Futch."},{"id":1031002092,"text":"What's up, Commander? You'd better do a good job∠filling Odessa's shoes."},{"id":1031002093,"text":"Ah, Commander ♂㈱. Can I offer you a cup of tea?"},{"id":1031002094,"text":"I can finally rise up for justice!"},{"id":1031002095,"text":"What's the matter, Commander ♂㈱? Is there∠something troubling you?"},{"id":1031002096,"text":"All this waiting makes me want to wander off somewhere."},{"id":1031002097,"text":"*sigh* Looks like Tai Ho's wanderlust is kicking in again."},{"id":1031002098,"text":"What do you want?"},{"id":1031002099,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm glad I joined the Liberation∠Army. Together, we'll defeat the Empire."},{"id":1031002100,"text":"Seeing his happy face reminds me of when we were young."},{"id":1031002101,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, are you here to see Master∠Lepant?"},{"id":1031002102,"text":"Hey, how're you holding up? I'm holding up just fine.∠Teeheehee."},{"id":1031002103,"text":"Oh? Now this is a surprise. What brings you here?"},{"id":1031002104,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I will continue to fight for the∠lost Village of the Elves and for all the people of this∠land."},{"id":1031002105,"text":"With every battle, many lives are lost. Even my medicine∠can't save them all."},{"id":1031002106,"text":"Hey there boss, what can I do for ya?"},{"id":1031002107,"text":"So sorry. I'm busy with my research."},{"id":1031002108,"text":"E-Excuse me, but I'd really like to go home soon...∠I...I have to clean my house..."},{"id":1031002109,"text":"Well, look who it is. Care to join me for a drink tonight?"},{"id":1031002110,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱, I...∠No, never mind..."},{"id":1031002111,"text":"Since the Liberation Army keeps growing, my work is never∠done."},{"id":1031002112,"text":"We seafaring merchants would gladly welcome peace."},{"id":1031002113,"text":"Gather as many stars as you can. The 108 Stars of Destiny."},{"id":1031002114,"text":"Oh, hello."},{"id":1031002115,"text":"You know, Black was a great dragon. He really was..."},{"id":1031002116,"text":"I'm worried about the dragons."},{"id":1031002117,"text":"Ugh, you won't believe this. Hix's swordsmanship hasn't∠improved at all."},{"id":1031002118,"text":"Guess I'm just not cut out for battle..."},{"id":1031002119,"text":"I may be a member of the Liberation Army now, but I still∠can't believe how much the Emperor has changed."},{"id":1031002120,"text":"This lack of fighting is making my sword arm antsy."},{"id":1031002121,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. Did you come here looking∠for fashion advice?"},{"id":1031002122,"text":"Gotta say, the food here is surprisingly good. Besides,∠looks like we have a better chance of winning."},{"id":1031002123,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, it's too early to let your guard∠down."},{"id":1031002124,"text":"♂㈱... You resemble your father more and more."},{"id":1031002125,"text":"Hey. I wanna give Kirkis something in return for the ring.∠What do you think he'd like?"},{"id":1031002126,"text":"Jeez! This castle's too small for me to stretch my legs."},{"id":1031002127,"text":"Hey ♂㈱, I'm thinking of learning how to cook."},{"id":1031002128,"text":"Oh, my bosom buddy. How could I ever forget about you?"},{"id":1031002129,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Kuromimi look forward to∠serving you in battle."},{"id":1031002130,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we will fight by your side to∠honor General Teo's dying wish."},{"id":1031002131,"text":"Like Alen, I too will join you."},{"id":1031002132,"text":"Whoa, this place is huge. Thought it'd be about the same∠size as our fortress."},{"id":1031002133,"text":"Just so we're clear, I answer to Anji and Anji alone.∠Don't forget that."},{"id":1031002134,"text":"Hi there."},{"id":1031002135,"text":"A ninja speaks only when necessary."},{"id":1031002136,"text":"There are some fine women here in the Liberation Army.∠Don't you agree, ♂㈱? Personally, Cleo's my type∠of gal."},{"id":1031002137,"text":"I suppose what Master Mathiu says must be true. But I still∠can't forgive you."},{"id":1031002138,"text":"I grow so weary of this boorish place."},{"id":1031002139,"text":"I'm Fu Su Lu, the strongest man in the world."},{"id":1031002140,"text":"I gonna be a strong warrior, just like Kuromimi!"},{"id":1031002141,"text":"Friends, huh? Maybe they're not such a bad thing after all."},{"id":1031002142,"text":"What the heck? Mina's vanished again!"},{"id":1031002143,"text":"......∨Oh, excuse me. Just practicing my vanishing technique.∨......"},{"id":1031002144,"text":"My journey doesn't end here. I must...∠Forget it. There's no point in talking about it."},{"id":1031002145,"text":"The light in my eyes may have been taken from me, but the∠light in my soul continues to burn."},{"id":1031002146,"text":"Pretty nice castle. Though not as nice as the forest where∠my house is."},{"id":1031002147,"text":"Heehee. Wanna see me dance again?"},{"id":1031002148,"text":"I wonder if my fields are okay."},{"id":1031002149,"text":"Barbarossa is my enemy. That's...all there is to it."},{"id":1031002150,"text":"This life isn't so bad."},{"id":1031002151,"text":"My Uncle Juppo is so stingy. He won't teach me anything."},{"id":1031002152,"text":"Hahaha! I can still give the young ones a run for their∠money."},{"id":1031002153,"text":"My master has been in high spirits of late."},{"id":1031002154,"text":"How about it? Fancy a game before you go?"},{"id":1031002155,"text":"Hey there. Did you need something from my vault?"},{"id":1031002156,"text":"Heehee. Did you want something?"},{"id":1031002157,"text":"Ummm... Commander ♂㈱, wasn't it? ∠How can I help you?"},{"id":1031002158,"text":"Flipping coins, rolling dice... It may be silly, but that's∠what I'm passionate about."},{"id":1031002159,"text":"Hey, heard any interesting gossip?"},{"id":1031002160,"text":"Not much wind this year, so not many flowers are growing."},{"id":1031002161,"text":"Hmmm. Think I left some laundry outside when I came here."},{"id":1031002162,"text":"Hey, what's up? How about a practice match?"},{"id":1031002163,"text":"Strength alone is truth. There's nothing else worth∠believing in."},{"id":1031002164,"text":"Welcome, welcome. Take a look at this. Isn't it amazing?"},{"id":1031002165,"text":"Ehem... Searching for something?"},{"id":1031002166,"text":"You know, my dream is to map this entire world!"},{"id":1031002167,"text":"Still haven't found it...the color I'm looking for."},{"id":1031002168,"text":"What's up? Want to take a bath? Trust me, you'll feel∠refreshed."},{"id":1031002169,"text":"Yes? There's nothing I can't appraise."},{"id":1031002170,"text":"You must be tired. Get plenty of rest."},{"id":1031002171,"text":"Now, what was the spell again? It's completely slipped∠my mind. Oh well."},{"id":1031002172,"text":"Welcome to ♂① Castle.∠Heehee. Awesome."},{"id":1031002173,"text":"Yes? You have need of this old crone?"},{"id":1031002174,"text":"Heehee. Here for work?"},{"id":1031002175,"text":"I imagine you have come to hear me sing."},{"id":1031002176,"text":"I'll cook up something that'll give strength to every last∠one of you! That's my contribution to the war effort!"},{"id":1031002177,"text":"Would you like to taste my stew?"},{"id":1031002178,"text":"You've got a fine collection of tools here."},{"id":1031002179,"text":"Hmph, this place is way too cramped to get any work done."},{"id":1031002180,"text":"I want to ensure everyone's weapons are in top condition."},{"id":1031002181,"text":"Heh. You just don't give up, do you?"},{"id":1031002182,"text":"We've always got the best selection of items."},{"id":1031002183,"text":"Welcome to the item store. Always dreamed of saying that."},{"id":1031002184,"text":"To upgrade this sword, the impurities must be hammered out.∠It's as simple as that."},{"id":1031002185,"text":"Our job is to gather the facts. We mustn't let our emotions∠get the better of us."},{"id":1031002186,"text":"My journey won't end until I catch her."},{"id":1031002187,"text":"Someday, Yuber and I will settle matters once and for all."},{"id":1031002188,"text":"Perhaps this old man can still be of some use."},{"id":1031002189,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, may I offer you a glass of wine?"},{"id":1031002190,"text":"Well, I finally opened my inn, but I haven't got time to∠prepare food. If only there were some skilled cooks around."},{"id":1031002191,"text":"He said his name was Leon... Leon Silverberg."},{"id":1031002192,"text":"I have a letter written here. Will you deliver it to him?"},{"id":1031002193,"text":"You acquired Mathiu's Letter."},{"id":1031002194,"text":"Um, what was her name again? Apple, I think.∨She acts tough, but she's actually got some pretty cute∠quirks."},{"id":1031002195,"text":"That girl Tengaar, she's totally my type."},{"id":1031002196,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. You know Jeane? Now that's my type of∠gal."},{"id":1031002197,"text":"Thank you, ♂㈱. I'm beginning to understand.∠Really, thank you so very much.∨I know it's not much, but will you take this as a token of∠my gratitude? I won't need it anymore."},{"id":1031002198,"text":"You acquired the Binoculars."},{"id":1031002199,"text":"Well then, I think I'll go and search for the true color∠of freedom."},{"id":1031002200,"text":"I'm sorry, sir. Sir Mathiu told me to pretend everything∠was normal."},{"id":1031002201,"text":"Tsk. Well, I guess I'll just have to stick around with you∠until the end."},{"id":1031002202,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... I-I leave...the rest to you."},{"id":1031002203,"text":"Hey, did you know that beyond the Great Forest is the∠Village of the Elves? The Great Forest Village is southeast∠of Kouan."},{"id":1031002204,"text":"Hey, guess what? Apparently, inside the Dwarf Vault, there's∠a secret treasure called the Water Cane."},{"id":1031002205,"text":"Hey, did you know? Upriver from the village of Rikon,∠there's a renowned doctor named Liukan."},{"id":1031002206,"text":"If you're looking for Mathiu, he's upstairs."},{"id":1031002207,"text":"Apparently, an old friend of Mathiu's lives in Antei.∠Think it's a lady friend?"},{"id":1031002208,"text":"Have you heard the news? Apparently, Liukan has been∠thrown into Soniere Prison."},{"id":1031002209,"text":"I heard Flik is originally from the Lorimar region."},{"id":1031002210,"text":"Did you know that there's a historic temple west of the∠Warriors' Village?"},{"id":1031002211,"text":"Hey, do you know what Neclord's favorite paintings are?∨\"Peasant Girl,\" \"Woman in the Early Afternoon,\" and∠\"Chestnut Tree,\" in that order. But the one he favors∠above all is the one of himself."},{"id":1031002212,"text":"Hey! Word on the street is that you're heading to the domain∠of the Dragon Knights?∨The entrance is northwest of Antei."},{"id":1031002213,"text":"Hey, have you heard about the medicine Liukan makes?∠Apparently, it's potent enough to wake a sleeping dragon.∨Maybe I should ask him for something that can restore∠my youth."},{"id":1031002214,"text":"Oh, you're back. I heard you went to recruit the Knights∠of the Dragons' Den."},{"id":1031002215,"text":"Hey, I hear you're planning to invade the north.∠That's quite the winning streak."},{"id":1031002216,"text":"Hey, have you heard about the protector of Shasarazade?∠Her name is Sonya, and she's apparently a real beauty.∨I wonder if she's better looking than me."},{"id":1031002217,"text":"Apparently, there's a rich fellow named Lepant who lives∠in Kouan.∨Where's Kouan? It's a town southwest of Kaku."},{"id":1031002218,"text":"Apparently, one of the very powerful Great Generals is∠coming to attack us. I heard this from a girl named Kasumi."},{"id":1031002219,"text":"I heard the news. Don't lose heart. The best thing to do in∠times like this is to go to your room and get plenty of rest."},{"id":1031002220,"text":"Apparently, Flik remembered something, and he's really∠excited about it."},{"id":1031002221,"text":"Hey, did you know the secret factory of the Liberation Army∠used to be up north?"},{"id":1031002222,"text":"Got some Fire Spears, huh? Are you going to have Kun To∠of Kirov deliver them to you?"},{"id":1031003036,"text":"Watch your back, ♂㈱. Lady Windy will stop at∠nothing to take what she wants!"},{"id":1031003050,"text":"Good morning, Young Master. It's another beautiful day."},{"id":1031003051,"text":"Ughhh..."},{"id":1031003052,"text":"He's soaked to the bone. Did he swim all the way here?∨Hurry, let's get him inside."},{"id":1031003053,"text":"I wonder what happened? It's rare enough seeing an elf∠around these parts.∨What could've possessed him to swim all the way out here?"},{"id":1031003054,"text":"He must've had a very good reason."},{"id":1031003055,"text":"U-Ughhh... Where am I? It appears I survived."},{"id":1031003056,"text":"Are you all right?"},{"id":1031003057,"text":"I heard rumors...so I made my way here. Please tell me...∠Is the Liberation Army..."},{"id":1031003058,"text":"Don't worry. This is ♂① Castle, the Liberation∠Army's headquarters."},{"id":1031003059,"text":"Thank goodness...∨I have a request. I wish to speak to your leader, Odessa."},{"id":1031003061,"text":"You can't meet with Odessa right now. Our current leader∠is Commander ♂㈱ here."},{"id":1031003062,"text":"Then, Commander ♂㈱, please help us."},{"id":1031003063,"text":"Help you?"},{"id":1031003064,"text":"The Great General Kwanda Rosman of the Imperial Army plans∠to exterminate us elves.∨I beg you. Please lend us your strength."},{"id":1031003065,"text":"Of course.∠"},{"id":1031003066,"text":"Wait, Commander ♂㈱. The present strength of∠our forces is insignificant.∨Even with the survivors of the old Liberation Army and∠Varkas's bandits, we amount to only a few hundred soldiers.∨It wouldn't be wise to mobilize our forces just yet."},{"id":1031003067,"text":"But..."},{"id":1031003068,"text":"Indeed. As Commander ♂㈱ says, the present∠strength of our forces is insignificant.∨Even with the survivors of the old Liberation Army and∠Varkas's bandits, we still amount to only a few hundred men.∨It wouldn't be wise to mobilize our forces just yet."},{"id":1031003069,"text":"But that would mean leaving the elves to die..."},{"id":1031003070,"text":"Of course, we can't abandon them.∨Our only strength is the hope that the people see in us.∠We must not betray that hope.∨Therefore, I suggest we send out a small reconnaissance team∠to collect intelligence. From there, we can decide on our∠next course of action."},{"id":1031003071,"text":"You have my deepest gratitude. I'll lead you to our village."},{"id":1031003072,"text":"Young Master, no matter what anyone says, I'm going with∠you."},{"id":1031003073,"text":"Our village lies beyond the Great Forest.∨Let's first head for the Great Forest Village.∨It's located southeast of Kouan. We should find it along the∠eastern edge of the forest."},{"id":1031003074,"text":"Hold on, I'm taggin' along too."},{"id":1031003075,"text":"Kirkis is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1031003076,"text":"Three months after defeating ∠Kwanda Rosman's army..."},{"id":1031003077,"text":"Hey! Why isn't Odessa here? Isn't this supposed to be the∠new Liberation Army's headquarters?!∨After our hideout was attacked, I gathered the scattered∠survivors of our army and we finally managed to make our∠way here only to find this mess! What the hell's going on?!∨Wait, is that you, ♂㈱? Where's Odessa? Why isn't∠she here to greet us?"},{"id":1031003078,"text":"Well..."},{"id":1031003079,"text":"You must be Sir Flik."},{"id":1031003080,"text":"Yeah? And who are you?!"},{"id":1031003081,"text":"I'm Mathiu Silverberg, Odessa's brother. I serve as the∠Liberation Army's Chief Military Strategist."},{"id":1031003082,"text":"Odessa's brother...∨Okay, so why isn't she the one greeting us? She's here,∠isn't she?"},{"id":1031003083,"text":"Odessa is dead."},{"id":1031003084,"text":"Mathiu!"},{"id":1031003085,"text":"...No!"},{"id":1031003086,"text":"Wh-What? So the rumors that she's missing…"},{"id":1031003087,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, shall I tell him?"},{"id":1031003088,"text":"But Odessa's final wish..."},{"id":1031003089,"text":"Odessa made her final wish to keep the Liberation Army from∠falling apart.∨But now that we've rebuilt it, it's time we told the truth."},{"id":1031003090,"text":"What's this? What're you hiding? What do you mean,∠\"Odessa is dead\"? Answer me, ♂㈱!"},{"id":1031003091,"text":"We can't keep it a secret forever. Many already have their∠suspicions."},{"id":1031003092,"text":"∠Go ahead."},{"id":1031003093,"text":"Odessa was killed during the attack on the hideout at∠Lenankamp."},{"id":1031003094,"text":"What?! Viktor! How could you let that happen?! You were∠supposed to protect her!"},{"id":1031003095,"text":"Forgive me, Flik."},{"id":1031003096,"text":"Odessa was concerned about the future of the Liberation Army∠right until her last breath."},{"id":1031003097,"text":"I see. And I suppose ♂㈱ was appointed as her∠successor?"},{"id":1031003098,"text":"That's correct."},{"id":1031003099,"text":"You can't be serious! Humphrey! Sanchez! You just went∠along with this and let it happen?∨How could he of all people replace Odessa?!"},{"id":1031003100,"text":"...We need a leader. And ♂㈱ is doing well."},{"id":1031003101,"text":"Calm down now, Flik. Wasn't there a reason you came here?"},{"id":1031003102,"text":"Sure, I came here for a reason. One to be shared with∠Odessa, not you, ♂㈱!∨Humphrey, Sanchez, I'll be staying at the inn in Kaku.∠If you change your minds, come join me.∨Unless you actually plan on sticking around with this lot!"},{"id":1031003103,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I believe Flik is in shock after∠hearing about Lady Odessa's death.∨He's not usually like that."},{"id":1031003104,"text":"We should sit down and have a proper talk with Flik.∨After all, he was Vice Commander of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1031003105,"text":"Agreed. Right now, we need all the help we can get."},{"id":1031003106,"text":"Looks like everyone's here. Now then, listen up.∨After the attack on our hideout at Lenankamp, I fled west∠toward Milich's domain."},{"id":1031003107,"text":"Milich... You're speaking of Milich Oppenheimer, ∠the Flower General of the Five Great Generals."},{"id":1031003108,"text":"Right. I was gathering the scattered remnants of the∠Liberation Army.∨Suddenly, the Empire intensified their crackdown on the∠rebel factions, and many of our comrades were captured.∨That was when I heard about the new Liberation Army∠and made my way here.∨We must fight together to liberate Milich's domain in the∠west."},{"id":1031003109,"text":"Agreed. If we combine Sir Flik's forces with our own...∨...we should be able to break through the entrance to the∠west: Garan Fortress. Commander ♂㈱, what do∠you think?"},{"id":1031003110,"text":"Very well. Prepare to depart."},{"id":1031003111,"text":"Understood. We will begin preparations immediately."},{"id":1031003112,"text":"∠It is not yet time for battle."},{"id":1031003113,"text":"I see. Perhaps it's best to wait until we have more forces."},{"id":1031003114,"text":"Shall we attack Garan Fortress?"},{"id":1031003115,"text":"Would you like to switch party members?"},{"id":1031003116,"text":"You acquired Mathiu's Letter!"},{"id":1031003117,"text":"You acquired the Fake Orders!"},{"id":1031003119,"text":"Now what do we do? We can't go any further."},{"id":1031003120,"text":"This isn't going to work with a regular boat."},{"id":1031003131,"text":"I don't know. Viktor was the one who said there was."},{"id":1031003132,"text":"Wow, this place is something else. Must be teeming with∠monsters inside."},{"id":1031003133,"text":"Hold on, you're going as well? Please be careful."},{"id":1031003134,"text":"Of course I am. As if I'd sit here twiddling my thumbs∠and miss out on the adventure of a lifetime!"},{"id":1031003158,"text":"Good morning, Young Master. Did you rest well?∨This place is no mansion, but at least it's a roof over our∠heads.∨When you're ready, let's go visit Mathiu. We should consult∠him about recruiting this Lepant fellow."},{"id":1031003159,"text":"Good morning, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Did you get a good night's sleep? Now then, let's get down to∠business.∨Lepant lives in the town of Kouan. He is an honorable man.∠If you tell him I sent you, I'm certain he'll lend you a hand."},{"id":1031003160,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱, of course you're takin' me with you.∠Right?"},{"id":1031003161,"text":"Master ♂㈱, I'll join you as well."},{"id":1031003162,"text":"Who else will you take, Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1031003163,"text":"Y-Young Master, this isn't the way to Mathiu's room."},{"id":1031003221,"text":"So sorry. I'm busy with my research."},{"id":1031017027,"text":"What're you talking about? Don't you trust my hunches?"},{"id":1031017028,"text":"Your hunches?∨Pfft. Thanks to your hunches, we nearly got captured by the∠Imperials, remember?"},{"id":1031017029,"text":"Teeheehee. I was feeling out of sorts that day."},{"id":1031017030,"text":"Hey, what's the matter? What're you two bickering about?"},{"id":1031017031,"text":"Anyway, I'm telling you, I've got a hunch. He's a spy for∠sure, and my proof is that he won't say a word."},{"id":1031017032,"text":"Well, that doesn't necessarily make him a spy."},{"id":1031017033,"text":"You two! I asked, \"what are you bickering about?!\""},{"id":1031017034,"text":"Oh, um, welcome back, Sir Flik, ∠Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1031017035,"text":"Hahaha! Look at you, acting all coy in front of∠♂㈱.∨But you just don't have what it takes to pull it off. Sorry."},{"id":1031017036,"text":"!!!∨You've got some nerve... Hey! Get back here!"},{"id":1031017037,"text":"Wh-What in the world..."},{"id":1031017038,"text":"You've returned. I take it your meeting with the Knights∠of the Dragons' Den was..."},{"id":1031017039,"text":"...Uh-huh."},{"id":1031017040,"text":"Well? So you managed to secure an alliance?"},{"id":1031017041,"text":"Don't worry, Master Strategist. Humphrey just needs to work∠on his communication skills."},{"id":1031017042,"text":"...Uh-huh."},{"id":1031017043,"text":"By the way, who's that silent fellow over there?"},{"id":1031017044,"text":"Kasumi and Krin caught him skulking around the castle.∨He refuses to say anything, no matter what we ask him.∠We were waiting for your return before deciding what to do."},{"id":1031017045,"text":"♂㈱? You must be Commander ♂㈱ of∠the Liberation Army!∨Thank goodness. Now I can keep my word to Master Warren.∨I kept silent because I was ordered not to speak to anyone∠until I met you in person.∨Kasim Hazil, Teo McDohl's replacement for the northern∠defense, has lately taken to using extremely aggressive∠measures to suppress the rebel factions."},{"id":1031017046,"text":"He must be looking to turn the tide."},{"id":1031017047,"text":"Master Warren is a wealthy man, well known in the North,∠and even respected by the Imperials.∨He used this influence to harbor fugitives of the Empire∠in his home.∨This led to Kasim Hazil and his soldiers laying siege to∠the mansion.∨Master Warren and Sir Viktor, who happened to be visiting,∠fought valiantly against the Imperials, but they were∠eventually captured.∨My master told me to bring news of what took place to the∠Liberation Army."},{"id":1031017048,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Viktor is one of the Liberation∠Army's greatest assets. As for Warren, despite his wealth,∨he is an honorable man whom many follow.∠We must rescue them at all costs."},{"id":1031017049,"text":"At present, Kasim Hazil's troops are estimated to be over∠8,000 strong."},{"id":1031017050,"text":"On top of that, they're a well-trained army, while we're∠just a ragtag band of fighters."},{"id":1031017051,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we're still disorganized as an∠army.∨If we're to continue fighting, we need to give our troops some∠proper military training."},{"id":1031017052,"text":"Agreed.∠"},{"id":1031017053,"text":"Very well. Allow me to make the necessary preparations.∠I suggest you retire early tonight, Commander ∠♂㈱. We have a busy day ahead."},{"id":1031017054,"text":"I'm not sure...∠"},{"id":1031017055,"text":"I believe it is necessary for our soldiers to receive∠military training before Kasim Hazil attacks."},{"id":1031017056,"text":"Commander, perhaps you should listen to your military∠strategist's advice."},{"id":1031017057,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I too agree with Sir Mathiu's∠suggestion."},{"id":1031017058,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, there's something important∠I must discuss with you."},{"id":1031017059,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, it appears a spy has infiltrated∠the Liberation Army.∨While you were away, I sent Kasumi, Krin, and several others∠on a reconnaissance mission into imperial territory. Based on∠their report, it seems intelligence is being leaked from within∠our army.∨But I have a plan. Commander ♂㈱, with your∠permission, I'd like to oversee the maneuvers for tomorrow's∠military training."},{"id":1031017061,"text":"Please, let me implement my plan."},{"id":1031017062,"text":"Do you not trust me?"},{"id":1031017063,"text":"For tomorrow's plan to work, it must be kept a secret.∠Please let me handle this."},{"id":1031017064,"text":"All right."},{"id":1031017065,"text":"Thank you, Commander ♂㈱. Well then, you must∠be tired. I'll leave you now to rest."},{"id":1031017066,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Do you hold a grudge against∠me for what happened that day?∨For leaving Pahn behind when Teo McDohl forced our retreat?∨You may think me heartless for what I did... But I'm willing∠to make any sacrifice to win this battle.∨Even if you can't forgive me, please don't forget that this∠is the cost of war."},{"id":1031017067,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the coming battles will be∠fiercer than ever.∨I am prepared to do what it takes to win, no matter what the∠sacrifice may be..."},{"id":1031017068,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, all preparations are complete."},{"id":1031017069,"text":"Good. Let's go.∠"},{"id":1031017070,"text":"Hey, Hix. Come with me. I'll teach you how to fight."},{"id":1031017071,"text":"Uhhh... What should I do, Tengaar?"},{"id":1031017072,"text":"Psh. What a little brat."},{"id":1031017073,"text":"Hold on, I forgot something..."},{"id":1031017074,"text":"Please hurry. Everyone is waiting."},{"id":1031017209,"text":"I'm Fu Su Lu, the strongest man in the world."},{"id":1031027001,"text":"I remember you. You used to be one of General Teo's servants."},{"id":1031027002,"text":"My name is Cleo, Lady Sonya."},{"id":1031027003,"text":"What're you doing here? I take it you're another traitor?"},{"id":1031027004,"text":"Lady Sonya. I was always by Master Teo's side.∨So I understand how you feel, I really do. I also know about∠your relationship with Master Teo..."},{"id":1031027005,"text":"Insolent girl! Don't speak another word!"},{"id":1031027006,"text":"Lady Sonya... Do you think Master Teo hated Master∠♂㈱?"},{"id":1031027008,"text":"You're the one person who could have become the mother to∠Master ♂㈱.∨And yet now you despise him. I can't bear the thought."},{"id":1031027009,"text":"But I cannot abandon my loyalty to the Empire and to∠General Teo."},{"id":1031027010,"text":"The look on Master Teo's face when he died was...one∠of peace.∨He seemed happy to witness how much his son had grown.∠Please remember that."},{"id":1031027011,"text":"♂㈱... What do you want? If you wish to execute∠me, do it quickly."},{"id":1031027012,"text":"I've no business with you.∠"},{"id":1031027013,"text":"Then don't speak to me."},{"id":1031027014,"text":"I want you to join us."},{"id":1031027015,"text":"............∨I despise you. Yet you want me to join you?"},{"id":1031027016,"text":"You have a point there.∠"},{"id":1031027017,"text":"You and I see things very differently."},{"id":1031027018,"text":"It doesn't matter."},{"id":1031027019,"text":"......∨Very well. I'll join you. But I won't help you fight.∠I'll stay by your side, so I can witness your death."},{"id":1031027020,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Shasarazade has fallen.∠Our way to the capital is now clear.∨It is time to gather our forces and attack Gregminster.∨Commander ♂㈱, please give me the order to∠march forward."},{"id":1031027021,"text":"As a physician, let me make this clear. I will not allow∠Sir Mathiu to go into battle."},{"id":1031027022,"text":"But I must go. I can't just abandon my duty.∨I swore to my sister, Odessa..."},{"id":1031027023,"text":"Let's wait and see what happens.∠"},{"id":1031027024,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you know what must be done.∠Why do you hesitate?"},{"id":1031027025,"text":"Commander ♂㈱! If you miss this chance, you∠will never defeat the Empire!∨......∨Forgive me. I spoke out of turn. But please think it over,∠Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1031027026,"text":"I told you before, didn't I? I am prepared to sacrifice∠anything to win this war.∨And that includes my own life."},{"id":1031027027,"text":"We march on the capital."},{"id":1031027028,"text":"Thank you, Commander ♂㈱...∨Twenty thousand imperial troops remain within the capital.∠They will be desperate and prepared to fight to the death.∨Please gather all the members of the Liberation Army.∠We must raise the morale of all our forces."},{"id":1031027029,"text":"All right. Our troops have all assembled, Sir Mathiu."},{"id":1031027030,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's begin.∨Warriors of the Liberation Army! The time has come at last!∠This is the final hour of the tyrannical imperial regime∠that has oppressed us for far too long!"},{"id":1031027031,"text":"Think of your friends, think of your families, and fight∠for them today!"},{"id":1031027032,"text":"The earth quakes with the wrath of the people. Their cries∠echo in the heavens. Now is the time for this to end."},{"id":1031027033,"text":"You have reached this moment at last, ♂㈱. ∠The time has come to tell you everything.∨My sister, Windy, lusts for vengeance against this world.∠Centuries ago, our ancestors, the Gate Rune Clan,∠possessed a power that led to their massacre.∨Windy and I alone escaped, using this power—the power of∠the Gate Rune. The Gate Rune consists of two runes, the∠Front and Back, or the \"entrance\" and \"exit.\"∨My sister possesses the Front Gate Rune, and I, the Back.∠Our powers are two sides of the same coin."},{"id":1031027034,"text":"Then it was Windy who tried to kill you?"},{"id":1031027035,"text":"To increase her own power, my sister attempted to take the∠Back Gate Rune from me.∨That is why I fled to Magician's Island. I set up wards to∠guard the Gate Rune and waited patiently, biding my time.∨I was waiting for someone like you to appear, ♂㈱."},{"id":1031027036,"text":"Listen, everyone. The 108 Stars of Destiny have all come∠together here.∨You are all wandering stars, traveling freely across the∠skies. Yet you have gathered to this one place. Together,∠you will surely be victorious."},{"id":1031027037,"text":"Now wait a minute, lady. You said there were 108 Stars here.∠But you're wrong.∨We're missing one."},{"id":1031027038,"text":"......"},{"id":1031027039,"text":"...Gremio."},{"id":1031027040,"text":"♂㈱, I will show you the power of my Gate Rune.∨Warriors of the Liberation Army, members of the 108 Stars of∠Destiny, quiet your hearts, and think of your friend."},{"id":1031027041,"text":"Let the dimensional gates open, unite the hearts of the∠108 Stars, and bring him here to us..."},{"id":1031027042,"text":"Oh, I don't want to die here. There's so much more to do for∠the Young Master.∨That's right. I left the laundry hanging... And I need new∠ingredients for the stew... Huh? Wh-Wha...?"},{"id":1031027043,"text":"Gremio!"},{"id":1031027044,"text":"Gremiooo!"},{"id":1031027045,"text":"Cleo, Pahn..."},{"id":1031027046,"text":"Y-Young Master... I..."},{"id":1031027047,"text":"You have witnessed the combined power of the Gate Rune∠and the 108 Stars. But this will not be possible again."},{"id":1031027048,"text":"Listen, everyone. You are all wandering stars, traveling∠freely across the skies.∨Yet you have gathered to this one place. Together, you will∠surely be victorious."},{"id":1031027049,"text":"Our war with the Empire is nearing its end. We have lost∠many of our own.∨For our departed comrades—and above all, for the sake of∠our future—we must fight on.∨We must bring an end to this war. Under the banner of the∠Liberation Army, under our commander, ♂㈱."},{"id":1031027050,"text":"Victory will be ours!"},{"id":1031027051,"text":"Y'all better put up a good fight tomorrow! Ain't that right,∠Sydonia?!"},{"id":1031027052,"text":"Heh."},{"id":1031027053,"text":"Come on! Mend what you can mend. This is our final chance."},{"id":1031027054,"text":"We show them power of Kobolds! Everyone, follow∠Kuromimi! Woof! Woof!"},{"id":1031027055,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, this will be our last battle.∠I await your orders."},{"id":1031027056,"text":"Hold on a minute.∠"},{"id":1031027057,"text":"This is our last battle. Let's have no regrets."},{"id":1031027058,"text":"All right. Advance!"},{"id":1031027059,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1031027122,"text":"This is a game where you and I take turns throwing dice.∠Whoever rolls the higher number wins, of course.∨You roll three dice at once, and if two come out the same,∠the number on the third die is your score.∨If you get 4-5-6 or three of any number other than 1,∠you're in luck. But 1-2-3 or three 1s is unlucky.∨If you fail to roll a hand after three tries, or if your∠dice go out of bounds, you lose. So watch carefully where∠you throw the dice.∨Want me to repeat that?"},{"id":1031028001,"text":"Sir Mathiu."},{"id":1031028002,"text":"What can I do for you, Sir Humphrey?"},{"id":1031028003,"text":"I heard you used to serve in the Imperial Army.∨And that you parted ways with the Empire after the Kalekka∠Incident."},{"id":1031028004,"text":"Yes. That's right. I was unable to prevent that unfortunate∠tragedy.∨In the midst of the war, I realized just how powerless I∠was, so I left the Empire. I had hoped to lead a quiet life,∠to never involve myself in another war."},{"id":1031028005,"text":"I was one of the imperial soldiers who attacked Kalekka.∨I still can't forget what happened that day.∨In my rage, I cut down my own commander and became∠a fugitive of the Empire.∨That was the first time I killed someone out of pure hatred.∨And I pray...it will be the last."},{"id":1031028006,"text":"Humphrey, now is not the time to worry about such things.∠We have work to do.∨Once the war is over..."},{"id":1031028007,"text":"Hey, you old fart. We got a big battle to fight tomorrow.∠What the heck're ya doin' here?"},{"id":1031028008,"text":"I should ask the same of you, greenhorn. I told you not to∠enter my room without permission."},{"id":1031028009,"text":"Listen, fossil. Ya may not be around after tomorrow,∠so I came to get one last look at that ugly mug of yours.∨I've been up workin' all night too, thanks to Sir∠Mathiu's crazy strategy. And this is the welcome I get..."},{"id":1031028010,"text":"Hohoho! Well then, there's a bottle I've been saving for∠just this kind of special occasion."},{"id":1031028011,"text":"Tomorrow's going to be a big battle, Pahn. Please keep me∠safe."},{"id":1031028012,"text":"Tomorrow's going to be a big battle."},{"id":1031028013,"text":"Yeah."},{"id":1031028014,"text":"It looks like our Young Master is all grown up and beyond our∠reach now."},{"id":1031028016,"text":"I miss him a little."},{"id":1031028017,"text":"I miss him a lot."},{"id":1031028018,"text":"Come on, Tai Ho. What's wrong? You're not drinking at all."},{"id":1031028019,"text":"Hm? Oh, just thinking about tomorrow."},{"id":1031028020,"text":"It isn't like you to worry. How about the two of us drink∠the night away?"},{"id":1031028021,"text":"The two of us? Seems like we're a group of three."},{"id":1031028022,"text":"That's right, Tai Ho. How about the three of us stay up all∠night drinking?"},{"id":1031028023,"text":"(Jeez. Read the room already, Yam Koo.)"},{"id":1031028024,"text":"(Tai Ho has a weakness for the pretty ladies. Better stick∠around and keep him safe.)"},{"id":1031028025,"text":"Say, Hix. Isn't the moon beautiful tonight?"},{"id":1031028026,"text":"Huh? Did you say something, Tengaar?∨Anyway, this fish is delicious. You should try some."},{"id":1031028027,"text":"Seriously, why are you always like this?"},{"id":1031028028,"text":"Wh-What's the matter? Why are you so upset?"},{"id":1031028029,"text":"I am not upset!"},{"id":1031028030,"text":"Sir Flik? What're you doing out here? You'll catch a cold."},{"id":1031028031,"text":"Oh, nothing. Just thinking."},{"id":1031028032,"text":"About...Lady Odessa?"},{"id":1031028033,"text":"............"},{"id":1031028034,"text":"We have an early morning tomorrow. Better get back to bed.∠If you can't sleep, I have a fine bottle of wine that'll do∠the job nicely."},{"id":1031028035,"text":"I appreciate it, Sanchez."},{"id":1031028036,"text":"*snoring*∨Heeheehee...∨Wow, so much treasure. I can't carry it all. Teeheehee!"},{"id":1031028037,"text":"What do you think? Can we win tomorrow's battle?"},{"id":1031028038,"text":"We can. We can, but..."},{"id":1031028039,"text":"But?"},{"id":1031028040,"text":"Many young lives will be lost. It pains me to think of it."},{"id":1031028041,"text":"Indeed. We old ones are ready for what's to come...∨But it hurts to watch the young die before their time."},{"id":1031028042,"text":"Knock-knock, ♂㈱."},{"id":1031028043,"text":"Did I wake ya? I'm relieved to see you can sleep before∠tomorrow's big battle.∨The mark of a true leader.∨There's somethin' I want to give you, ♂㈱. Take it."},{"id":1031028044,"text":"You acquired the Bronze Axe."},{"id":1031028045,"text":"This was Gremio's axe. I brought it back with me from∠Soniere Prison.∨I've kept it hidden until now, as I thought it would only∠cause you more pain.∨But since I may also lose my life tomorrow, I thought I'd∠give it to you tonight.∨♂㈱, tomorrow will be a big battle. Many lives will∠be lost.∨But you must continue forward. For the sake of all those∠who fought for a better future. For Gremio."},{"id":1031028046,"text":"I'm gonna head back to my room now."},{"id":1031028047,"text":"♂㈱. Let's win tomorrow."},{"id":1031029046,"text":"...I see. Doctor Liukan?∨Very well. I have an idea. Please wait a moment..."},{"id":1031029047,"text":"In the town of Antei, which I believe is now referred to as∠Bier Blanche...∨...there lives a forger by the name of Kimberly. Let's∠recruit her along with a scrivener called Tesla.∨Kimberly is an acquaintance of mine. I've written a letter.∠Give this to her, and she should join our cause."},{"id":1031029048,"text":"What do you need them for?"},{"id":1031029049,"text":"I'll let you know later. For now, please go and find∠Kimberly and Tesla."},{"id":1031029050,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I see you've returned.∨All the necessary arrangements have been made. Kimberly and∠Tesla have done an excellent job."},{"id":1031029051,"text":"My work is always perfect."},{"id":1031029052,"text":"I-I did pretty well too, I think..."},{"id":1031029053,"text":"An excellent job on what?"},{"id":1031029054,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, what I have here are imperial∠orders forged by these two.∨Milich's signature, the official imperial seal, they're all∠completely identical to the genuine article. With these∠papers, you can walk right into Soniere Prison.∨Please use these to free Doctor Liukan."},{"id":1031029055,"text":"You acquired the Fake Orders!"},{"id":1031029056,"text":"I never imagined Gremio would end up dead.∨Death may be a part of war, but I still can't accept it."},{"id":1031029057,"text":"Master ♂㈱, I... I... Damn it!"},{"id":1031029058,"text":"♂㈱. Were you able to get some sleep? ∠Best to think about other things now.∨This is our chance to attack Milich's castle. If you'd∠prefer not to command the troops, I could...∨No, you should do it. As the commander of the Liberation∠Army, you must not show weakness."},{"id":1031029059,"text":"I heard Gremio gave his life to save yours, huh?∨Listen, don't even think of wasting his precious gift to∠you. I'll never forgive you if you do."},{"id":1031029060,"text":"♂㈱. I'm starting to understand why Odessa chose∠you.∨You'd better not let her...or Gremio down."},{"id":1031029061,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, as your military strategist, allow∠me to offer my advice.∨Now is the time to attack Scarleticia Castle."},{"id":1031029062,"text":"This here is some antitoxin.∨I grew sick of this crazy world and was about to retire to∠the mountains to live a quiet life as a recluse. But I've∠changed my mind.∨I wish to fight alongside you. Please allow me to join you,∠Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1031029063,"text":"All right. Prepare the troops."},{"id":1031029064,"text":"Right away, sir."},{"id":1031029065,"text":"∠I just don't feel like it right now."},{"id":1031029066,"text":"What do you mean, Commander ♂㈱? You are the∠leader of the Liberation Army.∨There are matters more important than your emotions∠currently at stake."},{"id":1031029067,"text":"♂㈱...∨♂㈱...∨Wake up, ♂㈱..."},{"id":1031029068,"text":"♂㈱, I know you feel lost.∨Gremio's death, the battle against your father...∠But you must press on."},{"id":1031029069,"text":"Why?"},{"id":1031029070,"text":"∠Perhaps, but..."},{"id":1031029071,"text":"It's time I told you about my elder sister, Windy, and I...∨Windy and I are survivors of the Gate Rune Clan.∠♂㈱, look at the rune on your right hand, the one∠Ted gave you."},{"id":1031029072,"text":"That rune, the Soul Eater, is one of the 27 True Runes.∨There are many runes in this world. But they were all∠created from the 27 True Runes.∨Thus, the 27 True Runes hide terrifying powers within them.∠Even your Soul Eater has yet to reveal its true potential.∨My sister, Windy, also carries one of the 27 True Runes:∠the Gate Rune.∨The Gate Rune already holds immense power, but she desires∠something even greater. That is why she is after you.∨If my sister obtains two True Runes and uses them for∠revenge, she will destroy the fabric of this world.∨The True Runes are far too powerful to be used by humans.∠You alone can stop my sister.∨The hour nears. Please. Do not lose heart..."},{"id":1031029073,"text":"Hey, listen up, Commander! I've got an idea!"},{"id":1031029074,"text":"What is it? Spit it out!"},{"id":1031029075,"text":"Fire Spears. You remember them, don't you?"},{"id":1031029076,"text":"Sure. Didn't we deliver the blueprints to Sarady?"},{"id":1031029077,"text":"That's right. If we can get our hands on them, we should be∠able to defeat the armored cavalry.∨After all, the Fire Spears were Odessa's parting gift to us."},{"id":1031029078,"text":"It may be difficult. When the old Liberation Army's hideout∠was attacked, it seems that other hideouts were also∠destroyed.∨Who knows if the secret factory survived?"},{"id":1031029079,"text":"Well, we're out of options, I say we put it all on black."},{"id":1031029080,"text":"Hey there, boss."},{"id":1031029081,"text":"Watch it. That's Commander ♂㈱ to you."},{"id":1031029082,"text":"Will ya shut up?∠Anyway, take a look. This is a high-speed boat I built.∨Well, the old geezer there did help a little. We're about∠to have a launchin' ceremony. Care to take it for a spin?"},{"id":1031029083,"text":"Sure, I'll go for a ride."},{"id":1031029084,"text":"Wow, this is really something. Everybody, hang on tight!∠Full speed ahead!"},{"id":1031029085,"text":"Whoa, hold on. There's no way an amateur can pilot this.∨Bring along someone who knows their way around a boat."},{"id":1031029086,"text":"∠Maybe later."},{"id":1031029087,"text":"No problem. Besides, an amateur can't pilot this thing.∨Ya need someone who knows their way around a boat."},{"id":1031029088,"text":"What, is there somethin' wrong with it?∨Oh, I see! Ya don't like the fact this dusty old fraud was∠involved, huh?"},{"id":1031029089,"text":"Why, you disrespectful little upstart!"},{"id":1031029090,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the troops are tired as well.∠Please, get some rest."},{"id":1031029091,"text":"Damn! What the hell was that back there?! Our attacks were∠completely useless!"},{"id":1031029092,"text":"Armored cavalry..."},{"id":1031029093,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, your bed has been prepared.∠For now, just clear your mind and rest..."},{"id":1031029094,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I believe my sister...∠Odessa, has saved us."},{"id":1031029095,"text":"Hey, Flik came up with an idea while you were asleep."},{"id":1031029096,"text":"Good news, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Flik wants to speak..."},{"id":1031029097,"text":"Ummm, sorry... I can't remember the spell right now!"},{"id":1031029098,"text":"What an insolent tongue he has..."},{"id":1031029099,"text":"I am beat. 'Scuse me while I go hit the hay."},{"id":1031029100,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, my name is Kasumi. ∠I am a ninja from the village of Rokkaku.∨My village has resisted imperial rule for a long time, but∠it finally fell to Teo McDohl's army...∨Our clan leader, Hanzo, helped me escape. He instructed me∠to report what took place to the Liberation Army.∠Commander ♂㈱, allow me to join you in battle..."},{"id":1031029101,"text":"So the day has finally come."},{"id":1031029102,"text":"Am I really to fight Master Teo?"},{"id":1031029103,"text":"Let us go now and prepare to meet them."},{"id":1031029104,"text":"They're here. They're finally here. On the far shore.∠There's a lot of 'em."},{"id":1031029105,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I suggest we first exchange a few∠blows to assess their strength."},{"id":1031029106,"text":"All right."},{"id":1031029107,"text":"∠I'd rather not fight my father..."},{"id":1031029108,"text":"What are you saying? You knew this day would come."},{"id":1031029109,"text":"You are now the leader of the Liberation Army. Take a look∠at your troops. Will you abandon them here?"},{"id":1031029110,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, this is an opponent you were∠always destined to face."},{"id":1031029111,"text":"It's been a while, my son. My, how you've grown. You'd make∠any father proud...∨Leader of the Liberation Army? Yes, I've heard. We both know∠there's no going back, that you wouldn't even if you could.∨You follow your truth. I'll protect mine. Expect no mercy∠from me."},{"id":1031029112,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. Please hurry. Teo's army should∠be here any time now."},{"id":1031029169,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we've now liberated most of the∠Empire. Only the capital remains."},{"id":1031029170,"text":"The Liberation Army's strength is almost comparable to that∠of the Imperial Army's principal forces within the capital."},{"id":1031029171,"text":"However, the primary forces of the Imperial Army still∠remain intact. The day of the decisive battle draws near.∨Therefore, to ensure the Liberation Army is well-prepared,∠I suggest we divide our troops into five units.∨You will need to appoint five generals, each of whom will∠command their own unit.∨Commander ♂㈱. I ask that you choose your∠generals, the Five Tiger Generals that will serve as the∠backbone of your army."},{"id":1031029172,"text":"Okay, we're ready. Where do we attack next? The capital∠would be my guess."},{"id":1031029173,"text":"To get to the capital, we must get past Kwaba Fortress,∠guarded by General Ain Gide.∨Or if we approach by water, we must get past the Floating∠Fortress of Shasarazade, guarded by General Sonya Shulen."},{"id":1031029174,"text":"I say we go with Kwaba Fortress. We don't have enough boats∠to attack Shasarazade."},{"id":1031029175,"text":"Of course, that's exactly what the enemy will think. Don't∠worry about the boats. I'll have 500 of them ready by∠tomorrow."},{"id":1031029176,"text":"500?!"},{"id":1031029177,"text":"That's just not possible.∠"},{"id":1031029178,"text":"As my name is Mathiu Silverberg, I will deliver on my word."},{"id":1031029179,"text":"If they are not ready by tomorrow, I will gladly part with∠my head."},{"id":1031029180,"text":"Hey ♂㈱, our chief strategist says he's sure.∠Let's give him the benefit of the doubt."},{"id":1031029181,"text":"All right. Get to work on it then."},{"id":1031029182,"text":"Thank you, Commander. I swear to make good on my∠promise. You will see tomorrow morning."},{"id":1031029183,"text":"Tomorrow's gonna be a big battle. Better turn in early∠tonight."},{"id":1031029290,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we should be able to defeat the∠armored cavalry with our Fire Spears.∨Please, sir. Give the order to advance."},{"id":1031029291,"text":"Order all troops to advance."},{"id":1031029292,"text":"Very good, sir.∨Inform all the troops. The fate of the Liberation Army is at∠stake in this battle. We must all rise to the challenge."},{"id":1031029293,"text":"∠No, let's wait and see."},{"id":1031029294,"text":"Very well, sir. But we can't stay cooped up in this castle∠forever."},{"id":1031029295,"text":"My son. It appears we must face each other..."},{"id":1031029296,"text":"Commander ♂㈱. I'm glad to see you've returned∠safely.∨It was a significant achievement to liberate the Lorimar∠region without the use of the army."},{"id":1031029297,"text":"According to Kasumi's sources, Kasim Hazil has been placed∠in charge of the northern defenses and is presently∠mustering his forces."},{"id":1031029298,"text":"There are nearly 8,000 imperial soldiers under Kasim Hazil,∠another 6,000 in the Floating Fortress of Shasarazade...∨...and around 10,000 troops in the capital."},{"id":1031029299,"text":"At our current strength, Kasim's army is about all we can∠handle.∨The only way we stand a chance is to unite all the rebel∠factions throughout the land."},{"id":1031029300,"text":"I happen to be old friends with Joshua. He's the commander∠of the Dragon Knights. Their domain is in the west.∨If you plan to ally with them, I'll come along with you."},{"id":1031029301,"text":"The Dragon Knights do not fall under imperial jurisdiction.∠They've remained neutral until now.∨If we can get them to join us, we may be able to turn this∠situation around.∨But I have to warn you, the Dragon Knights are a proud lot,∠especially their commander, Joshua. The only chance of an∠alliance is for you to go in person, Commander ∠♂㈱."},{"id":1031029302,"text":"♂㈱, if you're going, then so am I."},{"id":1031029303,"text":"∠Let's go meet these Dragon Knights."},{"id":1031029304,"text":"...All right then."},{"id":1031029305,"text":"The Dragon Knights' domain lies just northwest of the now-∠liberated town of Antei, formerly known as Bier Blanche."},{"id":1031029306,"text":"I'd prefer not to go."},{"id":1031029307,"text":"...I see."},{"id":1031029308,"text":"Hold on. You're kidding right, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1031029309,"text":"Come on, think it through. If we can get the Dragon Knights∠to join us, we'll be so much the stronger for it."},{"id":1031029310,"text":"I agree. The only way we will succeed in recruiting the∠proud Dragon Knights...∨...is for you to convince them in person, Commander∠♂㈱."},{"id":1031029311,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the Liberation Army has already∠freed the domains of Kwanda Rosman in the south and Milich∠Oppenheimer in the west.∨The strength of our forces increases by the day. Meanwhile,∠insurgencies have broken out across the Empire, keeping the∠Imperial Army's hands full."},{"id":1031029312,"text":"This must mean news of Teo McDohl's defeat is spreading."},{"id":1031029313,"text":"To quell the rebellion, the Empire is massing their forces∠from their rural territories.∨As a result, some of these domains are now poorly defended.∠We should take advantage of the imperial forces' weakness...∨...and unite the various rebel factions in each region.∠That would be the right move here."},{"id":1031029314,"text":"I agree with Sir Lepant's suggestion."},{"id":1031029315,"text":"According to my sources, imperial soldiers were seen∠pulling out of the Lorimar region."},{"id":1031029316,"text":"The Fortress of Lorimar, which serves as the entrance∠point to the region, will be poorly defended."},{"id":1031029317,"text":"...I agree."},{"id":1031029318,"text":"All right then! How about it, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1031029319,"text":"We'll attack the Fortress of Lorimar!"},{"id":1031029320,"text":"Lorimar, huh? It's been a long time..."},{"id":1031029321,"text":"∠Let's wait a little longer."},{"id":1031029322,"text":"Very well, sir. Please let me know when you've reached a∠decision. In any case, I will begin making preparations."},{"id":1031029323,"text":"Shall we march to Lorimar?"},{"id":1031029355,"text":"Oh, heya, boss. Take a look at this. That master strategist∠of yours comes up with the craziest ideas."},{"id":1031029356,"text":"Seriously. I can't believe he used my Thrash for this."},{"id":1031029357,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please take a look at these ice∠boats.∨Apparently, they were made by freezing lake water with∠dragon breath."},{"id":1031029358,"text":"Well, you don't see that every day. They're floatin' all∠right, and pretty sturdy to boot."},{"id":1031029359,"text":"As promised, I have prepared 500 boats. We now await your∠orders, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1031029360,"text":"Hold on a minute."},{"id":1031029361,"text":"Very well, sir. But please hurry before the ice melts."},{"id":1031029362,"text":"∠All right, let us advance!"},{"id":1031029363,"text":"Yes, sir. I'll give the order."},{"id":1031029486,"text":"Come on, ♂㈱. Help us out."},{"id":1031029487,"text":"The Fortress of Garan is west of Kouan. There are around∠6,000 troops guarding it."},{"id":1031029489,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Sir Flik wishes to speak with∠you."},{"id":1031029490,"text":"Y-Young Master... Master Teo is..."},{"id":1031029491,"text":"I...always knew this day would come, and yet..."},{"id":1031029492,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, this is Kasumi, a ninja from the∠village of Rokkaku."},{"id":1031029493,"text":"These Fire Spears were Odessa's parting gift to us.∠With them in our hands, I'm certain we'll win!"},{"id":1031029494,"text":"Again, against Master Teo..."},{"id":1031029495,"text":"Way ahead of ya, chief. The Fire Spears are already loaded∠up and prepped for use."},{"id":1031029496,"text":"Lately, we've been winnin' battle after battle. We got this∠next one in the bag too. Just leave it to me!"},{"id":1031029497,"text":"The Fortress of Lorimar... Beyond it lies the Warriors'∠Village, where I was born."},{"id":1031029498,"text":"My sources tell me the Fortress of Lorimar is manned by only∠4,000 imperial troops at present."},{"id":1031029499,"text":"......"},{"id":1031029500,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Sir Lepant wishes to speak with∠you."},{"id":1031029501,"text":"Oh... Commander ♂㈱..."},{"id":1031029502,"text":"This is our chance."},{"id":1031029503,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the strength of our forces∠increases by the day."},{"id":1031029504,"text":"Hey, Commander. What's our next move?"},{"id":1031029505,"text":"If we can recruit the Dragon Knights into our ranks,∠they will be a formidable asset."},{"id":1031029506,"text":"The Dragon Knights... Joshua..."},{"id":1031029507,"text":"Good luck, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1031029508,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, this will decide the course of∠the war."},{"id":1031029509,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... I'll do my best. So...please keep∠an eye out for me."},{"id":1031029510,"text":"...Here goes."},{"id":1031029511,"text":"Once Shasarazade falls, our path to the capital will be∠clear!"},{"id":1031029512,"text":"We'll win this! Isn't that right, Commander?"},{"id":1031029513,"text":"Take care of yourself, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1031029514,"text":"Shasarazade's army is about 17,000 strong. Can we really∠defeat them?"},{"id":1031029515,"text":"Master ♂㈱, you've come so far..."},{"id":1031029516,"text":"Odessa is..."},{"id":1031029517,"text":"Then Lady Odessa is... Was it during that attack on the∠hideout? I can't believe it..."},{"id":1031029518,"text":"If we can get Sir Flik and the survivors of the old∠Liberation Army he brought with him to join us..."},{"id":1031029519,"text":"Kimberly lives in the town of Antei."},{"id":1031029520,"text":"I crafted that sigil myself. Not a soul will ever guess∠it's fake."},{"id":1031029521,"text":"W-Wait. Even if someone does find out, please don't hold it∠against me."},{"id":1031029522,"text":"I'm worried about Doctor Liukan. Please hurry."},{"id":1031029523,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, thank you for saving me."},{"id":1031029524,"text":"All that remains is the imperial capital of Gregminster,∠guarded by Shasarazade and Kwaba Fortress."},{"id":1031029525,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we have reached this point at∠last, at long last."},{"id":1031029526,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱! You doin' good? Me? I'm always good!"},{"id":1031029528,"text":"Come on, Commander. Don't go disappointing Odessa now."},{"id":1031029529,"text":"But to get to the secret factory in the north..."},{"id":1031029530,"text":"We'll just have to head north to where the secret factory∠used to be. By boat, of course."},{"id":1031029531,"text":"I must speak with Sir Mathiu..."},{"id":1031030027,"text":"That rune, the Soul Eater, is one of the 27 True Runes.∨There are many runes in this world. But they were all∠created from the 27 True Runes.∨Thus, the 27 True Runes hide terrifying powers within them.∠Even your Soul Eater has yet to reveal its true potential.∨My sister Windy also carries one of the 27 True Runes,∠the Gate Rune.∨The Gate Rune already holds immense power, but she desires∠something even greater. That is why she is after you.∨If my sister obtains two True Runes and uses them for∠revenge, she will destroy the fabric of this world.∨The True Runes are far too powerful to be used by humans.∠You alone can stop my sister.∨The hour nears. Please. Do not lose heart..."},{"id":1031030103,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we will march north before∠word gets out that the Northern Checkpoint has fallen.∨Sir Lepant, I will give you command of a battalion to attack∠Duha Fortress."},{"id":1031030104,"text":"Very well."},{"id":1031030105,"text":"Sir Humphrey, you will take command of another battalion∠and attack Rakan Fortress."},{"id":1031030106,"text":"...Uh-huh."},{"id":1031030107,"text":"While Kasim Hazil guards the north, he will be forced to∠send aid to each of the fortresses.∨Meanwhile, we will break into Moravia Castle and rescue∠Warren and Viktor.∨This will be carried out by myself, Commander∠♂㈱, Kasumi, Krin, Griffith, and three others."},{"id":1031030108,"text":"Not that I mind being a decoy, but what if the Imperial Army∠sends reinforcements? We'd stand no chance of winning."},{"id":1031030109,"text":"If reinforcements arrive, you must retreat immediately."},{"id":1031030110,"text":"But then we won't have time to break into Moravia Castle."},{"id":1031030111,"text":"Don't worry. I've already arranged for some backup."},{"id":1031030112,"text":"Backup? You mean the Dragon Knights?"},{"id":1031030113,"text":"Not exactly, but they're a dependable force nonetheless.∠That will be all from me.∨We must all act immediately. Commander ♂㈱,∠please choose the party that will infiltrate Moravia∠Castle."},{"id":1031030114,"text":"Well, Sir Lepant, Sir Humphrey. We'll be counting on you."},{"id":1031030115,"text":"I won't let you down."},{"id":1031030116,"text":"...Understood."},{"id":1031030117,"text":"Now then, Commander ♂㈱. Let us make∠preparations of our own."},{"id":1031030118,"text":"What is it? What do you want from me?"},{"id":1031030119,"text":"Griffith, we need you to help us sneak into Moravia Castle."},{"id":1031030120,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1031030121,"text":"Griffith, I want you to pretend you've captured me.∨Commander ♂㈱ will disguise himself as one of∠your men and enter the castle with us."},{"id":1031030122,"text":"I see. A ruse, eh? Not that I mind, but can you really∠trust me not to betray you?"},{"id":1031030123,"text":"I trust you know the fate that awaits your men should∠anything untoward happen to me.∨True, it may not be the fairest of trades, but then you're∠not the kind of commander who would betray his own men."},{"id":1031030124,"text":"Damn it. You see right through me. All right. I'm in."},{"id":1031030125,"text":"Well, then, Commander ♂㈱, let us hurry to∠Moravia Castle."},{"id":1031042051,"text":"That rune, the Soul Eater, is one of the 27 True Runes.∨There are many runes in this world. But they were all∠created from the 27 True Runes.∨Thus, the 27 True Runes hide terrifying powers within them.∠Even your Soul Eater has yet to reveal its true potential.∨My sister Windy also carries one of the 27 True Runes: the∠Gate Rune.∨The Gate Rune already holds immense power, but she desires∠something even greater. That is why she is after you.∨If my sister obtains two True Runes and uses them for∠revenge, she will destroy the fabric of this world.∨The True Runes are far too powerful to be used by humans.∠You alone can stop my sister.∨The time nears. Please. Do not lose heart..."},{"id":1032000041,"text":"I saw an elf! I really did! It walked out of that forest.∠Damn it, no one believes me."},{"id":1032000042,"text":"That's the Great Forest up ahead. Even we never venture∠into it. Folk end up gettin' lost in there."},{"id":1032000043,"text":"Can you believe it? Elves beyond this forest? He says∠he's seen them, but I think he's just gone mad."},{"id":1032000044,"text":"Please don't go there."},{"id":1032000045,"text":"We kobolds, we're all grateful."},{"id":1032000046,"text":"I'm a proud Kobold warrior. But I thank you."},{"id":1032000047,"text":"Oh my, you good-looking for a human."},{"id":1032000048,"text":"Our village lies beyond the Great Forest.∨Let's first head for the Great Forest Village, which is∠located southeast of Kaku."},{"id":1032000049,"text":"Well, that's strange. I'm sure I saw it. An elf appeared∠right here, and...∨Hey, y-you, stop right there!∨Guys! Look! I was telling the truth! There's an elf here!"},{"id":1032000050,"text":"Best not to cause a commotion. There's a secret elven trail∠through the forest up ahead. Let's hurry."},{"id":1032000051,"text":"Wh-What the..."},{"id":1032000052,"text":"What's wrong?"},{"id":1032000053,"text":"This used to be the Village of the Kobolds, but all the∠Kobolds are gone."},{"id":1032000054,"text":"Bow wow! You humans took my friends. No forgive."},{"id":1032000055,"text":"Grr, no forgive.∠*sniff sniff*∨But no time now.∠Kuromimi must fix everyone's sickness."},{"id":1032000056,"text":"He said something about his friends being taken and∠everyone being sick."},{"id":1032000057,"text":"Something must have happened here. Let's hurry to∠my village. Maybe they know something.∨The Village of the Elves is just south of here."},{"id":1032000058,"text":"The forest is dense. It appears you cannot go any further."},{"id":1032000059,"text":"There's a spell at work beyond this point. Stay close to me∠or you'll get lost."},{"id":1032000060,"text":"Kuromimi can't get caught here. Must help everyone."},{"id":1032000061,"text":"Who the hell are you people? Wait, you're that traitor∠Valeria. Fancy meeting you here.∨There's a bounty on your head, you know? Might as well turn∠yourself in now."},{"id":1032000062,"text":"Young Master, we're surrounded. We may be in trouble here."},{"id":1032000063,"text":"\"May be\"? Trust me, we're in trouble!"},{"id":1032000064,"text":"Hey, you there. If I turn myself in, will you promise to∠not hurt the others?"},{"id":1032000065,"text":"Hahaha! You wanna strike a deal? Fine. I swear on the gods,∠we won't lay a finger on them."},{"id":1032000066,"text":"V-Valeria, if they arrest you as a traitor, they'll put you∠to death for it."},{"id":1032000067,"text":"I know."},{"id":1032000068,"text":"Then why..."},{"id":1032000069,"text":"The Burning Mirror has to be destroyed. Who will do it if∠we all die here?∨The Liberation Army must not lose its leader, not now.∠It's your duty as their leader to stay alive. That's why..."},{"id":1032000070,"text":"Stop, Valeria.∠"},{"id":1032000071,"text":"You know, ♂㈱. You've still got a lot to learn.∠You mustn't lose sight of the greater good."},{"id":1032000072,"text":"I'm sorry, Valeria."},{"id":1032000073,"text":"Don't sweat it. Although I'd appreciate if you could rescue∠me before I lose my head."},{"id":1032000074,"text":"That's a good girl. Behave yourself now.∨Men, listen up. Kill that filthy elf, the Kobold, and the∠rest of those traitors."},{"id":1032000075,"text":"What?! But you just swore by the gods that..."},{"id":1032000076,"text":"Gods? There are no gods in this day and age."},{"id":1032000077,"text":"Ack! They're attacking!"},{"id":1032000078,"text":"Kuromimi will fight. Must not die here."},{"id":1032000079,"text":"We won't hold them off much longer..."},{"id":1032000080,"text":"Looks like this is the end of the road..."},{"id":1032000081,"text":"You all weak. Kuromimi won't give up."},{"id":1032000082,"text":"That's right, keep up the tough talk.∠Come on, men! Let's finish 'em!"},{"id":1032000083,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we've come to help."},{"id":1032000084,"text":"Wh-What is this?"},{"id":1032000085,"text":"Sir, some bunch calling themselves the Liberation Army∠showed up and..."},{"id":1032000086,"text":"What?! Retreat! Run for your lives!"},{"id":1032000087,"text":"Sir Mathiu, how did you get here? The only way is through∠that forest."},{"id":1032000088,"text":"Someone told me about the Burning Mirror."},{"id":1032000089,"text":"Kirkis! Kirkis, Kirkis, Kirkis! Oh, how I've missed you!"},{"id":1032000090,"text":"S-Sylvina... But...how?"},{"id":1032000091,"text":"Hahaha. It's all thanks to me."},{"id":1032000092,"text":"Stallion was amazing. There was a bright flash, and then he∠came running at incredible speed."},{"id":1032000093,"text":"Wish you could've seen how fast I ran. That was a once-in-∠a-lifetime escape."},{"id":1032000094,"text":"Sylvina! Oh, Sylvina!"},{"id":1032000095,"text":"Hey, don't you wanna hear about my great escape?"},{"id":1032000096,"text":"Here's the ring. I guess we should never abandon hope."},{"id":1032000097,"text":"Gremio..."},{"id":1032000098,"text":"Wait, what's going on? A ring? What is this, Kirkis?"},{"id":1032000099,"text":"W-Well, you know, once everything is over..."},{"id":1032000100,"text":"After you left the castle, Humphrey and Sanchez arrived.∨And they brought with them the survivors of the old∠Liberation Army. We now have enough forces to face Kwanda∠Rosman's army.∨Commander ♂㈱, please give the signal to∠advance."},{"id":1032000101,"text":"All right. Deploy the troops.∠"},{"id":1032000102,"text":"The time isn't right yet..."},{"id":1032000103,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, war is all about timing. ∠And now is the time to attack."},{"id":1032000104,"text":"Looking to stay the night? It's 100 potch per person."},{"id":1032000105,"text":"Staying the night? That'll be 30 potch each."},{"id":1032000107,"text":"I'm Master Mace's apprentice, Maas. Of course, I'm just∠starting out as a blacksmith."},{"id":1032000108,"text":"Are you part of the Liberation Army? Master Mace used to∠say,∨\"A sound body keeps a sound mind.\" When the world goes∠wrong, so do people's minds.∨Please let me join the Liberation Army. I'll help straighten∠out people's minds."},{"id":1032000110,"text":"Thank you so much. Then I'll head straight over to∠♂① Castle."},{"id":1032000111,"text":"That's a shame. Well, I'll be here. Please come back∠anytime."},{"id":1032000112,"text":"Hmm? I'm Sansuke. I make baths."},{"id":1032000114,"text":"Join ya? Sure. I found some great wood, so I can even build∠ya a bath."},{"id":1032000115,"text":"Jeez. Get lost already if ya don't need anything."},{"id":1032000116,"text":"What? What?! Oh dear, I think I messed up."},{"id":1032000117,"text":"Say mister, do you know where we are? The Empire? ∠Which one? Oh my, that's pretty much on the opposite side.∨My name's Viki.
