I'm a poor little girl with nowhere to go.∨Will you protect me?"},{"id":1032000118,"text":"Oh, thank you! What? The Liberation Army?∠No way! You have a castle? That's amazing!∨Wh-Wh-Where is it? Oh, that's not too far... Let's go then!"},{"id":1032000119,"text":"P-P-Please! You're not gonna leave an innocent little girl∠like me stranded here in the forest, are you?"},{"id":1032000120,"text":"W-Wait up! Come on, you've changed your mind, haven't∠you? You can't leave me on my own."},{"id":1032000121,"text":"I'm Gon. How is Kuromimi?"},{"id":1032000122,"text":"K-Kuromimi! It really is you! How have you been?"},{"id":1032000123,"text":"Hey there, Gon! Kuromimi is great. Working hard in∠Liberation Army."},{"id":1032000124,"text":"Y-You so cool, Kuromimi! I-I-I wanna be just like you."},{"id":1032000125,"text":"Be happy, Gon. Commander ♂㈱ say you welcome∠to join Liberation Army."},{"id":1032000126,"text":"Woohoo!"},{"id":1032000127,"text":"Gon, Commander ♂㈱ say no. You stay here."},{"id":1032000128,"text":"Okay, Kuromimi."},{"id":1032000129,"text":"Gahahaha! I'm Fu Su Lu, and I have the strength of a∠hundred men.∨When I swing my axe, the earth trembles, and when I shout,∠Lake Toran empties itself into the sky."},{"id":1032000131,"text":"The Liberation Army? Fine, so long as you keep me fed."},{"id":1032000132,"text":"You gonna cough up 10,000 potch to pay for all the food∠he's eaten?"},{"id":1032000133,"text":"Yes.∠No."},{"id":1032000134,"text":"Hahaha! That's mighty generous of you.∨Don't worry, I'll work for my meals."},{"id":1032000135,"text":"Seems you're a little short on money..."},{"id":1032000136,"text":"Gahaha! Come back whenever you want. I'm not going∠anywhere."},{"id":1032000137,"text":"Hahaha! Liberation Army? More like Deliberation Army!"},{"id":1032000138,"text":"Gahahahaha! You wouldn't know a good thing if it hit you∠square in the face."},{"id":1032000139,"text":"Hmph. I don't talk to humans."},{"id":1032000140,"text":"Aren't you Rubi?"},{"id":1032000141,"text":"Huh? Oh, Kirkis, eh... What're you doing with these humans?"},{"id":1032000142,"text":"I'm in the Liberation Army now. But I'm not doing it for∠revenge for having my village taken away.∨Many are suffering because of the Imperial Army, both∠humans and elves. I want to help them."},{"id":1032000143,"text":"Oh, spare me the sappy garbage. Off with you. What would∠you know about all that anyway? You're just a little runt."},{"id":1032000144,"text":"Go home. I've got nothing to say to a tenderfoot like you."},{"id":1032000145,"text":"Rubi."},{"id":1032000146,"text":"Kirkis. Why is an elf helping humans?"},{"id":1032000147,"text":"Elves, humans, it doesn't matter in the end. We were all∠born under the same sky.∨At least that's how I feel. I'm not doing this for revenge,∠I'm doing it for everyone, especially those I care about."},{"id":1032000148,"text":"......∨Kirkis, when I left our village, you were still so young.∠And now you've surpassed me.∨I'll help you out. For the sake of the Liberation Army..."},{"id":1033076001,"text":"At this rate, the entire Liberation Army will be wiped out.∠We should retreat."},{"id":1033076002,"text":"Alen, Grenseal, don't let them escape. We will crush the∠Liberation Army here and now."},{"id":1033076003,"text":"Master ♂㈱, I'll hold them off. Please hurry and∠escape."},{"id":1033076004,"text":"Pahn! You can't fight them alone. Do you want to die?"},{"id":1033076005,"text":"I don't plan on it. But unless we're prepared to risk our∠lives, we'll never stop Master Teo."},{"id":1033076006,"text":"You don't have to do this, Pahn.∠"},{"id":1033076007,"text":"Please don't stop me, Master ♂㈱. You cannot die∠here.∨Gremio sacrificed his life for you, you cannot waste it."},{"id":1033076008,"text":"In the ten years since I first met Master Teo, there's been∠something I've often thought about. What it would be like∠to fight him one day.∨Please, forgive my selfish indulgence this once."},{"id":1033076009,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we must go. ∠You have your duty, and Pahn has his.∨We cannot lose you now. No matter the cost."},{"id":1033076010,"text":"We're counting on you."},{"id":1033076011,"text":"Leave this to me. I'll be back in time for supper."},{"id":1033076012,"text":"That's a promise, Pahn!"},{"id":1033076013,"text":"Sure thing..."},{"id":1033076014,"text":"Pahn... Stand aside."},{"id":1033076015,"text":"I'm sorry, but I can't do that."},{"id":1033076016,"text":"You mean to defy me, Pahn?"},{"id":1033076017,"text":"I once served the Empire, and even betrayed Master∠♂㈱.∨But now... Now I know exactly what I want, and how I want∠to live.∨And now that I know these things, I cannot give them up."},{"id":1033076018,"text":"I see. I never imagined the day would come when I'd have∠to fight you.∨Alen, Grenseal, stand back.∠This is between me and you, Pahn!"},{"id":1033076019,"text":"I'm ready, Master Teo."},{"id":1033076020,"text":"You've improved, Pahn.∨Alen, Grenseal, we're withdrawing."},{"id":1033076021,"text":"If you'll allow me, General, I will take his head..."},{"id":1033076022,"text":"Did you not hear me? I said withdraw."},{"id":1033076023,"text":"Yes, General."},{"id":1033076024,"text":"Haha, hahaha...∠D-Did I really just win? Or did he go easy on me...?"},{"id":1033076025,"text":"Satisfied now, Pahn? Ready to return to the imperial ranks?∠I can still help you, if that's what you want."},{"id":1033076026,"text":"I am sorry, Master Teo. But I will choose my own path."},{"id":1033076027,"text":"Then you know the punishment for traitors."},{"id":1033076028,"text":"I do."},{"id":1033076029,"text":"Forgive me, Pahn."},{"id":1033076030,"text":"I'm sorry, Gremio. I can't...protect...the Young Master...∠any longer..."},{"id":1033076031,"text":"Hahaha! Wow! No way! We burned down the armored cavalry.∠These Fire Spears are somethin' else."},{"id":1033076032,"text":"General Teo McDohl, your army has been defeated. Please,∠surrender yourself."},{"id":1033076033,"text":"Silence! We will never surrender, not even if it comes down∠to our last soldier."},{"id":1033076034,"text":"I will give my life for the Empire and for General Teo."},{"id":1033076035,"text":"Alen, Grenseal, stand back."},{"id":1033076036,"text":"What are you doing, General Teo?!"},{"id":1033076037,"text":"Alen, please. Stand back."},{"id":1033076038,"text":"♂㈱ McDohl, traitor against Emperor Barbarossa.∨The most reviled criminal in the land.∨I, Teo McDohl, shall defeat you on behalf of his Majesty,∠the Emperor. Will you accept my challenge?"},{"id":1033076039,"text":"♂㈱!"},{"id":1033076040,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, don't do anything foolish.∨Viktor! Cut off that man's head!"},{"id":1033076041,"text":"I accept your challenge.∠"},{"id":1033076042,"text":"You have my gratitude. Now come!"},{"id":1033076043,"text":"I don't want to fight you..."},{"id":1033076044,"text":"You, the leader of the Liberation Army, getting sentimental∠in battle? Don't make me laugh!"},{"id":1033076045,"text":"Master Teo!"},{"id":1033076047,"text":"♂㈱ McDohl... My son... You have grown so∠strong...∨I lived for what I believed in. And I have no regrets.∨You must also live for what you believe in. I congratulate∠you on your choice..."},{"id":1033076048,"text":"Master Teo! Please!"},{"id":1033076049,"text":"General Teo, you cannot die. What will become of the Empire∠without you?"},{"id":1033076050,"text":"Alen, Grenseal, I have a favor to ask."},{"id":1033076051,"text":"Yes, General Teo."},{"id":1033076052,"text":"I fought for the Emperor...and for the Emperor alone...∠That was my choice...∨But...there's no need...for you two...to follow in my∠footsteps... The sands of time...cannot be stopped...∨Alen, Grenseal, I'd like the two of you...to join the∠Liberation Army, and help my son. I think that would be∠best...for both of you..."},{"id":1033076054,"text":"♂㈱... My son. I am happy...∨The greatest...happiness...a father can experience...is to∠see his son...surpass him...∨Good luck...my son... ♂㈱..."},{"id":1033076055,"text":"Master Teo!"},{"id":1033076056,"text":"Soul Eater has reached Level 3."},{"id":1033076057,"text":"That light just now... It went inside the Soul Eater..."},{"id":1033076058,"text":"All troops, move out. Give the signal!"},{"id":1034000001,"text":"What's that? Liberation Army? Never heard of 'em. Now get∠outta here."},{"id":1034000002,"text":"Hey, is that you, Tai Ho? What's up, bro?"},{"id":1034000003,"text":"Hey, is that you, Yam Koo? What's up, bro? You fishin' or∠something?"},{"id":1034000004,"text":"Well, well, Tai Ho. Up to your usual shenanigans, I see.∨What're you doin' holed up in that godforsaken castle?"},{"id":1034000005,"text":"Oh, hey there, Anji. How about you quit playing pirate in∠this dump and lend us a hand?"},{"id":1034000006,"text":"Playin' pirate? Me? How dare you!∨We'll see who's playin' around. Get ready to fight!"},{"id":1034000007,"text":"Challenge accepted.∠No thanks."},{"id":1034000008,"text":"All right! Leonardo, Kanak, don't go easy on 'em!"},{"id":1034000009,"text":"Heh. Very smart of ya."},{"id":1034000010,"text":"Not bad, Tai Ho. Sounds fun! I can get on board with that.∨Let's teach those unsavory Imperials a lesson or two.∠Leonardo, Kanak, you in?"},{"id":1034000011,"text":"If you go, we go."},{"id":1034000012,"text":"Of course."},{"id":1034000014,"text":"We rule these waters."},{"id":1034000016,"text":"Heh. Amateurs. I'll let ya off this once. Go run home now."},{"id":1052000001,"text":"Dwarf very stingy. Keep sickness cure a secret. But Kuromimi∠won't give up."},{"id":1052000002,"text":"Wait, that Kobold..."},{"id":1052000003,"text":"All of you! No forgive! Grrr... But Kuromimi busy now."},{"id":1052000004,"text":"W-Wait, is that smoke?"},{"id":1052000005,"text":"Hm... I can't be sure."},{"id":1052000006,"text":"It's coming from the Village of the Elves..."},{"id":1052000007,"text":"I-It can't be..."},{"id":1052000008,"text":"We're too late..."},{"id":1052000009,"text":"No! That's impossible! Commander ♂㈱, ∠let's hurry."},{"id":1053000054,"text":"Oh my, that's quite something for humans to make it all∠the way here."},{"id":1053000055,"text":"This windmill generates the power of lightning. Among us∠dwarves, it's said to be one of our best-kept secrets."},{"id":1053000056,"text":"Hey, have you been upgrading your weapons? If you don't∠keep up with that, you'll pay for it down the road."},{"id":1053000057,"text":"Hey, wait... Are you one of those \"humans\" or whatever?"},{"id":1053000058,"text":"Did you also come here to learn from us, like that∠blacksmith?"},{"id":1053000059,"text":"I heard an imperial general named Kwanda is attacking the∠Village of the Elves. Serves them right for always making∠fun of us."},{"id":1053000060,"text":"According to my research, things known as \"runes\" are the∠fundamental power of this world."},{"id":1053000061,"text":"We hate the elves, and they look down on us. Been that way∠for so long, no one can even remember how it all started."},{"id":1053000062,"text":"I'm gonna be strong. Strong enough to beat elves and humans."},{"id":1053000063,"text":"I'm gonna study hard and be smarter than elves or humans."},{"id":1053000064,"text":"Do you think our wonderful armor would suit humans?"},{"id":1053000065,"text":"We dwarves are proud of our great vault! You can see it∠just north of here."},{"id":1053000066,"text":"Why are the Kobolds so subservient to the Empire? They∠attack us so indiscriminately."},{"id":1053000067,"text":"Oh? Spending the night here? Better not break the bed."},{"id":1053000068,"text":"Heeheehee! That'll be 200 potch per person."},{"id":1053000070,"text":"Ho ho! My, what rare visitors. Humans and elves, together?∠What brings you to the Dwarf Mines?"},{"id":1053000071,"text":"Chief of the Dwarves, we have come to ask a favor of you."},{"id":1053000072,"text":"A proud elf asking a dwarf for a favor?"},{"id":1053000073,"text":"Chief, I am sure you are familiar with the Burning Mirror."},{"id":1053000074,"text":"Ho ho! Well, of course I am. It's one of our treasures."},{"id":1053000075,"text":"Kwanda Rosman has gotten hold of the mirror's blueprints,∠and he plans to burn down the forest."},{"id":1053000076,"text":"Ho ho ho! How delightful. Hopefully, he burns all the filthy∠elves to death in the process."},{"id":1053000077,"text":"H-How could you say such a thing..."},{"id":1053000078,"text":"Besides, do you expect me to believe some dim-witted∠humans managed to steal the blueprints from us?"},{"id":1053000079,"text":"But it's the truth. A man named Kage stole the blueprints."},{"id":1053000080,"text":"Ho ho! In that case, why don't you give it a try? Prove to∠me you humans are capable of breaking into our vault and∠stealing our blueprints."},{"id":1053000081,"text":"All right, we'll give it a try.∠"},{"id":1053000082,"text":"Ho ho ho! This should be entertaining! Try to steal the∠Flowing Water Cane from our vault.∨Do that and I will believe you. The vault is located just∠north of this village.∨It was too large to be built here. Ho ho ho ho!"},{"id":1053000083,"text":"We'll pass."},{"id":1053000084,"text":"Ho ho ho! Wise choice. Our vault is impenetrable."},{"id":1053000085,"text":"I-I-I can't believe it! You actually managed to break into∠our vault. Fine then, I'll believe your story.∨The Burning Mirror is a devastating weapon. But it can be∠shattered in an instant if you use another of our treasures:∠the Firewind Cannon.∨I'll have one built for you immediately."},{"id":1053000086,"text":"We thank you, Chief of the Dwarves."},{"id":1053000087,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's return to the village to∠deliver the news.∨I'm certain the Chief of the Elves will believe us now."},{"id":1053000088,"text":"Ho ho ho! What's the matter? Will you give it a try?"},{"id":1053000089,"text":"Ho ho! How about it? Want to back down now?"},{"id":1053000090,"text":"Good luck, kiddo."},{"id":1053000091,"text":"Liberation Army? What the heck is that? Look, I'm busy∠learnin' a new craft here.∨I don't have time to get mixed up in this Liberation Army∠of yours. Well, unless you've managed to recruit one of the∠other blacksmiths, that is."},{"id":1053000092,"text":"Hmmm... Maas, huh? Okay, if Maas thinks you're all right,∠then you're all right in my book too.∨I'll help ya out. Put me in charge of all your weapons."},{"id":1053000094,"text":"Okay, I'll go tell the Chief of the Dwarves that I'm∠leaving. After that, I'll head to ♂① Castle."},{"id":1053000096,"text":"You're kinda thick-headed, huh? Without me in your group,∠you can forget about any other blacksmith joinin' up."},{"id":1054000001,"text":"What're you doing here? This is no place for filthy humans∠and elves!"},{"id":1054000002,"text":"The Chief told me everything. There's no way an elf can∠crack the security of that vault."},{"id":1054000003,"text":"*beep* *boop* *boop* *beep*∠*beep* *beep* *boop* *boop*"},{"id":1054000004,"text":"You acquired the Flowing Water Cane!"},{"id":1054000005,"text":"Well, good luck."},{"id":1055000015,"text":"Welcome..."},{"id":1055000017,"text":"Which one?"},{"id":1055000018,"text":"You don't have enough dough!"},{"id":1055000020,"text":"There's no free space, idiot."},{"id":1055000021,"text":"I got nothing to sell to you!"},{"id":1055000022,"text":"Who's doing the selling?"},{"id":1055000023,"text":"No way I can buy that."},{"id":1055000024,"text":"It's equipped!"},{"id":1055000025,"text":"Now scram."},{"id":1055000027,"text":"Which piece of junk do you wanna sell?"},{"id":1055000043,"text":"Well, well, if it isn't Kirkis. You have some nerve coming∠back here, considering you're a coward who fled in the face∠of battle."},{"id":1055000044,"text":"Why, it's Kirkis. Say, those friends of yours, are they..."},{"id":1055000045,"text":"That Kwanda from the Imperial Army is a nasty piece of work.∠Just like all the other humans!"},{"id":1055000046,"text":"What's that? You want to stay here? That'll be 200 potch each.∠Try not to leave a mess."},{"id":1055000048,"text":"Do you think our beautiful armor would suit humans?"},{"id":1055000049,"text":"I've got nothing to sell to you humans, but Kirkis can buy∠something if he wants."},{"id":1055000050,"text":"Welcome, wel... What is it? What do you want?"},{"id":1055000051,"text":"Kirkis, you've returned. How was it? What? The help of...∠humans?"},{"id":1055000052,"text":"Kwanda lives in Pannu Yakuta Castle, south of this forest.∠Next time, we'll be the ones to attack!"},{"id":1055000053,"text":"With my husband around, we Guardians of the Forest will∠never be beaten."},{"id":1055000054,"text":"We elves will never lose, unlike those grubby dwarves and∠stupid Kobolds."},{"id":1055000055,"text":"Did you know those creatures up north called dwarves∠snatch up elves and eat us? Sounds terrifying."},{"id":1055000056,"text":"Kirkis, don't tell me you believe what that human woman∠says."},{"id":1055000057,"text":"Kwanda Rosman, one of the Five Great Generals, is the enemy∠of the Guardians of the Forest."},{"id":1055000058,"text":"The Kobolds double-crossed us and joined the Imperials.∠They're cowards."},{"id":1055000059,"text":"Ugh. Kirkis, you reek of humans."},{"id":1055000060,"text":"Hey, Kirkis, did you do something bad? Grandpa looks really∠upset..."},{"id":1055000061,"text":"There's no time to waste sitting around here.∠Tsk. This is what I get for trusting elves..."},{"id":1055000062,"text":"Hurry, Kirkis. If they find you, they'll be angry."},{"id":1055000063,"text":"The Dwarf Mines lie to the north, Kwanda Rosman's castle to∠the south. Both are after our lands."},{"id":1055000064,"text":"*moaning* My wounds, they did this to me..."},{"id":1055000065,"text":"That's enough. Listen to me! I will not be ignored."},{"id":1055000066,"text":"Listen to you, eh? Never knew you humans were capable of∠intelligent conversation.∨So what do you have to say? Have you come up with a way of∠wiping us out? With those tiny brains of yours?"},{"id":1055000067,"text":"Kwanda certainly has. He's planning something terrible.∨Not only will he wipe out you elves, he intends to burn down∠this entire forest, which also happens to be my home."},{"id":1055000068,"text":"As if you humans were ever capable of such a thing.∠Hey, lock this one up in prison."},{"id":1055000069,"text":"Kirkis! Why did you leave me alone? I was so lonely."},{"id":1055000070,"text":"No, I didn't mean to leave you..."},{"id":1055000071,"text":"How terrible of you, going off on your own. You should've∠taken me with you. Was it fun out there?"},{"id":1055000072,"text":"No, I mean, I didn't go out there to have fun. I couldn't∠take you because it was too dangerous."},{"id":1055000073,"text":"Well, of course."},{"id":1055000074,"text":"Kirkis, why did you leave without my consent? What were∠you doing out there?"},{"id":1055000075,"text":"There are those amongst the humans who are fighting the∠Empire as well.∨I left to get help from them, from the Liberation Army,∠to protect the Village of the Elves."},{"id":1055000076,"text":"Protect this village? What are you talking about? We don't∠need the help of humans to protect this village.∨True, for a time, it seemed we were losing ground to∠Kwanda's soldiers. But they're just humans, after all.∠They have ceased their attacks of late."},{"id":1055000077,"text":"But..."},{"id":1055000078,"text":"Be quiet, Kirkis. Not only did you leave the village without∠my permission, but you dare to return with these∠loathsome humans.∨Throw them all in prison."},{"id":1055000079,"text":"Yes, Chief."},{"id":1055000080,"text":"What? Wh-Why? Why, Grandpa? ∠Why are you arresting Kirkis?"},{"id":1055000081,"text":"Well, well, look who it is. It's that coward who fled the∠minute he found out the Imperials were attacking.∨Wait, you don't remember me? It's Stallion, the greatest∠runner this village has ever seen. Doesn't that ring a bell?∨You should've seen how quickly I ran when that bastard∠Kwanda attacked. Hahahaha!"},{"id":1055000082,"text":"Who are you? The Liberation Army? You came here to help∠save the elves? Glad to know I'm not the only fool here."},{"id":1055000083,"text":"You're wearing an imperial uniform..."},{"id":1055000084,"text":"That's right. I'm a fool too. I risked my life to betray the∠Empire, and now look where I am.∨How can these elves be so stubborn? They refuse to listen∠to a word I say."},{"id":1055000085,"text":"What were you trying to tell them?"},{"id":1055000086,"text":"It was about the general, Kwanda Rosman, who's in charge of∠this region.∨He's constructed a terrible weapon to completely wipe out∠the elves and put an end to their constant rebellions."},{"id":1055000087,"text":"A terrible weapon? What is it?"},{"id":1055000088,"text":"I don't know much, but it's called the Burning Mirror. They∠say it can burn down an entire forest in an instant.∨Such a weapon would not only destroy the elves, but also∠the village where I was born.∨That's why I came here. I meant to warn the elves, so they∠could prevent this Burning Mirror from being completed.∠But..."},{"id":1055000089,"text":"But before you knew it, you were in this prison."},{"id":1055000090,"text":"*creaking*"},{"id":1055000091,"text":"Who's there?"},{"id":1055000092,"text":"Sylvina..."},{"id":1055000093,"text":"Grandpa said I shouldn't come to see you, but there's∠something I have to ask..."},{"id":1055000094,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1055000095,"text":"Tell me, Kirkis, why are you so attached to humans?∨Despite their arrogance, the average human will be dead∠after a mere 50 years. Why bother with such creatures?"},{"id":1055000096,"text":"Dead after a mere 50 years... That's harsh."},{"id":1055000097,"text":"Sylvina, listen to me. Sure, humans hate dwarves and us∠elves.∨And, sure, we look down on humans and the dwarves detest∠us. But isn't it sad?∨After all, what difference is there between us? Why can't we∠just get along? I just don't understand it. It's really sad."},{"id":1055000098,"text":"Kirkis...∨I'm sorry, Kirkis. I just don't get what you're saying.∠I don't understand it.∨I don't trust humans, and dwarves scare me."},{"id":1055000100,"text":"Here, this is the key to your prison cell. Do you think I'll∠end up in there for doing this?"},{"id":1055000101,"text":"Haha! I, Stallion, will show you how fast I can flee."},{"id":1055000102,"text":"I-Impressive."},{"id":1055000103,"text":"Come on, Kirkis. You've got to run. Although probably not∠as fast as Stallion..."},{"id":1055000104,"text":"No, I can't flee. I've got to do something about the∠Burning Mirror that Valeria warned us about."},{"id":1055000105,"text":"Did you come up with something?"},{"id":1055000106,"text":"I may have an idea... Commander ♂㈱, if we travel∠northeast from this village...∨...we'll find the mine where the dwarves live. They should∠know something. Let's ask them for help."},{"id":1055000107,"text":"That's a good idea.∠"},{"id":1055000108,"text":"Agreed. If we don't hurry, the damage will be irreparable.∨We must do something to prevent the Burning Mirror from∠being completed."},{"id":1055000109,"text":"Let's go back to the castle first."},{"id":1055000110,"text":"Young Master, there's no time.∨The Burning Mirror is being built this very moment as we∠speak. We must act immediately."},{"id":1055000111,"text":"Kirkis! You're visiting the dwarves?! I've heard they eat∠elves..."},{"id":1055000112,"text":"Those are the exact kind of prejudices we need to overcome.∠Let's go, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1055000113,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please take me with you. ∠I want to protect this forest."},{"id":1055000114,"text":"Kirkis..."},{"id":1055000115,"text":"Do you want to come along, Sylvina? You're welcome to join∠this time."},{"id":1055000116,"text":".........∨I'm going to stay. I'll be here waiting for you, Kirkis...∨Promise me you'll return. Swear it."},{"id":1055000117,"text":"I swear it. I'll come back for you. I won't make you sad∠ever again."},{"id":1055000118,"text":"Don't forget your promise."},{"id":1055000119,"text":"Valeria is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1055000120,"text":"The door is locked."},{"id":1055000121,"text":"But...but... ☆10I believe in you.∨And I believe in what you believe in. I will do my best to∠believe."},{"id":1055000122,"text":"This is terrible."},{"id":1055000123,"text":"How horrifying..."},{"id":1055000124,"text":"All our efforts..."},{"id":1055000125,"text":"That's right. They were in vain.∨Everything we did was in vain.∨But why? Why? Please tell me, Commander ♂㈱.∠What was the point of it all?∨How could this happen? We did everything we could! We were∠ridiculed and mocked, but still we didn't lose heart.∠And yet...yet..."},{"id":1055000126,"text":"Kirkis..."},{"id":1055000127,"text":"Yet nothing...nothing remains! Everything I tried to protect∠is gone..."},{"id":1055000128,"text":"I meant to give this ring to Sylvina once everything was∠over.∨Poor Sylvina.∨Now this ring is useless, robbed of ever knowing the touch∠of her finger."},{"id":1055000129,"text":"There's nothing left for me now..."},{"id":1055000130,"text":"Kirkis, this ring is your hope. You must never lose hope.∨All it takes is a little hope for us to keep going. Same∠goes for both humans and elves."},{"id":1055000131,"text":"Gremio..."},{"id":1055000132,"text":"Young Master, let's return to the castle. We must never∠allow a tragedy like this to be repeated.∨We must defeat Kwanda Rosman's army and destroy the∠Burning Mirror. That's the only way we're getting out of this."},{"id":1055000133,"text":".........∨Let's go. Sylvina would've wanted that."},{"id":1056000013,"text":"Gah, this is awful! I wish they wouldn't do such things!∠Now I'll have to change all my maps.∨Hm? Who're you guys? The Liberation Army? I see. I heard you∠recently occupied the castle on Lake Toran.∨Say, will you let me join you? I'm an expert cartographer.∠All you have to do in return is let me map out the castle."},{"id":1056000015,"text":"Okey dokey. I'll head for ♂① Castle soon as I've∠finished surveying this area."},{"id":1056000016,"text":"I see how it is. Fine, maybe I'll go somewhere else."},{"id":1056000017,"text":"You acquired a Suiko Map."},{"id":1056000018,"text":"Oh right! Here, take this. As long as you have this map∠you'll be just fine. Just don't lose it."},{"id":1057000001,"text":"You're that fugitive!"},{"id":1057000002,"text":"We've defeated the army! All that's left is to hunt down∠Kwanda."},{"id":1057000003,"text":"Please be careful, Commander ♂㈱!"},{"id":1057000004,"text":"Yes! Yes! We did it! We gave those damn Imperials a run∠for their money."},{"id":1057000005,"text":"Whew! We pulled it off somehow."},{"id":1057000006,"text":"You know, I was a little scared, to be honest."},{"id":1057000007,"text":"Go! Advance! Don't look back! Kill the Imperials!"},{"id":1057000008,"text":"It's Kwanda Rosman, one of the Five Great Generals.∠He's a formidable opponent. Be careful..."},{"id":1057000009,"text":"Ho ho ho ho! The Burning Mirror will be shattered with∠a single shot."},{"id":1057000010,"text":"Would you like to rest?"},{"id":1057000012,"text":"Hahaha! I'll use this to burn you all down!"},{"id":1057000013,"text":"Oh no. Kwanda intends to use the Burning Mirror."},{"id":1057000014,"text":"What? All troops, fall back! No, hold on. Spread out and∠disperse! We must keep casualties to a minimum!"},{"id":1057000015,"text":"I see. They've scattered their men to reduce casualties.∠But it's too late now."},{"id":1057000016,"text":"Traitors to the Empire, taste your final judgment and die!"},{"id":1057000017,"text":"Wh-What's happening?"},{"id":1057000018,"text":"Ho ho ho! Now that's what you get for stealing!∨Witness the might of our Firewind Cannon!"},{"id":1057000019,"text":"It's the Chief of the Dwarves!"},{"id":1057000020,"text":"Looks like we made it just in time, young elf."},{"id":1057000021,"text":"All right, now all we gotta do is storm the castle and take∠Kwanda Rosman's head. Let's go, ♂㈱."},{"id":1057000022,"text":"I'm coming too, Young Master."},{"id":1057000023,"text":"Please, Commander ♂㈱. Take me with you."},{"id":1057000024,"text":"I'll go as well."},{"id":1057000025,"text":"All right, who else is coming?"},{"id":1057000026,"text":"Kuromimi go too. Want to save friends. Kuromimi want to go."},{"id":1057000027,"text":"All right, let's do this!"},{"id":1057000028,"text":"Well then, you must be the leader of the Liberation Army.∠Wait, aren't you Teo's boy?∨I see. So the rumors are true. Teo's son, leading the∠rebels. Just don't expect me to go easy on you.∨I was once known as Iron Wall Rosman. I will again serve as∠the wall that protects Emperor Barbarossa. Come, come,∠soldiers of the Liberation Army.∨Witness my strength. Behold the power of the Black Rune,∠given to me by Lady Windy!"},{"id":1057000029,"text":"I-Impossible! Lady Windy's Black Rune will..."},{"id":1057000030,"text":"You make everyone crazy. You fix them."},{"id":1057000031,"text":"Kobold? Why are you still sane? The Black Rune, it's...∨*screaming*∠My arm!"},{"id":1057000032,"text":"What's going on?"},{"id":1057000033,"text":"Not sure, but it's got something to do with the Black Rune.∠I think he said something about that."},{"id":1057000034,"text":"*agonizing scream*"},{"id":1057000035,"text":"Wh-What...happened to me?"},{"id":1057000036,"text":"Prepare to die."},{"id":1057000037,"text":"That's right. This is vengeance for the lives you've taken!"},{"id":1057000038,"text":"Elf, Kobold... I see.∨Do what you must. It seems your actions are justified."},{"id":1057000039,"text":"Wait a minute, something's wrong."},{"id":1057000040,"text":"Are you Commander ♂㈱ of the Liberation Army?∨Go on then, cut off my head. This is a fitting end for∠a warrior."},{"id":1057000041,"text":"This is vengeance for those you've killed!∠"},{"id":1057000042,"text":"Emperor Barbarossa, I am sorry I could not protect you until∠the end.∨To have fought by you for these 10 years has been my∠greatest pleasure. Farewell, my Emperor."},{"id":1057000043,"text":"Prepare yourself!"},{"id":1057000044,"text":"Well then, this is where my battle ends."},{"id":1057000045,"text":"It's been a long time, ♂㈱. Oh, so you've defeated∠Kwanda. I gave him the Black Rune and still he fails me.∨Incompetent fool."},{"id":1057000046,"text":"Who are you? Fix everyone."},{"id":1057000047,"text":"A Kobold? I see. The destruction of Kwanda's Black Rune must∠have lifted the curse.∨♂㈱, don't think I'll let you go unchecked forever.∠My beloved Barbarossa will end you.∨Now, if you'll excuse me. I'll be seeing you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1057000048,"text":"Something's wrong here."},{"id":1057000049,"text":"What are you waiting for? Do it. Remove my head. I'm getting∠impatient."},{"id":1057000050,"text":"Why did you suddenly..."},{"id":1057000051,"text":"Yeah. You not the same person you were."},{"id":1057000052,"text":"It's because of this. This burnt rune."},{"id":1057000053,"text":"Rune?"},{"id":1057000054,"text":"This was the Black Rune Lady Windy gave me. It holds the∠power to control monsters.∨Ironically, I also appear to have been under its sway.∨Windy cannot be trusted. I wonder if the Emperor is aware∠of this...∨But whatever I say matters little now. The only way to atone∠for what I have done is to accept my fate as a warrior."},{"id":1057000055,"text":"I agree.∠"},{"id":1057000056,"text":"Thank you, Commander ♂㈱.∨Teo should be proud of having a son like you."},{"id":1057000058,"text":"I want you to join us."},{"id":1057000059,"text":"You want me to join you? Hahahaha! Me? Join the Liberation∠Army?∨I served Emperor Barbarossa for 10 years, and you're asking∠me to betray him just like that?"},{"id":1057000060,"text":"That's right. The Emperor is no longer the same man you knew∠seven years ago."},{"id":1057000061,"text":"......∨Perhaps the Emperor I believed in did cease to exist many∠years ago.∨Commander ♂㈱, allow me to join the Liberation∠Army.∨My loyalty to Emperor Barbarossa remains unwavering,∠but I cannot, under good conscience, serve His Majesty∠as he is now."},{"id":1057000062,"text":"Congratulations, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Your first battle was a great success."},{"id":1057000063,"text":"Kuromimi!"},{"id":1057000064,"text":"Oh, Mommy!"},{"id":1057000066,"text":"Big Bro!"},{"id":1057000067,"text":"It appears the spell has been broken."},{"id":1057000068,"text":"Thank you, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1057000069,"text":"What will you do now?"},{"id":1057000070,"text":"My village is gone, and something tells me my war is not∠over yet.∨As long as your war continues, I'd like to keep fighting as well,∠Commander ♂㈱. Please allow me to join the∠Liberation Army."},{"id":1057000071,"text":"And me!"},{"id":1057000072,"text":"Oh, me as well!"},{"id":1057000073,"text":"N-Not you, Sylvina. It's too dangerous."},{"id":1057000074,"text":"Nope. I'm not letting you out of my sight again, Kirkis."},{"id":1057000075,"text":"Then I'm joining too."},{"id":1057000076,"text":"......"},{"id":1057000077,"text":"Kuromimi fight too. Everyone healed, but country still sick."},{"id":1057000078,"text":"I no longer have a place to return to either. Let me also∠fight, so that I can prevent such a tragedy from ever∠happening again."},{"id":1057000079,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you've grown so much through∠this battle.∨See how many have gathered under your banner. Come then,∠let's head back to ♂① Castle."},{"id":1057000080,"text":"All right, let's go!∠"},{"id":1057000081,"text":"Not yet. I have some unfinished business."},{"id":1057000082,"text":"Understood. We'll go on ahead then."},{"id":1077000058,"text":"What a sick joke. This is the town of Antei. How dare they∠change it to some stupid name!"},{"id":1077000059,"text":"But now that I think about it, maybe Bier Blanche did have∠kind of a nice ring to it..."},{"id":1077000060,"text":"Welcome to...er, what was it again? Oh yeah, Bier Blanche."},{"id":1077000061,"text":"General Milich's Scarleticia Castle is impenetrable.∨So long as he has that poisonous flower, the Liberation∠Army won't be able to touch that place."},{"id":1077000062,"text":"Staying the night? It's 170 potch per person."},{"id":1077000064,"text":"We all went to protest the town's new name, but as soon as∠we got close to the castle... It was horrible..."},{"id":1077000065,"text":"Scarleticia Castle is now open for all to explore inside."},{"id":1077000066,"text":"I'll let you in on a secret. This is actually the town of∠Antei. To the east is the town of Teien, and to the south∠lies the village of Rikon."},{"id":1077000067,"text":"Hooray! Hooray! The soldiers are gone!"},{"id":1077000068,"text":"I've seen many dancers in my lifetime, but Mina is by far∠the best."},{"id":1077000069,"text":"This one's quite skilled as well, but Mina's still the best."},{"id":1077000070,"text":"Mina's dancing is the treasure of this town."},{"id":1077000071,"text":"This girl's dancing is also something of a local treasure,∠in its own way."},{"id":1077000072,"text":"Miiinaaa!"},{"id":1077000073,"text":"Minaaa!∠Ehem, sorry, old habits die hard."},{"id":1077000074,"text":"La-la-la! I'm the best dancer in the world!"},{"id":1077000075,"text":"Heehee! I can finally say it with pride... This is the town∠of Antei!"},{"id":1077000076,"text":"You see this urn here? I acquired it from a Holly Master.∠Only problem is I can't get it appraised anywhere. What∠a pain in the neck."},{"id":1077000077,"text":"Ah, welcome! This is my store now. Apparently, the previous∠owner mysteriously vanished."},{"id":1077000078,"text":"That's right. This is an armor store, as you can see."},{"id":1077000079,"text":"Who're you? Friends of this two-potch crook?"},{"id":1077000080,"text":"Who the heck are you people? You've got some nerve, barging∠into my place of business without permission.∨Liberation Army? Oh, the one they're all talking about.∠I heard even Mathiu joined.∨Never took him as the revolutionary type. Guess you never∠really know."},{"id":1077000081,"text":"Oh, it's you. When you see Mathiu, give him my regards."},{"id":1077000082,"text":"What is it? A letter from Mathiu? Let me see...∨......∨...Hm?∨Sorry, I forgot to mention, I can't read. Can someone read it∠for me?"},{"id":1077000083,"text":"......∨V-Very well then, I'll read it..."},{"id":1077000084,"text":"I see. I know exactly what he's doing. Mathiu is up to his∠old tricks again."},{"id":1077000085,"text":"So you'll join us then?"},{"id":1077000086,"text":"Join? Hm... Hey, you there."},{"id":1077000087,"text":"M-Me?"},{"id":1077000088,"text":"Yes, you. My, aren't you a pretty boy...∨I'll join you on the condition that the two of us get∠better acquainted."},{"id":1077000089,"text":"Who, me? I-I can't. There's already someone..."},{"id":1077000090,"text":"Okay, done. He's yours. Do what you want with him."},{"id":1077000091,"text":"Viktor! Why you little—"},{"id":1077000092,"text":"Good! It's a deal. Come over here, handsome."},{"id":1077000093,"text":"Whoa! Wait a minute..."},{"id":1077000094,"text":"Come, pour me a glass, loverboy."},{"id":1077000095,"text":"Y-Yes, ma'am."},{"id":1077000096,"text":"All right, don't spill any. Okay, now it's your turn.∨Wait a second, you barely drank anything. Come on, drink up.∠Or do you not accept drinks from beautiful women?"},{"id":1077000097,"text":"O-Oh, no, i-it's not that at all. Ch-Cheers...∠Why me..."},{"id":1077000098,"text":"Well, I'll be on my way to this ♂① Castle of yours."},{"id":1077000099,"text":"H-How can you stay up all night drinking and still look so∠energetic?"},{"id":1077000100,"text":"Oh, don't be silly. I'll just need to train you, handsome.∨Say, ♂㈱, you're planning on recruiting Tesla as∠well, aren't you? He's here in town.∨But I believe he's using the name \"Albert.\""},{"id":1077000101,"text":"\"Albert,\" huh?"},{"id":1077000102,"text":"Well, you'll have to excuse me now. See you when you get∠back to the castle, handsome. We can spend plenty of quality∠time together then."},{"id":1077000103,"text":"Er... N-No thanks."},{"id":1077000104,"text":"E-Excuse me, who are you people? I'm just a regular,∠ordinary, law-abiding citizen of this town."},{"id":1077000105,"text":"You're Tesla, the scrivener, right?"},{"id":1077000106,"text":"P-Please, you've got the wrong person. My name is Albert∠Onyx. My family has lived in this town for generations."},{"id":1077000107,"text":"Is that so? Then what's your mother's name?"},{"id":1077000108,"text":"Well, umm... Her name is Marianne Onyx."},{"id":1077000109,"text":"And your father?"},{"id":1077000110,"text":"Uhhh...let's see... Allen Onyx."},{"id":1077000111,"text":"How 'bout grandma?!"},{"id":1077000112,"text":"Uhhh... Umm... Leah Onyx."},{"id":1077000113,"text":"Hey, Tesla."},{"id":1077000114,"text":"Yes?∨...Ah!∨No, I mean...umm... Who's Tesla? Never heard of the guy..."},{"id":1077000115,"text":"Do you give up?"},{"id":1077000116,"text":"All right, fine. It's Mathiu again, isn't it? What does he∠need now? All I want is to lead a quiet life."},{"id":1077000117,"text":"Quit whinin' and get ready to leave."},{"id":1077000118,"text":"*groans*∠Fine. Oh, why am I so unlucky?∨Forced back into a life of crime..."},{"id":1077000119,"text":"I wonder if it's safe to let him go alone."},{"id":1077000120,"text":"What else can we do? He doesn't wanna go with us.∨Damn, he's actin' like we're common bandits or somethin'."},{"id":1077000121,"text":"To be fair, you did get pretty menacing with him, Viktor."},{"id":1077000122,"text":"Young Master, we should head back to ♂① Castle∠as well."},{"id":1077000123,"text":"All right, don't spill any."},{"id":1077000124,"text":"...Good. "},{"id":1077000125,"text":"Okay, now it's your turn."},{"id":1077000126,"text":"Wait a second, you barely drank anything. Come on, drink up.∠Or do you not accept drinks from beautiful women?"},{"id":1077000127,"text":"O-Oh, no, i-it's not that at all."},{"id":1077000128,"text":"Ch-Cheers."},{"id":1077000129,"text":"...Why me?"},{"id":1077000130,"text":"Join? Hm..."},{"id":1077000131,"text":"Hey, you..."},{"id":1077000132,"text":"You gave her Mathiu's letter!"},{"id":1077000133,"text":"Well, I'll go on ahead to the castle."},{"id":1077000134,"text":"Thought you could just dine and dash, did you?∠Don't feign ignorance now, you scoundrel!"},{"id":1077000135,"text":"Non, non, non. You are mistaken. This is the problem with∠you peasants.∨Don't you understand? You have the privilege of lending∠money to an individual like myself.∨Just think of the honor. I, Vincent de Boule, a pure-blooded∠aristocrat, will be indebted to you. You should be∠overjoyed."},{"id":1077000136,"text":"Don't feed me that hogwash. If you're an aristocrat, you∠should be able to pay for your own meals at least."},{"id":1077000137,"text":"Ah, your words pain me deeply.∨If I had any money on me, I would be glad to∠compensate you however much you'd like. But alas, I have just∠given it all away to some poor starving children."},{"id":1077000138,"text":"Just as I suspected! You're no aristocrat, you're a liar!"},{"id":1077000139,"text":"Hey, what's going on here?"},{"id":1077000140,"text":"Shut up and mind... Ah, why it's Commander∠♂㈱, leader of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1077000141,"text":"♂㈱? ∠Would you perhaps be ♂㈱ McDohl,∠son of General Teo McDohl?∨Allow me to introduce myself. I am Vincent de Boule, an∠imperial aristocrat presently vacationing around these∠parts. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance."},{"id":1077000142,"text":"The pleasure is mine, sir."},{"id":1077000143,"text":"Please, no need for formalities. We are both of noble stock.∨Commander ♂㈱, now that introductions are out∠of the way, may I inquire as to whether you'd be kind enough∠to give me a loan? You see, this man here is being very∠unfair...∨I am currently on my way to visit Joshua of the Dragon∠Knights. As I am in a hurry, you will have to excuse me."},{"id":1077000144,"text":"∠Sure, I'll bet it is."},{"id":1077000145,"text":"Oh, even you are suspicious of me...∨What a sad world we live in. No one trusts anyone these∠days. I am deeply wounded by your response.∨Therefore, to ease my pain, would you be so kind as to pay∠this man for me?∨I am currently on my way to visit Joshua of the Dragon∠Knights. As I am in a hurry, you will have to excuse me."},{"id":1077000146,"text":"What was that about? Didn't he say he was going to visit∠the Dragon Knights?"},{"id":1077000147,"text":"Excuse me... May I ask who will be paying for his meal?"},{"id":1077000148,"text":"What?"},{"id":1077000149,"text":"∠You lose 200 potch."},{"id":1077000150,"text":"Pleasure doing business with you, sir!"},{"id":1077000151,"text":"Why are we the ones stuck covering his bill?"},{"id":1077000152,"text":"...Why indeed."},{"id":1077000153,"text":"That swindler did mention something about visiting the∠Dragon Knights."},{"id":1077000162,"text":"Welcome to my store. Are you here on business?"},{"id":1077000163,"text":"Recruit.∠Commission a job."},{"id":1077000164,"text":"Liberation Army? I'll consider it when you have more people∠on your side. You've still got a ways to go."},{"id":1077000165,"text":"Liberation Army? Could be interesting. Sure, I'll join."},{"id":1077000166,"text":"Commission a job."},{"id":1077000167,"text":"Yeah, sure."},{"id":1077000168,"text":"Welcome. This is the town of Antei.∨Wait, you're the leader of the Liberation Army. Thanks to∠you, I can now call this town by its original name again.∨You know what? Now it's my turn to help you."},{"id":1077000170,"text":"Leave it to me. My special skill is saying town names.∠I'll go ahead and, umm...∨Right, I'll make my way to ♂① Castle."},{"id":1077000171,"text":"Don't recruit."},{"id":1077000172,"text":"Really? Oh well, I was hoping I could be the Liberation∠Army's gatekeeper."},{"id":1077000173,"text":"Welcome! Pick and choose whatever you like. Unless you∠don't have any money. In that case, forget about it.∨Say, I've seen you somewhere. Aren't you ♂㈱,∠the leader of the Liberation Army? I'm Chapman. I may just∠be running this crummy little store...∨...but I've got a lot of heart. Come on, please. Let me join∠the Liberation Army. I can't just watch from the sidelines∠anymore."},{"id":1077000175,"text":"Th-Thanks, Commander ♂㈱. If you need help∠stocking up on armor, I'm the man for the job."},{"id":1077000177,"text":"Can't believe you're letting all my ambitions and potential∠go to waste."},{"id":1077000178,"text":"Oh, who might you be? Have we met somewhere before?∨Ah, of course. You're the leader of the Liberation Army.∨You're planning to kidnap me for a ransom, aren't you? My,∠how terrifying!∨Oh well, such is my fate. My beauty is to blame, isn't it?∠Very well then, I'll go with you.∨But not for free. You must do something for me as a gesture∠of good faith. Let's see... I'll consider going with you∠if you bring me an opal."},{"id":1077000179,"text":"Still haven't brought me my opal ring? My patience is∠limited, you know."},{"id":1077000180,"text":"It does seem to be a real opal ring.∨Very well. You've proven that you're acting in good faith.∠I'll come along."},{"id":1077000181,"text":"Oh, aren't you ♂㈱? I know you. You're quite∠famous around these parts.∨My name's Mina. I'm a professional dancer."},{"id":1077000183,"text":"What? Fine, but only if you dance with me."},{"id":1077000184,"text":"Wait, those won't work. You can't dance in those shoes."},{"id":1077000185,"text":"Recruit."},{"id":1077000187,"text":"You seem like someone I can trust. I picked up on that much∠when we danced. Don't forget I do this for a living.∨Looking forward to working with you, ♂㈱."},{"id":1077000189,"text":"Heehee... You can watch me dance as much as you like,∠Mr. Leader-of-the-Liberation-Army."},{"id":1078000027,"text":"You're part of the Liberation Army, aren't you? I knew it.∠Come on, you've gotta hurry up and liberate this town."},{"id":1078000028,"text":"Don't say you heard it from me.∨You know that poisonous fog surrounding Scarleticia Castle?∠I hear there's a fellow who can create an antidote that∠renders the fog harmless."},{"id":1078000029,"text":"An overnight stay will be 150 potch per person."},{"id":1078000031,"text":"Serves them right, those damn Imperials. And it's all thanks∠to my desperate pleading."},{"id":1078000032,"text":"Thank you. We'll finally have peace and quiet in this town."},{"id":1078000033,"text":"Ahem! This is the town of Lac Virginite. To the south lies∠the village of Premier L'Amour. And to the west, the town∠of Bier Blanche.∨These wonderful names were conceived by General Milich∠Oppenheimer, one of the Five Great Generals."},{"id":1078000034,"text":"South of Rikon...er, I mean Premier L'Amour, there used∠to be a famous doctor named Liukan. They say there's no∠medicine that he cannot make."},{"id":1078000035,"text":"I hate the name Lac Virginite. Wish they'd change it back∠to Teien."},{"id":1078000036,"text":"We can finally kiss that stupid name goodbye. Hip hip∠hooray! This is the town of Teien!"},{"id":1078000037,"text":"Who the hell're you guys? The Liberation Army? Never heard∠of ya. I got no interest in such things.∨All I care about is boats. I'll welcome any job so long as∠it is worthy of my skills."},{"id":1078000038,"text":"We have no business with you."},{"id":1078000039,"text":"Is that so? Then scram. I've got no time for pointless∠banter."},{"id":1078000040,"text":"You guys again? What do you want this time?"},{"id":1078000041,"text":"∠We need a boat that can survive the rapids."},{"id":1078000042,"text":"Hmmm. The Dunan Rapids, eh? Interesting.∨Fine. I'll show you what I'm capable of. But I can't do this∠on my own. No regular boat will ever survive the rapids."},{"id":1078000043,"text":"Then what will you do?"},{"id":1078000044,"text":"I got an idea or two. The old geezer Kamandol who lives∠next door should be able to help.∨Even if he's got one foot in the grave. Let's go see him."},{"id":1078000045,"text":"Research in progress. No visitors allowed.∠–The Alchemist Kamandol"},{"id":1078000046,"text":"Get a load of this sign! Who the hell does he think he is?∨Hey, old man! I know you're in there! Come out, you bastard!∠Unless you want me to bash down the door!"},{"id":1078000047,"text":"You again! I warned you not to disturb my research!"},{"id":1078000048,"text":"There you are, you nasty old codger. Look how sick and pasty∠you are. You really oughta get more sunlight.∨Come on, get yourself out here."},{"id":1078000049,"text":"I told you not to call me \"old codger\"!∨What do you want anyway? Did you come here just to mock∠me with those delinquent friends of yours?"},{"id":1078000050,"text":"D-Delinquents?! How dare you insult the Young Master!∠I can see how you might think that of Viktor, but—"},{"id":1078000051,"text":"Whoa, hold on now. Don't make this more complicated than∠it already is."},{"id":1078000052,"text":"Hey, oldster. You know the Dunan Rapids?∨I came to ask you how we could navigate 'em, but now that I∠think about it, a senile old fossil like you wouldn't have∠the foggiest, right?"},{"id":1078000053,"text":"You ingrate! There's nothing I can't do...with enough time∠and money, that is."},{"id":1078000054,"text":"Then there is a way."},{"id":1078000055,"text":"Of course. I'll show you. Come on inside."},{"id":1078000056,"text":"Take a look. This should help you traverse the rapids."},{"id":1078000057,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1078000058,"text":"This right here is a machine that operates by burning oil."},{"id":1078000059,"text":"A machine that runs on oil? Sounds fishy to me."},{"id":1078000060,"text":"So if we attach this to a boat, we can use it to travel over∠the rapids?"},{"id":1078000061,"text":"Correct."},{"id":1078000062,"text":"All right, let's take this to... P-Pumiere? Premure Lamb?∠Prawnier? Primlaya?"},{"id":1078000063,"text":"It's Premier L'Amour, you dunce."},{"id":1078000064,"text":"Aw, shut it. Who can remember such a stupid name?∠Well, then! Off to Rikon!"},{"id":1078000065,"text":"Take care of my machine. It's fragile, so don't break it."},{"id":1078000066,"text":"Wait..."},{"id":1078000067,"text":"Are you saying..."},{"id":1078000068,"text":"We have to carry it?"},{"id":1078000069,"text":"Of course. You wouldn't make a frail old man carry it,∠would you?"},{"id":1078000070,"text":"You acquired an engine!"},{"id":1078000071,"text":"This is General Milich's domain. You are not permitted∠to disembark here."},{"id":1078000072,"text":"Gen is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1078000073,"text":"Kamandol is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1078000082,"text":"The name's Hellion. You're ♂㈱, aren't you?∠Yes, I know who you are.∨I may not look it, but I too wield the might of a rune.∠That Soul Eater of yours possesses infinite power, but also∠evil intent.∨I'm curious to know the nature of what guides this power.∠So how about it? Will you let me look into your future?∨Not for free, of course. I'll lend you my strength in∠return. Do we have a deal?"},{"id":1078000084,"text":"Much obliged. I'll head to your castle. By the way, my∠power is called \"Recall.\""},{"id":1078000085,"text":"You acquired the Blinking Mirror."},{"id":1078000087,"text":"Really? Sure you won't be needing my power of \"Recall\"?"},{"id":1078000088,"text":"My name is Eikei. I'm a master of the martial arts, and∠I respect only the strong.∨Are you strong?∨Nope, you're about ♂⑤ levels short."},{"id":1078000089,"text":"My name is Eikei. I'm a master of the martial arts, and∠I respect only the strong.∨Are you strong?∨Whoa, you truly are. I can lend you my strength. I've been∠waiting for someone like you. Let me join the Liberation∠Army."},{"id":1078000091,"text":"I'd be honored."},{"id":1078000093,"text":"Very well. I respect your decision."},{"id":1078000094,"text":"If you use this Blinking Mirror, you can return to your∠headquarters whenever you please."},{"id":1079000054,"text":"You're looking for Master Liukan, too? Well, you won't find∠him. The good doctor lives hidden deep in the mountains."},{"id":1079000055,"text":"I came all this way because I heard there was a famous∠doctor here. I thought I could finally find a cure for my∠child's illness..."},{"id":1079000056,"text":"If you want to stay the night, please pay 150 potch per∠person."},{"id":1079000058,"text":"That blowhard Jabba is always bragging that there's nothing∠he can't appraise. But guess what? He's failed once before."},{"id":1079000059,"text":"I remember now. It was a long time ago. Jabba called it∠\"the Nameless Urn\" because he couldn't appraise it."},{"id":1079000060,"text":"An old man named Liukan comes by here once a month to do∠some shopping."},{"id":1079000061,"text":"Welcome. What would you like appraised?"},{"id":1079000064,"text":"All right, we're here."},{"id":1079000065,"text":"Good. Go ahead and put down the machine."},{"id":1079000066,"text":"Whew! We can finally be rid of this thing."},{"id":1079000067,"text":"Yeah, it was tough fighting with it on my back."},{"id":1079000068,"text":"C'mon, gramps. Let's get to work."},{"id":1079000069,"text":"You needn't remind me."},{"id":1079000070,"text":"♂㈱, you and the rest'll just be gettin' in the∠way, so why don't ya go rest at the inn or somethin'?∨Don't worry, we'll have your shiny new boat ready to go∠in no time."},{"id":1079000071,"text":"Damn that old man, making us lug that huge thing around."},{"id":1079000072,"text":"Gotta tell ya, even I'm exhausted after all that."},{"id":1079000073,"text":"Let's call it an early night."},{"id":1079000074,"text":"*thunderous snoring*∨*thunderous snoring*"},{"id":1079000075,"text":"*quiet breathing*∨*quiet breathing*"},{"id":1079000076,"text":".........∨.........∨........."},{"id":1079000077,"text":"Young Master...∨I have looked after you since you were a boy. At times I∠feel as if you are my little brother...or even my own son.∨I began with a desire to repay my debt to Master Teo, but∠now...∨In any case, perhaps you no longer need me to protect you."},{"id":1079000078,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱, you're awake."},{"id":1079000079,"text":"I wonder how Gen and Kamandol are getting on."},{"id":1079000080,"text":"Take a look. We worked all night to finish it."},{"id":1079000081,"text":"It's inhumane, working an old man to death like this."},{"id":1079000082,"text":"♂㈱, let's have a launching ceremony."},{"id":1079000083,"text":"I'm Jabba. I'm an expert appraiser, second to none.∨If you can find something I can't appraise, I'll do whatever∠you ask of me."},{"id":1079000084,"text":"Request appraisal."},{"id":1079000085,"text":"Well, there you go."},{"id":1079000086,"text":"Hmmm, let me see...∨............∨I give up. This item is beyond valuable. I can't believe∠there's actually an urn I'm unable to appraise.∨Well, a promise is a promise. Name your request."},{"id":1079000087,"text":"Recruit.∠Ask for money."},{"id":1079000088,"text":"Wait, is that all? No problem. I'm no fighter, but my eyes∠should come in handy."},{"id":1079000089,"text":"Ask for money."},{"id":1079000090,"text":"You're one sly fellow. Well, a promise is a promise. Here's∠the money for the urn. Take it."},{"id":1079000091,"text":"You acquired 20,000 potch!"},{"id":1079000092,"text":"Have you seen my cat anywhere?"},{"id":1079000093,"text":"Excuse me, mister. Can you help me find my cat Mina?∨If you help me find her, I'll join your cause."},{"id":1079000094,"text":"Thank goodness, there she is. I've been looking all over∠for you, Mina.∨Thank you, ♂㈱. My name is Lotte. Lotte the∠Sorceress. As a gesture of thanks, I'd like to join you."},{"id":1079000095,"text":"What the hell are you staring at? Something unusual with the∠way I look?"},{"id":1079000096,"text":"Recruit.∠Don't recruit."},{"id":1079000097,"text":"Leader of the Liberation Army, eh? Impressive. I'm just∠passing through these lands.∨Not that I have any particular destination. Who knows, maybe∠I'll find a clue...∨Hm? Oh, nothing. Just talking to myself. All right then.∠I'll give you a hand."},{"id":1079000098,"text":"Don't recruit."},{"id":1079000099,"text":"Fine, then get out of my face."},{"id":1080000001,"text":"We've reached the Rapids. Hey, old codger. You ready?"},{"id":1080000002,"text":"I told you not to call me that.∠All right, let's go!"},{"id":1080000003,"text":"Well, looks like going into hiding out here was pointless."},{"id":1080000004,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1080000005,"text":"Let me guess. You want me to make you some medicine, ∠right? Well, I'm sick and tired of all that."},{"id":1080000006,"text":"Please, sir. We need an antidote for the poisonous flower∠in Milich's castle."},{"id":1080000007,"text":"Oh dear. Such a concoction would be highly inconvenient."},{"id":1080000008,"text":"Who's there?!"},{"id":1080000009,"text":"Pleased to meet you. I am the most renowned of the Five∠Great Generals.∨Milich Oppenheimer, the Flower General."},{"id":1080000010,"text":"That's nonsense! ∠The most renowned of the Five Great Generals is Master Teo!"},{"id":1080000011,"text":"Well, well, if it isn't Teo's lowly servant. And over here∠we have ♂㈱ McDohl himself.∨♂㈱, your father must weep knowing that his own∠son is a traitor to the Empire."},{"id":1080000012,"text":"Hey, Peacock Man! What's your business here?"},{"id":1080000013,"text":"Ah yes, I nearly forgot. It simply will not do to have my∠sweet Antoinette robbed of her poison.∨Instead, I shall invite Master Liukan for a visit to my∠impenetrable Soniere Prison."},{"id":1080000014,"text":"Wh-What the devil are you talking about..."},{"id":1080000015,"text":"Come now, don't be shy. We must be on our way now.∨Just so you know, ♂㈱, I'm not some naive fool∠like Kwanda was. Well then, ta-ta everyone."},{"id":1080000016,"text":"Unbelievable... Snatched away in front of our very eyes!∠How utterly humiliating!"},{"id":1080000017,"text":"Soniere Prison... That's one hell of a place he's taken him."},{"id":1080000018,"text":"We'd best ask Mathiu for his advice.∨For now, let's return∠to ♂① Castle."},{"id":1081000001,"text":"This is Soniere Prison, where all those who oppose the∠Empire end up."},{"id":1081000002,"text":"Rumor has it there's a monster living in the depths of the∠prison dungeon. Some guy apparently got an opal off this∠creature."},{"id":1081000003,"text":"Welcome, sir."},{"id":1081000004,"text":"At ease, soldier. We have direct orders from General Milich."},{"id":1081000005,"text":"Yes, I can see they are indeed, sir. Please, come inside."},{"id":1081000006,"text":"Oh? Looks like my time is up. I'm ready to die. There's∠nothing left for me in this world."},{"id":1081000007,"text":"Oh, I'd say there're a few things left. We're here to rescue∠you."},{"id":1081000008,"text":"You... You're the troublemakers who showed up at my house."},{"id":1081000009,"text":"Say what you want, but for now we've gotta get you out of∠here!"},{"id":1081000010,"text":"Well, I was starting to miss the sunlight, anyway."},{"id":1081000011,"text":"Well, well, well. We meet again. I dropped by after hearing∠we had some unwanted guests, and look who it is."},{"id":1081000012,"text":"Great timing. We might as well settle this here and now.∠It'll save us all the trouble of dealin' with you later."},{"id":1081000013,"text":"My, my, how savage. I can hold my own with a sword,∠but I'm unfortunately not in the mood at the moment.∨I will gift you with this instead. Do you see this bottle?∠It's filled with the Spores of Agony.∨A rare sight, given how hard these spores are to procure.∠Did you know they feed on human flesh? Flesh-eating spores,∠you might say."},{"id":1081000014,"text":"What?! What're you going to do with that?"},{"id":1081000015,"text":"Why, this."},{"id":1081000016,"text":"Well, there goes the bottle. You may want to run if you wish∠to survive.∨Although that way's a dead end, so you're pretty much stuck∠in here. Now, if you'll excuse me..."},{"id":1081000017,"text":"Run! They're gonna eat us!"},{"id":1081000018,"text":"Young Master, through the door. Hurry!"},{"id":1081000019,"text":"No! Gremio! Get outta there! What the hell're you doing?!"},{"id":1081000020,"text":"Viktor, this door can only be opened from this side."},{"id":1081000021,"text":"What're you talkin' about? We'll get out of this together∠somehow. So hurry up and get over here..."},{"id":1081000022,"text":"No, it's too late. The spores are already at my feet.∠I can't risk opening the door..."},{"id":1081000023,"text":"Open the door, Gremio!"},{"id":1081000024,"text":"Young Master, for once I must refuse your request."},{"id":1081000025,"text":"∠I'm sorry, Gremio."},{"id":1081000026,"text":"It's okay, Young Master."},{"id":1081000027,"text":"Young Master, can you hear me?∨I'm sorry I can't protect you anymore.∨...But you've grown so much, you no longer need my∠protection, do you?∨Young Master... I am so proud of the man you have become.∠I wish your father could see you now."},{"id":1081000028,"text":"Gremio..."},{"id":1081000029,"text":"Young Master... It looks like it's time to say goodbye.∠I...I can't see very well anymore.∨You have always been my pride. Promise me you won't lose∠heart until the end.∨That is my first...and final...request..."},{"id":1081000030,"text":"Are you all right, Commander ♂㈱? You did not∠return, so I marched here with the troops...∨What happened? There's no trace of the imperial forces."},{"id":1081000031,"text":"They must've been devoured by the flesh-eating spores."},{"id":1081000032,"text":"F-Flesh-eating spores?"},{"id":1081000033,"text":"Let's get outta here for now. ♂㈱ needs to rest."},{"id":1081000034,"text":"Wait a minute."},{"id":1081000035,"text":"All right, let's go."},{"id":1081000036,"text":"This place is strictly off-limits to those without∠permission from General Milich."},{"id":1081000037,"text":"Who goes there?!"},{"id":1081000038,"text":"No way a shady character like you is getting past me!"},{"id":1081000039,"text":"State your business! What brings you to Soniere Prison?"},{"id":1081000040,"text":"Y-You really mean to fight?!"},{"id":1081000041,"text":"My, my, how savage. I can hold my own with a sword,∠but I'm unfortunately not in the mood at the moment.∨I will gift you with this instead."},{"id":1081000042,"text":"Do you see this bottle? It's filled with the Spores of∠Agony.∨A rare sight, given how hard these spores are to procure.∠Did you know they feed on human flesh? Flesh-eating spores,∠you might say."},{"id":1081000043,"text":"Damn, it won't open. That bastard Milich made sure to lock∠the door behind him."},{"id":1082000001,"text":"All right, whoever has their hands free, set fire to this∠flower."},{"id":1082000002,"text":"Stop! How could you do this to my beloved Antoinette?!"},{"id":1082000003,"text":"Milich, you bastard! I'll make you pay!"},{"id":1082000004,"text":"Aaagh! It burns, it burns! My arm is on fire!∨Lady Windy's rune is melting. Please, stop!"},{"id":1082000005,"text":"Wh-What's the meaning of this..."},{"id":1082000006,"text":"Hey, Milich. Time to settle the score."},{"id":1082000007,"text":"I'll avenge Gremio by striking you down."},{"id":1082000008,"text":"Likewise. Prepare to die."},{"id":1082000009,"text":"Gremio? Avenge?"},{"id":1082000010,"text":"Everyone, wait! General Milich, was that, by any chance,∠a Black Rune?"},{"id":1082000011,"text":"A Black Rune... Wait, you mean the rune Windy gave me?"},{"id":1082000012,"text":"Outta the way, Mathiu! We got more pressing issues than∠some damn Black Rune. This bastard killed Gremio!"},{"id":1082000013,"text":"That's right. He'll pay for what he did!"},{"id":1082000014,"text":"What do you think, ♂㈱?"},{"id":1082000015,"text":"Gremio must be avenged."},{"id":1082000016,"text":"I suppose you're right. My own carelessness is to blame for∠all of this.∨In the end, I was of no help to the Emperor. It's fitting∠that I die here.∨A transient life...like that of a flower."},{"id":1082000017,"text":"Prepare to die."},{"id":1082000018,"text":"Viktor. Let me do it."},{"id":1082000019,"text":"Gremio, my friend. I've avenged you."},{"id":1082000020,"text":"∠This man is innocent."},{"id":1082000021,"text":"Master ♂㈱, aren't we going to avenge Gremio?"},{"id":1082000022,"text":"Yeah. There's no way you can tell me this scumbag doesn't∠deserve it."},{"id":1082000023,"text":"Stop, Viktor."},{"id":1082000024,"text":"Don't try to stop me, Flik!"},{"id":1082000025,"text":"Enough, Viktor. Our commander has made his decision.∠We must follow his orders."},{"id":1082000026,"text":"Wait, Flik. Did you just say \"commander\"?"},{"id":1082000027,"text":"You are...Teo's son...∨............∨Commander ♂㈱ of the Liberation Army, I have a∠request. I, Milich Oppenheimer, wish to join your army.∨The Emperor has been bewitched by the Sorceress Windy's∠resemblance to the late Empress Claudia.∨However, unlike Empress Claudia, evil resides within Windy's∠heart. I cannot let the Emperor continue down this path.∨I beg you. Please allow me to join the Liberation Army."},{"id":1082000028,"text":"I can't."},{"id":1082000029,"text":"Of course not! Count yourself lucky you're still alive!"},{"id":1082000030,"text":"∠Very well."},{"id":1082000031,"text":"You have my gratitude."},{"id":1082000032,"text":"Why?! I can't accept this!"},{"id":1082000033,"text":"Stop it, Pahn."},{"id":1082000034,"text":"Help! Help!"},{"id":1082000035,"text":"What's the matter, Stallion?"},{"id":1082000036,"text":"The Imperial Army is approaching! Sanchez says you've got to∠get back immediately."},{"id":1082000037,"text":"What?! Commander ♂㈱, we must mobilize our∠army at once."},{"id":1082000038,"text":"I actually kind of like his style..."},{"id":1082000039,"text":"∠Pfft... What a weirdo."},{"id":1082000040,"text":"Milich's Portrait"},{"id":1082000041,"text":"Whoa, what's up with all the pollen?"},{"id":1082000042,"text":"♂㈱, let's get outta here for now."},{"id":1082000043,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's storm the castle and burn∠that rose."},{"id":1082000044,"text":"♂㈱, I'll avenge Gremio!"},{"id":1082000045,"text":"♂㈱, I'm going with you."},{"id":1082000046,"text":"Now please choose your remaining party members."},{"id":1082000047,"text":"All right. Let's go!"},{"id":1082000048,"text":"We'll be right behind you."},{"id":1082000057,"text":"I want to paint whatever I please. But that Milich robbed me∠of my freedom.∨Will you return it to me?"},{"id":1082000058,"text":"I see you've won. You must see freedom within your reach.∨Even at my age, I've never witnessed true freedom.∠Say, mind if I come along with you?∨I'd like to behold this freedom of yours."},{"id":1082000060,"text":"Thank you."},{"id":1082000062,"text":"I see...∨You might be right. Perhaps true freedom only comes from∠finding it yourself."},{"id":1082000063,"text":"My name is Kasios, and I am a balladeer.∨My loyalty is only to Master Milich, for he alone truly∠understands my music."},{"id":1082000064,"text":"Oh, Master Milich. Let me go with you and remain by your∠side."},{"id":1083000001,"text":"You are not permitted to travel north."},{"id":1083000002,"text":"You've reached the Jowston border. Civilians are not∠permitted to travel any further."},{"id":1083000037,"text":"All right, our entire army will march north and attack∠the imperial forces stationed there."},{"id":1083000038,"text":"What?! Why the sudden change of plan?"},{"id":1083000039,"text":"Yes. Wasn't today simply meant to be a drill?"},{"id":1083000040,"text":"That's what the Imperial Army must be thinking. We cannot∠miss this opportunity. We will continue north, and there we∠will launch an attack."},{"id":1083000041,"text":"...A surprise attack."},{"id":1083000042,"text":"I thought this was a lot of equipment for just a drill."},{"id":1083000043,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, give the order, and we will∠begin marching north."},{"id":1083000044,"text":"Commander Griffith! We're in trouble. It's the Liberation∠Army!"},{"id":1083000045,"text":"Hmm? Yes, yes, I know all about it. They're out running∠drills today."},{"id":1083000046,"text":"Th-That's the thing, sir. They suddenly began marching∠toward us."},{"id":1083000047,"text":"Yes, yes, I'm well aware...∨Wait, you mean our spy's information was false? Oh boy,∠we're in trouble. How far has the Liberation Army advanced?"},{"id":1083000048,"text":"They're right at our gates!"},{"id":1083000049,"text":"Hmmm, this is a serious problem. All right, you go inform∠General Kasim. Meanwhile, I'll try to buy us some time."},{"id":1083000052,"text":"Gimme a break. I'm not a morning person. Anyway, we're∠badly outmatched.∨Listen, ♂㈱. We don't stand a chance. I surrender.∨That said, some of my soldiers may not be as easily∠convinced. So give me some time to persuade them."},{"id":1083000053,"text":"Well, if we can avoid bloodshed..."},{"id":1083000054,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, this is a ploy. They mean to buy∠themselves time. We should attack at once.∨Signal the troops!"},{"id":1083000055,"text":"Damn, they didn't fall for it. Listen up, men. Give it your∠best shot.∨But if reinforcements don't make it in time, we'll just∠surrender. Don't waste your lives."},{"id":1083000056,"text":"Damn, I guess we lost. All right, all right, we yield.∠Life is too precious to waste."},{"id":1083000057,"text":"Recruit.∠"},{"id":1083000058,"text":"Join you? And betray the Empire?∨Promise me one thing then. Swear you'll spare the lives∠of my soldiers."},{"id":1083000059,"text":"Very well. We guarantee their lives."},{"id":1083000060,"text":"Fine, I'm in, then. Imperial Army, Liberation Army, it makes∠no difference to me, so long as I can eat."},{"id":1083000061,"text":"Commander G-Griffith, we will follow you."},{"id":1083000062,"text":"That's a real nice thing to say. Thanks, guys."},{"id":1083000063,"text":"Griffith has joined you."},{"id":1083000064,"text":"Cut off his head."},{"id":1083000065,"text":"Well, it is what it is. I lost the battle. Just please∠spare my soldiers. I beg you."},{"id":1083000066,"text":"Commander G-Griffith..."},{"id":1083000067,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I have an idea. Please entrust∠me with this man's life."},{"id":1083000068,"text":"Wait, you sure about this? I'm pretty darn useless."},{"id":1083000092,"text":"At last, the time has come to deliver a crushing blow to the∠tyrannical Imperial Army.∨We must to lend our aid to the Liberation Army. Hurry,∠Sancho!"},{"id":1083000093,"text":"Yes, Master!"},{"id":1083000094,"text":"Ready, charge!"},{"id":1083000095,"text":"Who the devil are you? Can't you see we're in a hurry?∨The Liberation Army desperately awaits our help. We must∠make haste to Moravia Castle!"},{"id":1083000096,"text":"M-Master..."},{"id":1083000097,"text":"What is it, Sancho?"},{"id":1083000098,"text":"Th-This person..."},{"id":1083000099,"text":"Yes, out with it, Sancho!"},{"id":1083000100,"text":"He's Commander ♂㈱, leader of the Liberation∠Army."},{"id":1083000101,"text":"Good heavens! Please excuse my rudeness.∨My name is Maximillian. I am the former commander of the∠now disbanded Knights of Maximillian.∨As my final quest, I wish to aid the Liberation Army.∠Please, I implore you. Allow me to join your ranks."},{"id":1083000102,"text":"P-Please consider my master's request. I beg you, sir."},{"id":1083000104,"text":"You have my gratitude. Please witness my final hurrah."},{"id":1083000105,"text":"How wonderful, Master."},{"id":1083000106,"text":"I see. So you're saying you have no need of an old man∠such as myself?∨Let's return home, Sancho. It seems our era has come to an∠end."},{"id":1083000107,"text":"P-Please don't say that, Master..."},{"id":1102000041,"text":"Welcome to the best inn in all of Warriors' Village! And it∠only costs 100 potch per person."},{"id":1102000043,"text":"This is Warriors' Village, famous for its chief's∠long-winded speeches."},{"id":1102000044,"text":"He likes to brag a lot, but I know he secretly named his∠sword after me."},{"id":1102000045,"text":"A sword is a warrior's most prized possession. And it's∠customary in our village to name your sword after the one∠who is most dear to you."},{"id":1102000046,"text":"Man, that Flik. Set off on his Manhood Ceremony five years∠ago and hasn't been seen since. Pretty sure that's some∠kinda village record."},{"id":1102000047,"text":"Flik! It's been a while! Haven't seen you in five years!"},{"id":1102000048,"text":"I ought to visit Qlon Temple to pay my respects.∠Where is it located? Just west of here."},{"id":1102000049,"text":"I'll defeat Neclord! I'm gonna make my way southwest and∠infiltrate that castle of his!"},{"id":1102000050,"text":"I was the one who was supposed to defeat Neclord..."},{"id":1102000051,"text":"\"Praise our King, even in the forest, not only at night, but∠also during work.\"∨Those were the last words of the only villager ever to∠brave Neclord's castle and live to tell the tale.∨I figure it's some kind of code..."},{"id":1102000052,"text":"Th-The Liberation Army can handle him, right?"},{"id":1102000053,"text":"Gee, Hix. I knew I could count on you.∠Did you hear him? I think you're gonna have to protect me∠instead."},{"id":1102000054,"text":"We are... Ho!"},{"id":1102000055,"text":"We are... Ho!"},{"id":1102000056,"text":"The Warriors... Ho!"},{"id":1102000057,"text":"Of the Warriors'... Ho-ho-ho! Ho!"},{"id":1102000058,"text":"Village... Ho!"},{"id":1102000059,"text":"And nobody... Ho!"},{"id":1102000060,"text":"Yes, nobody... Ho!"},{"id":1102000061,"text":"Can defeat us... Ra-ta-ta-ta! Ho!"},{"id":1102000062,"text":"......☆10Zzz..."},{"id":1102000063,"text":"Stop, Tengaar. Don't go."},{"id":1102000064,"text":"Let go of me, Hix. My mind is already made up."},{"id":1102000065,"text":"You can't. You'll be eaten. That's what everyone says."},{"id":1102000066,"text":"So what? You'll protect me then? Come on, Hix. You haven't∠even named your sword."},{"id":1102000067,"text":"I-I... B-But I'm sure the others can protect you."},{"id":1102000068,"text":"You're always like this. Besides, the rumors of bloodsucking∠are probably just that—rumors.∨We could probably live comfortably in the castle. Far better∠than staying in this dreary village."},{"id":1102000069,"text":"Y-You can't be serious?"},{"id":1102000070,"text":"Tengaar! I told you not to leave the house. Why must you∠always misbehave? Who knows when Neclord will show up!"},{"id":1102000071,"text":"What?! Neclord?"},{"id":1102000072,"text":"Hey, old man! Did you just say Neclord?"},{"id":1102000073,"text":"Who are you people?"},{"id":1102000074,"text":"Shut it, I'm the one askin' the questions! Answer me!"},{"id":1102000075,"text":"Viktor, what's the matter with you? Calm down."},{"id":1102000076,"text":"Wait, are these people from the Liberation Army?∨That's right. I watched them attack Milich's castle. And∠I've seen this bear guy as well."},{"id":1102000077,"text":"Bear guy?"},{"id":1102000078,"text":"I-I'm sorry, don't be angry!"},{"id":1102000079,"text":"I see. The Liberation Army... So you must be Commander∠♂㈱.∨I've heard much about you. Will you please come to my∠house? I'll tell you about Neclord there. This way, please."},{"id":1102000080,"text":"Ow! You're hurting me! Quit pulling my arm! You'll dislocate∠it!"},{"id":1102000081,"text":"Just come along."},{"id":1102000082,"text":"It was about three months ago. A man named Neclord arrived∠here as the new general of the region.∨He unleashed a terrible spell that transformed the imperial∠soldiers into zombies and skeletons."},{"id":1102000083,"text":"I see. That explains all the graves at Lorimar Fortress."},{"id":1102000084,"text":"He then used his undead to threaten the nearby villages.∠His demand? Well..."},{"id":1102000085,"text":"Deliver Tengaar to the castle? No way."},{"id":1102000086,"text":"Sounds about right from him."},{"id":1102000087,"text":"The other villages accepted his demands and gave up their∠women, but not us.∨This is the Warriors' Village, I'll have you know..."},{"id":1102000088,"text":"No, no, please..."},{"id":1102000089,"text":"Oh boy. Here goes. Hope you're ready."},{"id":1102000090,"text":"Our ancestor Clift the Crusader founded this village after∠the Final Battle.∨We have defended it for generations ever since. Of course,∠peace and safety never came easily.∨Naturally, there were times when the village was endangered,∠and one of our village chiefs even led our clan to war.∨Amongst our past chiefs, five are particularly renowned for∠their courageous feats. They are..."},{"id":1102000091,"text":"...and thus I came to be chief of Warriors' Village after∠my predecessor Karak."},{"id":1102000092,"text":"Wh-What'd I just sit through?"},{"id":1102000093,"text":"The sun's already set. He just keeps going on and on."},{"id":1102000094,"text":"You done with your story, old man?"},{"id":1102000095,"text":"What, did you want to hear more? In that case, I have∠another fine tale..."},{"id":1102000096,"text":"Oh, no, no! Thanks. That's quite enough. I'm gonna go get∠some shut-eye."},{"id":1102000097,"text":"In that case, we've already prepared a room. Please get∠plenty of rest. We can continue the tale tomorrow."},{"id":1102000098,"text":"Viktor and Cleo have already gone to bed. Perhaps you should∠do the same, Commander ♂㈱...∨Unless you wish to stay up and talk with me 'til morning?"},{"id":1102000099,"text":"That girl talking to Hix... Her name's Cleo, right?∨Wh-What? It's not like I care or anything. Just happened to∠be passing by is all."},{"id":1102000100,"text":"What did you want to talk about? I think I've done enough∠listening for today."},{"id":1102000101,"text":"I'm sorry, Cleo.∨.........∨Um, Cleo..."},{"id":1102000102,"text":"Yes?"},{"id":1102000103,"text":"Cleo, why is it you fight when you're a woman?∨Here in the Warriors' Village, women don't fight."},{"id":1102000104,"text":"Why do I fight? Well...I don't see why women shouldn't.∨Just like men, we have things we want to protect. Isn't∠there something you want to protect?"},{"id":1102000105,"text":"Me? Y-Yeah. But I'm weak..."},{"id":1102000106,"text":"Hm... You're right. There's no need for the weak to force∠themselves to fight. If you get killed, it's all over∠anyway."},{"id":1102000107,"text":"But..."},{"id":1102000108,"text":"Hix. You'll never be strong so long as you see yourself∠as weak."},{"id":1102000109,"text":"I guess you're right. Thank you, Cleo."},{"id":1102000110,"text":"Sure, no problem. Goodnight, Hix."},{"id":1102000111,"text":"Oh, it's you, ♂㈱. I can't sleep. I've finally got∠a lead on Neclord.∨Neclord is not human. He used a rune to become a vampire.∠That bastard murdered my entire village.∨When I returned, I saw my own family eating each other,∠transformed into zombies by his magic.∨That's where my journey began. And perhaps it ends here.∠I will kill him... With my own hands...∨Get some sleep, ♂㈱.∠Me? I'll be up a little longer lookin' at the moon."},{"id":1102000112,"text":"Good morning, Master ♂㈱. Did you manage to∠sleep off yesterday's fatigue?"},{"id":1102000113,"text":"Wh-Whoa!∨Commander ♂㈱! G-Good night!"},{"id":1102000114,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, if you plan on going out instead∠of resting, how about we continue the stories..."},{"id":1102000115,"text":"Good morning, everyone."},{"id":1102000116,"text":"Neclord! What're you doing here?!"},{"id":1102000117,"text":"Why, I've come to claim your daughter, of course. But you∠knew that, didn't you? She's your daughter, after all."},{"id":1102000118,"text":"You're not taking Tengaar!"},{"id":1102000119,"text":"Th-That's right! And what're you doing here in broad∠daylight? Are you some kinda knock-off vampire?"},{"id":1102000120,"text":"Knock-off? Excuse me. I happen to be a legitimate vampire,∠thanks to the help of a rune.∨Besides, this amount of sunlight poses no harm to me.∠Although I do grow quite drowsy during the day."},{"id":1102000121,"text":"Be gone! Or witness the full might of the Warriors' Village!"},{"id":1102000122,"text":"Well, I've now witnessed your full might. I suppose it's the∠most one can expect from humans."},{"id":1102000123,"text":"Damn you, Neclord! You're mine now! Prepare to die!"},{"id":1102000124,"text":"Viktor!"},{"id":1102000125,"text":"Heehee. It seems my reputation precedes me. ∠How bothersome.∨Well then, satisfied? Now please, hand over the girl.
