I will∠bestow upon her the honor of becoming my 70th bride."},{"id":1102000126,"text":"W-Wait! I-I won't let you take T-Tengaar."},{"id":1102000127,"text":"Please get out of the way. Or do you wish to die?"},{"id":1102000128,"text":"I-I'm not moving."},{"id":1102000129,"text":"Then you leave me no choice."},{"id":1102000130,"text":"Wait! Please, Hix. Step aside."},{"id":1102000131,"text":"Wh-What are you talking about? I-I'll protect..."},{"id":1102000132,"text":"Thank you, Hix. But I won't let you die over this.∨Now, get out of the way!"},{"id":1102000133,"text":"My, such resolve. I do so love sincere women."},{"id":1102000134,"text":"If I go with you, do you promise not to harm the others in∠the village?"},{"id":1102000135,"text":"Of course. I'm a man of my word."},{"id":1102000136,"text":"Tengaar! I swear! I will! Definitely! Rescue you!"},{"id":1102000137,"text":"I know. I'll be waiting, Hix."},{"id":1102000138,"text":"Shall we be on our way then, my lovely bride?"},{"id":1102000139,"text":"You back with us, ♂㈱? We had Neclord right here∠in front of us, and there was nothin' we could do.∨We're gonna need somethin' special to defeat him. Ordinary∠weapons're no good against a vampire, especially one created∠by the power of a rune."},{"id":1102000140,"text":"A special weapon capable of defeating vampires? I've never∠heard of...∨Wait, hold on. Perhaps there..."},{"id":1102000141,"text":"What, you know of somethin'?"},{"id":1102000142,"text":"Yes. West of this village, you will find Qlon Temple.∨Now, this temple was founded long ago by a certain monk∠known as Qlon who..."},{"id":1102000143,"text":"Gah! I'll rip your damn tongue out! Just tell us what we∠need to know! Nothin' more!"},{"id":1102000144,"text":"Ah, yes, of course. This Qlon Temple is said to hide a∠closely-guarded secret..."},{"id":1102000145,"text":"That's it? Doesn't really give us much to go on."},{"id":1102000146,"text":"But we have no other leads. Let's just visit this temple."},{"id":1102000147,"text":"*groans*"},{"id":1102000148,"text":"Oh, Commander ♂㈱. You've returned.∨How did it go? Did you find a way to defeat Neclord?"},{"id":1102000149,"text":"You bet we did. Take a look at this.∠Hey, say hello."},{"id":1102000150,"text":"Me? Greet a human? You've got some nerve. They should be∠the ones greeting me."},{"id":1102000151,"text":"A talking sword? Will it defeat the vampire?"},{"id":1102000152,"text":"Of course I will. Vampires don't stand a chance against me."},{"id":1102000153,"text":"Hear that?"},{"id":1102000154,"text":"Those two have a lot in common when it comes to∠overconfidence."},{"id":1102000155,"text":"That's reassuring to hear. We were just about to depart for∠Neclord's Castle.∨Look what that fiend sent us."},{"id":1102000156,"text":"A wedding invitation... Whose?"},{"id":1102000157,"text":"His and Tengaar's! If we don't hurry, he'll drain her blood."},{"id":1102000158,"text":"Chief. We're ready to depart."},{"id":1102000159,"text":"Very well, let's go.∠Commander ♂㈱, we'll go on ahead."},{"id":1102000160,"text":"I'm not allowed to go. I haven't proven myself yet, so they∠won't let me fight."},{"id":1102000161,"text":"Hey there. Brought me some work?"},{"id":1102000164,"text":"Join the Liberation Army? Hmmm... I won't lie. The Empire∠is in a sorry state of disorder.∨But isn't a blacksmith's job to be a blacksmith? That said,∠I did hear Mose joined up..."},{"id":1102000165,"text":"Maas, Meese, Mose, I see you've all joined the Liberation∠Army.∨Commander ♂㈱, if they believe in you, so can I.∠Allow me to join you as well."},{"id":1102000166,"text":"My name's Window. I'm still not a warrior.∨To tell you the truth, I don't want to be a warrior. What∠I really want to be is a window frame maker."},{"id":1102000167,"text":"Hey, boss. Got anything for me?∨Look, I can tell. You have something that's real important∠to me. That's it, the Window Rune.∨Please, can I have it? In exchange, I'll join the Liberation∠Army."},{"id":1102000168,"text":"Give him the Window Rune.∠Don't give it to him."},{"id":1102000169,"text":"Thank you. With this, I can become a great stained-glass∠window maker."},{"id":1102000170,"text":"Don't give it to him."},{"id":1102000171,"text":"I see... If only I had that, I'd be a great-stained glass∠window maker."},{"id":1102000172,"text":"Well, we meet again, boss. How about another round? Tell you∠what. If you win more than 5,000 off me, I'll join you."},{"id":1102000173,"text":"Well played. A promise is a promise. I'm all yours."},{"id":1103000001,"text":"I've been expecting you, Starmaster."},{"id":1103000002,"text":"Starmaster? What the heck you on about? You know∠♂㈱ from somewhere?"},{"id":1103000003,"text":"Of course I do. Master ♂㈱ is fated to lead the∠108 Stars of Destiny."},{"id":1103000004,"text":"108 Stars? Cleo, this monk is off his rocker."},{"id":1103000005,"text":"Viktor, you were born under the Star of Solitude, and Cleo,∠under the Star of Fulfilment.∨All those here, including myself, were born under one of the∠108 Stars.∨We are destined to gather together, once again, under∠Master ♂㈱'s star—the Chief Star of Heaven."},{"id":1103000006,"text":"Hey, old man. Enough of this nonsense. Now listen to what∠we have to say."},{"id":1103000007,"text":"I already know. You've come here in search of a way to∠defeat the vampire Neclord. Am I correct?"},{"id":1103000008,"text":"Th-Then you know how to do it?"},{"id":1103000009,"text":"Indeed. Allow me to show you. Come this way."},{"id":1103000010,"text":"What is this, some kinda altar?"},{"id":1103000011,"text":"This is the Cave of the Past. What you seek lies within."},{"id":1103000012,"text":"Why the cryptic act? If you knew we were comin', you∠could've saved us the trouble by just givin' us whatever's∠in there."},{"id":1103000013,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, much awaits you within this∠cave.∨You must be ready to accept it all.∨Please enter, and be sure to tread carefully."},{"id":1103000014,"text":"Please, tread carefully."},{"id":1103000015,"text":"You acquired 5,000 potch!"},{"id":1103000016,"text":"Hey, this must be what the old man was talkin' about."},{"id":1103000017,"text":"Careful, don't get too close."},{"id":1103000018,"text":"Don't worry, it'll be fine."},{"id":1103000019,"text":"A curse upon those who disturb my slumber."},{"id":1103000020,"text":"What?"},{"id":1103000021,"text":"Man did we luck out. Looks like we made it back."},{"id":1103000022,"text":"Ted's not with us."},{"id":1103000023,"text":"Yeah, you're right..."},{"id":1103000024,"text":"He probably belongs to that other world, so he wasn't able∠to cross over.∨From here on, he'll have to manage on his own. It's likely∠his fate can't be changed."},{"id":1103000025,"text":"Man did we luck out. Looks like we made it back."},{"id":1103000026,"text":"Hold on, this thing again? Everyone, stay back. No way I'm∠repeatin' that whole ordeal."},{"id":1103000027,"text":"You're one to talk. You got us into that mess to begin with."},{"id":1103000028,"text":"Viktor..."},{"id":1103000029,"text":"Whoa, whoa, whoa. I-I didn't do anything."},{"id":1103000030,"text":"Viktor... Don't you have an important mission?"},{"id":1103000031,"text":"Damn right I do. I'm gonna kill Neclord."},{"id":1103000032,"text":"I was just starting to get bored of sleeping. May as well∠help you on your mission. Pull me out."},{"id":1103000033,"text":"What's with the attitude? You're real arrogant for a sword."},{"id":1103000034,"text":"If you don't want my help, fine. But you'll never defeat the∠vampire without me."},{"id":1103000035,"text":"Okay, okay."},{"id":1103000036,"text":"Okay?"},{"id":1103000037,"text":"I mean, thank you."},{"id":1103000038,"text":"Let's go then, partner."},{"id":1103000039,"text":"(Tsk. Not sure why I'm being called \"partner\" by a sword.)"},{"id":1103000040,"text":"That's strange... Where did I misplace it?∨Say, mister, have you seen the Illustrated War Scroll∠anywhere? As the head librarian, I'm deeply embarassed...∨If you find it, please let me know. I'll repay the favor."},{"id":1103000041,"text":"Oh, that's it! That's the Illustrated War Scroll I was∠searching for.∨I'm so relieved you found it. I must repay you somehow.∠Hmmm, let me think.∨You're from the Liberation Army? I see.∨All right, I've decided. I'll join as well. I'm Hugo the∠Librarian. Look forward to working with you."},{"id":1103000042,"text":"My name is Morgan. Certain circumstances have led me to∠take up residence here.∨And yourself? Commander ♂㈱, is it? ∠I wish I could see your face. You have a fascinating voice.∨Oh, excuse me. I've been blind since birth. But, in some∠senses, I see better than others."},{"id":1103000044,"text":"It seems the time isn't right yet. Please return a little∠while later.∨I'm still in the process of training."},{"id":1103000045,"text":"I see it now. A vast sky spreading out behind you.∨I will place my life in your hands."},{"id":1103000047,"text":"You're right. I am still in the process of training."},{"id":1103000048,"text":"I tend the gardens here. My name is Zen."},{"id":1103000050,"text":"Oh? You want me to join the Liberation Army? What an∠unusual request. Very well.∨However, I'll need to finish my work here first. Would you∠be kind enough to go buy me some red flower seeds, some∠blue flower seeds, and some yellow flower seeds?∨I believe they are sold at item stores."},{"id":1103000052,"text":"Now then, I must water the flowers."},{"id":1103000053,"text":"Well, well, now I can finally finish my work here.∨I gratefully accept these flower seeds."},{"id":1103000054,"text":"There, that should do it. Well then, I guess that means∠I'm one of you now."},{"id":1103000055,"text":"Hoh ho! You've found me. Didn't think anyone would come∠all the way down here.∨You want me to join you? You know what, I'll think about it∠once that castle of yours is a tad bigger."},{"id":1103000056,"text":"Hoh ho! You've found me. Didn't think anyone would come∠all the way down here.∨You want me to join you? You know what, I could use a little∠sunshine after all this time."},{"id":1103000057,"text":"You delivered the Red Flower Seeds!"},{"id":1103000058,"text":"You delivered the Blue Flower Seeds!"},{"id":1103000059,"text":"You delivered the Yellow Flower Seeds!"},{"id":1103000060,"text":"You delivered the Illustrated War Scroll!"},{"id":1104000001,"text":"There you are, Commander ♂㈱.∠Forward, men. Let's show this fiend the power of the∠Warriors' Village!"},{"id":1104000002,"text":"Yah!"},{"id":1104000003,"text":"My, my, how rude of you, showing up to my wedding with∠your weapons drawn."},{"id":1104000004,"text":"Silence, fiend. I'll have you return my daughter, Tengaar."},{"id":1104000005,"text":"I'm afraid that won't happen. The young lady is my beloved∠bride.∨Do you see the setting sun? Once it has set completely,∠our wedding will commence.∨♂㈱, you are the leader of the Liberation Army, are∠you not? I extend an invitation for you to be my honored∠guest tonight.∨If you fail to make it to the top of the castle before the∠sun sets, Tengaar will be mine forever. I'm sure you know∠what that means."},{"id":1104000006,"text":"Oh, by the way, this gate will only admit those who have∠been invited."},{"id":1104000007,"text":"Damn you!"},{"id":1104000008,"text":"Do you take us for fools?!"},{"id":1104000009,"text":"Wait, stop!"},{"id":1104000010,"text":"Wh-Whoa, whoa, whoa!"},{"id":1104000011,"text":"Looks like Neclord wasn't lyin'."},{"id":1104000012,"text":"Master ♂㈱, this is a trap. He knows you're the∠leader of the Liberation Army and—"},{"id":1104000013,"text":"Still, we have no choice but to go."},{"id":1104000014,"text":"Please, Commander ♂㈱.∨I beg you. Rescue my daughter from that filthy vampire."},{"id":1104000015,"text":"H-Hold on. Wait."},{"id":1104000016,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please take me with you."},{"id":1104000017,"text":"Don't be reckless, Hix. Besides, you haven't proven yourself∠as a warrior.∨An unproven warrior, one who has yet to name his sword,∠cannot fight in battle. That is the law of our village."},{"id":1104000018,"text":"It's true that I'm unproven as a warrior, nor am I strong.∨But still...I need to rescue Tengaar with my own hands.∨I swore to her I would. Please, let me keep this one promise∠to her...∨Please, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1104000019,"text":"You'll just slow us down."},{"id":1104000020,"text":"Please, sir. I beg you. I'll do anything. Please. Please!"},{"id":1104000021,"text":"Not happenin', kid. ♂㈱ doesn't want your death∠on his hands."},{"id":1104000022,"text":"I want to rescue Tengaar. I made a promise to her. Please,∠Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1104000023,"text":"Master ♂㈱, I beg you on his behalf. Let him come∠with us, please.∨I'll take responsibility for him."},{"id":1104000024,"text":"C-Cleo..."},{"id":1104000025,"text":"∠All right. Come on, then."},{"id":1104000026,"text":"Th-Thank you."},{"id":1104000027,"text":"Hix. Come here."},{"id":1104000028,"text":"Yes, Chief."},{"id":1104000029,"text":"I've been waiting to hear such words from you.∨You are Hix of the Warriors' Village, descendent of Clift∠the Crusader.∨I hereby recognize you as a warrior and grant you the right∠to name your sword. May the birth of this new warrior bring∠joy to all.∨There, Hix. You are now a true warrior. Your courage has∠made you worthy of your title. Go now and rescue Tengaar."},{"id":1104000030,"text":"Th-Thank you, Chief Zorak."},{"id":1104000031,"text":"You may now name your sword. Do you have something in∠mind?"},{"id":1104000032,"text":"Yes, my decision was made many, many years ago."},{"id":1104000033,"text":"Come on, Hix. Tengaar is waiting for you."},{"id":1104000034,"text":"Y-Yes, Cleo."},{"id":1104000035,"text":"Well, well. You certainly took your time. I'd grown weary∠of waiting."},{"id":1104000036,"text":"Tengaar! I'm here to save you!"},{"id":1104000037,"text":"Hix. You came... I'm so happy."},{"id":1104000038,"text":"Wait a minute. You make it sound as if I'm going to lose."},{"id":1104000039,"text":"That's right, Neclord. This is where we end you.∨Tell me this, you bastard! Does the village of North Window∠ring a bell?"},{"id":1104000040,"text":"Hmmm, now which village would that be? Hard to keep track∠when you've lived as long as I have.∨Come to think of it, you do look like someone I once met.∠Now what was the name of that hamlet again?∨At any rate, I'm afraid I simply have no recollection of this∠\"North Window.\""},{"id":1104000041,"text":"I'll wipe that smug grin off your face once and for all.∠C'mon, Celestial Sword!"},{"id":1104000042,"text":"Trust me, I'll make light work of a vampire or two."},{"id":1104000043,"text":"I swear on my sword, Tengaar, I will defeat you, Neclord!"},{"id":1104000044,"text":"Hix!"},{"id":1104000045,"text":"My, what courage.∨♂㈱, I will take the rune from your right hand∠and present it to Lady Windy."},{"id":1104000046,"text":"Th-That sword..."},{"id":1104000047,"text":"I am the Night Rune incarnate.∨A lowly servant of the night like you never stood a chance∠against me."},{"id":1104000048,"text":"Curse you! I've lived for 500 years. I'll be damned if I die∠here..."},{"id":1104000049,"text":"Yeah, and I'm sure they were 500 years of evil deeds.∠This is where my journey ends.∨I've traveled far and wide to seek revenge on you for∠murdering my family and friends. Now that journey comes to∠an end. Prepare to die!"},{"id":1104000050,"text":"Hix!"},{"id":1104000051,"text":"Tengaar!"},{"id":1104000052,"text":"Thank you for coming to my rescue. I'm so happy."},{"id":1104000053,"text":"Wh-What? B-B-But I didn't do anything.∨Viktor ended up defeating Neclord and—"},{"id":1104000054,"text":"Still the same old Hix.∨It's fine. Things don't always go to plan. You're still my∠hero."},{"id":1104000055,"text":"Th-Thanks."},{"id":1104000056,"text":"By the way, your sword's name..."},{"id":1104000057,"text":"Oh, um, well... S-Sorry. I should've asked first..."},{"id":1104000058,"text":"Honestly, I can't believe you used my name without my∠permission."},{"id":1104000059,"text":"I-I'm sorry."},{"id":1104000060,"text":"Why are you apologizing?"},{"id":1104000061,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1104000062,"text":"You've got a tough road ahead of you, Hix."},{"id":1104000063,"text":"Let's head back, ♂㈱. My journey may be over,∠but yours isn't."},{"id":1104000064,"text":"Tengaar! Are you all right?"},{"id":1104000065,"text":"Of course. Thanks to Hix coming to my rescue."},{"id":1104000066,"text":"You have my deepest gratitude, Commander ♂㈱.∨We of the Warriors' Village swear our allegiance to the∠Liberation Army. Please call upon us if you ever need our∠help."},{"id":1104000067,"text":"Neclord has been defeated, and the Warriors' Village has∠joined our cause.∨Master ♂㈱, perhaps it's time we return to∠♂① Castle."},{"id":1104000068,"text":"♂㈱. No, Commander ♂㈱.∨For many years, I traveled in pursuit of Neclord, and now∠I have finally taken my revenge.∨I wish to return to the remains of my village and deliver∠this news. I promise I will return to the Liberation Army.∨So please, grant me leave for the time being."},{"id":1104000069,"text":"I can't allow it."},{"id":1104000070,"text":"Please. I've been waiting for so long to deliver this news∠to my family's grave."},{"id":1104000071,"text":"Come on, ♂㈱. Let me finish this one last thing."},{"id":1104000072,"text":"If you don't say yes, I'll just sneak out in the middle of∠the night anyway."},{"id":1104000073,"text":"∠All right. Hurry back soon."},{"id":1104000074,"text":"Viktor, your absence will be a painful blow to the∠Liberation Army."},{"id":1104000075,"text":"Yeah, yeah. I know. You're a hopeless bunch of losers∠without me."},{"id":1104000076,"text":"Don't worry. I'll fill in for the bear guy while he's gone."},{"id":1104000077,"text":"Whaaat?! W-Wait a minute, Tengaar."},{"id":1104000078,"text":"No, Hix. I've already made up my mind. Besides, you're∠coming with me."},{"id":1104000079,"text":"Uh, wh-what?! M-Me?"},{"id":1104000080,"text":"Of course. Who's going to protect me if you're not there?"},{"id":1104000081,"text":"B-B-But I..."},{"id":1104000082,"text":"Go with her, Hix. You've completed your initiation as a∠warrior, but not your rite of passage into adulthood.∨Besides, Tengaar's mind is made up, so there's no stopping∠her now. Will you keep her safe, Hix?"},{"id":1104000083,"text":"Yes, Chief."},{"id":1104000084,"text":"I'm headin' off now, ♂㈱. I'll be back in no time.∠Take care of yourself while I'm gone."},{"id":1104000085,"text":"Please, Commander ♂㈱. We must rescue Tengaar∠now before it's too late..."},{"id":1104000086,"text":"There is a painting here called \"Peasant Girl.\" Would you∠like to view it?"},{"id":1104000088,"text":"There is a painting here called \"Woman in the Early∠Afternoon.\" Would you like to view it?"},{"id":1104000089,"text":"There is a painting here called \"King of the Night.\" Would∠you like to view it?"},{"id":1104000090,"text":"*click*"},{"id":1104000091,"text":"It appears to be quite comfortable.∠Would you like to lie down?"},{"id":1104000092,"text":"No way. That's way too creepy."},{"id":1104000093,"text":"∠Maybe just for a moment..."},{"id":1104000094,"text":"Yuk-yuk-yuk! Wanna hear a secret?"},{"id":1104000095,"text":"Yuk-yuk-yuk! Not gonna tell ya for free."},{"id":1104000096,"text":"Pay 100 potch."},{"id":1104000097,"text":"∠Pay 300 potch."},{"id":1104000098,"text":"∠Pay 10,000 potch."},{"id":1104000099,"text":"∠Pay 25,000 potch."},{"id":1104000100,"text":"Yuk-yuk! I-Is that all? Well, all right then, but this stays∠b-between us.∨\"Praise our King, even in the forest, not only at night, but∠also during work.\"∨That's what Master Neclord always tells us. Yuk-yuk!"},{"id":1104000101,"text":"Yuk-yuk! Let's see, for this amount... Okay, make sure this∠stays b-between us.∨Yuk-yuk! Master Neclord often refers to himself as the∠\"King of the Night.\""},{"id":1104000102,"text":"Yuk-yuk! How very generous of you. Okay, make sure this∠stays b-between us.∨Master Neclord has a number of paintings on the third floor∠hall and for some reason, yuk-yuk, he looks at the second∠painting from the right...!∨Th-Then looks at the third painting from the right...!"},{"id":1104000103,"text":"Yuk-yuk-yuk! How very, very generous of you. Okay, this∠stays s-strictly between us.∨You see, Master Neclord is actually a-an...∨...outie."},{"id":1104000104,"text":"Stop messing with us!"},{"id":1104000105,"text":"Yuk-yuk! Don't be so upset. Fine, I'll give back your money."},{"id":1104000106,"text":"Yuk-yuk! Oh boy, did you miss out!"},{"id":1104000107,"text":"Please tell me."},{"id":1104000108,"text":"∠I have nothing to learn from you!"},{"id":1104000110,"text":"Yuk-yuk! I-I know you don't have that much money."},{"id":1104000111,"text":"Hix is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1104000112,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, please look after my daughter...∠My Tengaar."},{"id":1104000113,"text":"Curse them... Ho!"},{"id":1104000114,"text":"O curse them... Ho!"},{"id":1104000115,"text":"Our foes... Ho!"},{"id":1104000116,"text":"We will hurt them... Ho-ho-ho! Ho!"},{"id":1104000117,"text":"Onward... Ho!"},{"id":1104000118,"text":"Ever onward... Ho!"},{"id":1104000119,"text":"Our dear... Ho!"},{"id":1104000120,"text":"Courageous friends... Ra-ta-ta-ta! Ho!"},{"id":1104000121,"text":"Hix, take care of Tengaar."},{"id":1104000122,"text":"At last... Ho!"},{"id":1104000123,"text":"At long last... Ho!"},{"id":1104000124,"text":"Our foes... Ho!"},{"id":1104000125,"text":"We have slain them... Ho-ho-ho! Ho!"},{"id":1104000126,"text":"We shall sing... Ho!"},{"id":1104000127,"text":"From on high... Ho!"},{"id":1104000128,"text":"Our victory song... Ho!"},{"id":1104000129,"text":"Ra-ta-ta-ta! Ra-ta-ta-ta! Ra-ta-ta-ta! Ho!"},{"id":1104000130,"text":"Kazuko, my dearest Kazuko, I love you so very, very much.∨Whether it be ten...∨twenty...∨or even fifty years...∨I will always, always love you.∨......∨Teeheehee...∨Thank you for all that you've done for me.∨And...∨I look forward to spending my life with you!∨p.s.∨Let's get married!"},{"id":1104000131,"text":"*kiss*"},{"id":1104000140,"text":"Hmm. I thought if I pursued Neclord, I'd be able to find∠Yuber.∨That said, I never expected anyone to be capable of taking∠that vampire down."},{"id":1104000142,"text":"The Liberation Army? So you're going against the Imperials.∠Hmm. All right then.∨From what I've heard, he's now part of the Imperial Army."},{"id":1104000143,"text":"Very well. God speed, young man."},{"id":1105000001,"text":"Listen up, you imperial cowards! It is I—Viktor! Come out∠and face me!"},{"id":1105000003,"text":"Huh?"},{"id":1105000004,"text":"Strange. There's no answer."},{"id":1105000005,"text":"Maybe I scared 'em all away with the sheer power of my∠voice."},{"id":1105000006,"text":"What's going on? They're not responding at all."},{"id":1105000007,"text":"Could it be a trap?"},{"id":1105000008,"text":"I'm not sure. Kasumi, can you scout inside the fortress?"},{"id":1105000009,"text":"Yes, sir. Immediately."},{"id":1105000010,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, the fortress is empty. There's no∠sign of the imperial soldiers."},{"id":1105000011,"text":"What the heck's goin' on? We better check for ourselves."},{"id":1105000012,"text":"What the hell happened here?"},{"id":1105000013,"text":"Something is very wrong here. We should make a thorough∠investigation before continuing further."},{"id":1105000014,"text":"Master ♂㈱, take me with you.∨Gremio's death, and Master Teo's... So much has happened.∠I want to keep fighting so that I can forget about it all∠for now.∨Besides, I can't let Pahn upstage me."},{"id":1105000015,"text":"Master ♂㈱, take me with you.∨Gremio and Master Teo's deaths...and Pahn's. I want to keep∠their legacy alive. Please, allow me to protect you."},{"id":1105000016,"text":"Now then, Commander ♂㈱, please choose the∠rest of your party members."},{"id":1105000017,"text":"We got a mystery on our hands. This is gonna be interesting."},{"id":1105000018,"text":"Then I'll return to ♂① Castle for now. Please be∠careful."},{"id":1105000020,"text":"Cleo is joining the party.∠Please remove one party member."},{"id":1105000022,"text":"Do you want to use these party members?"},{"id":1105000023,"text":"No.∠Yes."},{"id":1105000032,"text":"My job is to cut off the heads of criminals. But as you can∠see, business has been slow of late."},{"id":1105000034,"text":"The only thing I'm good for is cutting off heads. That's all∠I know.∨Still want me to join?"},{"id":1105000035,"text":"Yes, of course.∠On second thought, no."},{"id":1105000036,"text":"You're one strange guy. Fine then, I'll go with you.∨It'll be nice to get some sun for a change."},{"id":1105000037,"text":"On second thought, no."},{"id":1105000038,"text":"Thought as much."},{"id":1105000040,"text":"See you around. Just take care you don't end up on my∠chopping block."},{"id":1106000004,"text":"108 Stars? Cleo, this monk is off his rocker."},{"id":1107000047,"text":"I am the Night Rune reincarnate.∨A lowly servant of the night like you never stood a chance∠against me."},{"id":1107000087,"text":"There is a painting here called \"Chestnut Tree.\" Would you∠like to view it?"},{"id":1127000001,"text":"Beyond this point lies the domain of the Dragon Knights,∠granted to them by the Emperor.∨None are permitted to enter."},{"id":1127000002,"text":"I am Humphrey Mintz, a former centurion of the Imperial∠Army.∨I request an audience with Commander Joshua of the Dragon∠Knights."},{"id":1127000003,"text":"I have strict orders from the commander not to allow anyone∠in, not even the Emperor himself."},{"id":1127000004,"text":"My, my... Not even the Emperor? Those are strict orders,∠indeed."},{"id":1127000005,"text":"In any case, be on your way."},{"id":1127000006,"text":"Any thoughts, ♂㈱? I think something must've∠happened.∨Let's try and gather some information. The nearest town is∠Antei, southeast from here."},{"id":1127000007,"text":"You're a persistent fellow, aren't you? I told you, you're∠not getting past here.∠"},{"id":1127000008,"text":"My, what a thing to say. I'm telling you this for your sake.∨I am a close friend of Joshua's. If he discovers you turned∠me away, he won't go easy on you.∨You're new here, aren't you? I'll let it slide if you do∠the right thing."},{"id":1127000009,"text":"I've held this post for the last five years."},{"id":1127000010,"text":"Oh, that's right. The last time I was here was five years∠and a month ago."},{"id":1127000011,"text":"Another lie out of your mouth and you'll be sorry!"},{"id":1127000012,"text":"Haha. Look who's at it again."},{"id":1127000013,"text":"Well, if it isn't my dear friend Commander ♂㈱.∠Do you have business with the Dragon Knights, too?∨If so, you're wasting your time. This dullard of a∠gatekeeper here won't let anyone pass."},{"id":1127000014,"text":"But we must speak with Joshua."},{"id":1127000015,"text":"Ah, I knew you looked familiar. You're Humphrey, greatly∠renowned even among the centurions of the Empire.∨You've joined the Liberation Army as well?∨Commander ♂㈱, my dear friend, I've something∠good to tell you. Please follow me."},{"id":1127000016,"text":"How nostalgic. When I was young, I used to come play in the∠Dragon Knight's domain, so I know this place well.∨Do you see this boulder right here, Commander∠♂㈱?∠It's an entrance into their domain. I often played here as∠a child."},{"id":1127000017,"text":"Wait, you can enter the Dragon Knight's domain from here?"},{"id":1127000018,"text":"That's correct. You're very bright for a commoner."},{"id":1127000019,"text":"What?! Look here, you highborn lowlife! If you knew this was∠an entrance, why didn't you use it yourself?"},{"id":1127000020,"text":"Non, non, non. What a foolish question.∨A nobleman such as myself would never sneak in like∠a common thief."},{"id":1127000021,"text":"I've had enough of this clown."},{"id":1127000022,"text":"♂㈱, my dear friend, you believe me, don't you?∨Oh, thank goodness. I wouldn't be able to live with myself∠if even you distrusted me.∨Well, be careful then. It's quite dangerous inside."},{"id":1127000023,"text":"There is a cave behind the boulder.∠Will you enter?"},{"id":1127000024,"text":"Enter."},{"id":1127000025,"text":"∠Don't enter."},{"id":1127000026,"text":"Look, the cave is more spacious here. Where are we?"},{"id":1127000027,"text":"........."},{"id":1127000028,"text":"Hm? What's the matter?"},{"id":1127000029,"text":"...Look down."},{"id":1127000030,"text":"Down? Wh-Wh-Whoa!"},{"id":1127000031,"text":"What are you doing there?!∨Who are you people? Rather bold for a pack of thieves,∠aren't you?"},{"id":1127000032,"text":"W-We're..."},{"id":1127000034,"text":"♂㈱, is that you? Don't you remember me? ∠It's me, Futch.∨Black and I gave you a ride to the Magician's Island.∠What're you doing here?"},{"id":1127000035,"text":"♂㈱? So, you're the leader of the Liberation Army?"},{"id":1127000036,"text":"Hey, why are all these dragons asleep? Are they always this∠lazy?"},{"id":1127000037,"text":"........."},{"id":1127000038,"text":"What brings the Liberation Army to our domain?"},{"id":1127000039,"text":"Wait, aren't you going to answer my question?"},{"id":1127000040,"text":"I am Humphrey Mintz, a former centurion of the Imperial∠Army. I wish to speak with Commander Joshua of the Dragon∠Knights."},{"id":1127000041,"text":"......∨Very well then. Now that you've seen what's transpired here,∠I must report to Commander Joshua anyway."},{"id":1127000042,"text":"My thanks, um..."},{"id":1127000043,"text":"I'm Milia, Deputy Commander of the Dragon Knights."},{"id":1127000044,"text":"My thanks, Deputy Commander Milia. Please lead the way."},{"id":1127000045,"text":"Once you leave this cave,∠you'll see the Dragon Knights' Fortress.∨We'll go on ahead and inform Sir Joshua of your arrival.∠Let's go, Futch."},{"id":1127000046,"text":"Y-You're Master Liukan. I wasn't aware you had joined the∠Liberation Army. Please, sir, will you examine our dragons?"},{"id":1127000047,"text":"Very well."},{"id":1127000048,"text":"How are they, Master Liukan?"},{"id":1127000049,"text":"This is not a disease. They've been fed a sleeping poison."},{"id":1127000050,"text":"Not a disease?"},{"id":1127000051,"text":"That's correct. Someone fed them poison."},{"id":1127000052,"text":"I knew somebody was sneaking into our domain..."},{"id":1127000053,"text":"And is there any cure?"},{"id":1127000054,"text":"I can prepare an antidote, but I will need the right∠ingredients.∨Moonlight Herb, Black Dragon Orchid, and one more thing..."},{"id":1127000055,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1127000056,"text":"Let's focus on gathering the other two first.∠Commander ♂㈱, you should be able to find∠Moonlight Herb growing in Seek Valley."},{"id":1127000057,"text":"Seek Valley... Commander Joshua, the only dragons awake in∠the Dragon's Den right now...∨...are Futch's Black and my Thrash. I'll take Commander ∠♂㈱ and his party to Seek Valley on Thrash."},{"id":1127000058,"text":"We're counting on you, Milia."},{"id":1127000059,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, let's hurry to Seek Valley."},{"id":1127000060,"text":"Guess I will wait here until we have all the ingredients."},{"id":1127000061,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, my Thrash should be waiting∠out front."},{"id":1127000062,"text":"Non, non, non. You mustn't lean on me. Self-reliance is what∠friendship is all about."},{"id":1127000063,"text":"Then...that must've been it..."},{"id":1127000064,"text":"Godspeed, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1127000065,"text":"The Moonlight Herb is said to grow between crystals found∠deep within Seek Valley."},{"id":1128000001,"text":"This is Seek Valley."},{"id":1128000002,"text":"I don't see anything resembling the herb. Perhaps we should∠go in further."},{"id":1128000003,"text":"Could this be the Moonlight Herb?"},{"id":1128000004,"text":"That must be it."},{"id":1128000005,"text":"Indeed, that is the Moonlight Herb. It works as a stimulant."},{"id":1128000006,"text":"Who's there? Show yourself!"},{"id":1128000007,"text":"I'm impressed you managed to make it here. But I'm afraid∠you're not leaving with the Moonlight Herb."},{"id":1128000008,"text":"Whoever you are, we went through a lot to get here! So we're∠taking it whether you like it or not!"},{"id":1128000009,"text":"My, what a spirited young man. But I'm speaking to∠♂㈱ right now, so please be quiet.∨Come now, ♂㈱. You must be growing tired of∠this Liberation Army game. So I will be taking your rune, the∠Soul Eater, off your hands.∨Don't look so upset, ♂㈱. I won't take it by force.∠No, I have a more elegant solution.∨Come on out, Ted."},{"id":1128000010,"text":"It's been a while, ♂㈱. Sure was cruel of you∠to leave me behind like that.∨Well, I forgive you. We're old friends, after all. Now,∠could you give back the rune I lent you?∨I managed to live 300 years thanks to that rune's power.∠Without it, I... Please, just give it back."},{"id":1128000011,"text":"Give back the Soul Eater."},{"id":1128000012,"text":"∠Don't give back the Soul Eater."},{"id":1128000013,"text":"Th-The rune..."},{"id":1128000014,"text":"...♂㈱...∠...♂㈱...∠...Can you hear me?∨There isn't much time. Since the Soul Eater once belonged to∠me, I still retain a strange connection with it.∨That's how I'm speaking to you now. My body is no longer∠mine. It's been enslaved by Windy's Conqueror Rune. It will∠eventually take over my soul as well...∨That's why I don't have much time.∨♂㈱, just this once, I'm begging you... ∠Please forgive me for what∠I'm about to do."},{"id":1128000015,"text":"Wh-What was that? Ted! Hurry up and take the Soul Eater!"},{"id":1128000016,"text":"Please, ♂㈱. Give me back my rune. If you won't,∠I'll have to take it by force."},{"id":1128000017,"text":"I won't give you the Soul Eater."},{"id":1128000018,"text":"Oh, so you're willing to fight Ted?∨You killed your father Teo with your own hands, sent your∠servant Gremio to an early grave, and now you plan on∠harming your best friend?∨How wicked you are."},{"id":1128000019,"text":"∠All right. I'll give it to you."},{"id":1128000020,"text":"That's more like it. Come now, Ted. Retrieve the Soul∠Eater."},{"id":1128000021,"text":"Soul Eater, I spent 300 years with you. I know you well.∨The meaning of your curse, your evil intentions.∨The day I lost my home...you consumed the souls of everyone∠I knew.∨During my 300 years of wandering, you caused countless wars,∠plundering souls along the way.∨And on top of that, Odessa! ♂㈱'s father! Gremio!∠You took them all!∨You devoured the souls of those closest to your master,∠increasing your own power!"},{"id":1128000022,"text":"Ted! What are you talking about? Hurry up and take the Soul∠Eater!"},{"id":1128000023,"text":"Being in the presence of the Soul Eater has given me power.∠Just enough to free my own body.∨Come now, Soul Eater!∠As your former master, I command you! Claim my soul!"},{"id":1128000024,"text":"Good... This is how it should be... Without freedom...what's∠the point...of living?∨I now return to you...the 300 years...of extended life...∠that you gave me...Soul Eater..."},{"id":1128000025,"text":"Damn it! You fool! Fine then..."},{"id":1128000026,"text":"Wretched boy. I will take that rune from you someday."},{"id":1128000027,"text":"Don't look like that...♂㈱. I chose...my own path.∨I think this really is...goodbye... Take care of yourself...∠Live enough for the both of us...∨............"},{"id":1128000028,"text":"This must be the Moonlight Herb.∨Everyone is waiting. Let's take some and hurry back."},{"id":1128000029,"text":"You acquired the Moonlight Herb!"},{"id":1128000030,"text":"Soul Eater has reached Level 4."},{"id":1128000031,"text":"What the hell is this?!"},{"id":1128000033,"text":"Who are you people? What do you want? If you don't need∠anything, then run along home."},{"id":1128000034,"text":"Recruit.∠Leave."},{"id":1128000035,"text":"Join the Liberation Army? Hmmm. I don't trust you people.∨If you can bring all my apprentices—Maas, Meese, Moose,∠and Mose—here, I'll consider it."},{"id":1128000036,"text":"Off with you. I've got my next batch of forging to handle."},{"id":1128000037,"text":"Master!"},{"id":1128000038,"text":"There you are!"},{"id":1128000039,"text":"You just up and disappeared."},{"id":1128000040,"text":"Master Mace, we've all joined the Liberation Army.∨We haven't forgotten your teachings. That's why we've chosen∠the path we believe is right.∨Please Master, lend us your support."},{"id":1128000041,"text":"My apprentices...∨You've all grown up, truly. I'd planned to live out my days∠here alone.∨But perhaps I'll take on one last job.∠Commander ♂㈱, thank you for having me."},{"id":1128000042,"text":"Liberation Army, huh? You all still don't have what it takes∠to change the world. Let me know once you've expanded your∠castle."},{"id":1129000001,"text":"You folk from the Liberation Army must be exhausted. Would∠you like to take a rest?"},{"id":1129000002,"text":"Rest.∠Don't rest.∠Save."},{"id":1129000003,"text":"Damn it. How could this happen..."},{"id":1129000004,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you've returned safely."},{"id":1129000005,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, you saved the dragons."},{"id":1129000006,"text":"Commander Joshua has the Dragon Rune, one of The 27 True∠Runes, embedded in his arm.∨This means that he will never grow old. That's the curse∠he has to bear."},{"id":1129000007,"text":"We Dragon Knights have always been on equal footing with∠the Imperials.∨But lately, they've been acting...different."},{"id":1129000008,"text":"Our dragons... If they never wake up, will we ever be able∠to fly again?"},{"id":1129000009,"text":"Thank goodness! I'll be able to fly again!"},{"id":1129000010,"text":"I wonder what happened to Futch. He hasn't been himself∠since that day he was on watch."},{"id":1129000011,"text":"Futch may no longer be a Dragon Knight, but he's still∠a friend."},{"id":1129000012,"text":"Commander Joshua, these are the people I spoke to you about."},{"id":1129000013,"text":"Humphrey! Are my eyes deceiving me? It's been too long."},{"id":1129000014,"text":"It has indeed."},{"id":1129000015,"text":"I was worried sick about you. After the incident at Kalekka,∠you disappeared without a trace."},{"id":1129000016,"text":"I had my reasons.∨Joshua, this is Commander ♂㈱ of the∠Liberation Army."},{"id":1129000017,"text":"So you're Commander ♂㈱. ∠I'm Joshua, Commander of the Dragon Knights. I've heard∠much about the Liberation Army."},{"id":1129000018,"text":"We're here today to discuss an important matter with you."},{"id":1129000019,"text":"An important matter? What is it?"},{"id":1129000020,"text":"The Liberation Army needs your assistance."},{"id":1129000021,"text":"Assist the Liberation Army?∨Well, granted, we Dragon Knights are growing increasingly∠dissatisfied with the present Emperor, or should I say,∠the Empire itself."},{"id":1129000022,"text":"∠Let me ride one of your dragons."},{"id":1129000023,"text":"One... One of our dragons? I'm not sure about that."},{"id":1129000024,"text":"What's the matter? Something to do with the fact they're all∠asleep?"},{"id":1129000025,"text":"So you've seen them. We've tried to keep it secret by∠barring entry to our domain.∨A few months ago, our dragons suddenly fell asleep, and we∠can no longer awaken them. We've tried everything, but to no∠avail."},{"id":1129000026,"text":"They're stuck asleep..."},{"id":1129000027,"text":"At present, the Dragon Knights are completely powerless.∨We've brought many doctors here, but none have been able to∠find a cure.∨We even sent a messenger in search of the legendary doctor,∠Master Liukan, but he is nowhere to be found."},{"id":1129000028,"text":"So you think Master Liukan can cure the dragons?"},{"id":1129000029,"text":"Yes...or so I hope. After all, he's the finest doctor in∠the land."},{"id":1129000030,"text":"♂㈱, this is our chance. If we do them a favor∠now, it'll make it easier to convince them to help later."},{"id":1129000031,"text":"We'll need the help of the legendary doctor Master Liukan∠to save our dragons."},{"id":1129000032,"text":"Hm?"},{"id":1129000033,"text":"Oh, nothing important."},{"id":1129000034,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, ride with me on my dragon,∠Thrash, to Seek Valley."},{"id":1129000035,"text":"I'm Liukan."},{"id":1129000037,"text":"You're back, Milia."},{"id":1129000038,"text":"Yes, Commander Joshua. Here is the Moonlight Herb."},{"id":1129000039,"text":"Next up is the Black Dragon Orchid. Whether it be the ends∠of the earth or the farthest reaches of the sea, I'll go∠anywhere it takes to find it."},{"id":1129000040,"text":"There's a slight problem."},{"id":1129000041,"text":"What is it?"},{"id":1129000042,"text":"Futch left on his own for Gregminster Palace to retrieve it."},{"id":1129000043,"text":"The only place Black Dragon Orchid can be found is the∠Floating Garden of Gregminster. I shouldn't have let it∠slip in front of him."},{"id":1129000044,"text":"∠Futch.∨Futch.∨Come on, Futch.∨Wake up!"},{"id":1129000045,"text":"Th-The Black Dragon Orchid... I must bring it back..."},{"id":1129000046,"text":"Ahem! It seems you're awake."},{"id":1129000047,"text":"Huh? What?! Where am I? Where's the Black Dragon Orchid?"},{"id":1129000048,"text":"Don't worry. When we found you unconscious in the forest,∠you were still holding onto the Black Dragon Orchid.∨You were clutching it so tightly, we had a hard time prying∠it loose from your fingers."},{"id":1129000049,"text":"I see, then the dragons..."},{"id":1129000050,"text":"I've already prepared the antidote from the three∠ingredients and given it to them.∨They should awaken soon."},{"id":1129000051,"text":"Thank goodness.∨.........∨Say, Master Liukan, what was the third ingredient?"},{"id":1129000052,"text":"Th-The third ingredient..."},{"id":1129000053,"text":"What is it? What's the matter?"},{"id":1129000054,"text":"......∨I suppose it's easiest coming from me. The third ingredient∠was a dragon's liver. It belonged to..."},{"id":1129000055,"text":"No!∨N-No...∨Black..."},{"id":1129000056,"text":"By the time we found him, Black was already dead..."},{"id":1129000057,"text":"Despise me if you want, but we did what we had to do."},{"id":1129000058,"text":"B-But... B-Black..."},{"id":1129000059,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Joshua's dragons have∠awakened.∨Let's head to Joshua's quarters and draw up a pact between∠the Liberation Army and the Dragon Knights.∨I'm sure he'll consent to it this time."},{"id":1129000060,"text":"You're right. He still hasn't agreed to an alliance."},{"id":1129000061,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, on behalf of the Dragon∠Knights, I thank you for saving our dragons."},{"id":1129000062,"text":"Joshua, does that mean..."},{"id":1129000063,"text":"Yes. It looks like we'll be fighting side-by-side again,∠old friend.∨But against a very different enemy this time. Commander∠♂㈱, the Dragon Knights will join you.∠Together we will defeat the Empire."},{"id":1129000064,"text":"Now we can finally return to ♂① Castle. I really∠can't stand the smell of dragons."},{"id":1129000065,"text":"Humphrey, I have a favor to ask of you."},{"id":1129000066,"text":"...What is it?"},{"id":1129000067,"text":"Come in, Futch."},{"id":1129000068,"text":"Futch. You know what this is about, don't you?"},{"id":1129000069,"text":"Yes, Commander."},{"id":1129000070,"text":"Dragon Knights who lose their dragon must leave the Dragon's∠Den.∨Now that you've lost Black, I cannot let you stay here."},{"id":1129000071,"text":"I understand, Commander. Black probably died saving me."},{"id":1129000072,"text":"Futch, you mustn't blame yourself."},{"id":1129000073,"text":"I'm okay. I just want to believe that Black saved my life."},{"id":1129000074,"text":"Humphrey, will you take Futch with you? I can rest easy∠knowing he's in your care."},{"id":1129000075,"text":"...All right."},{"id":1129000076,"text":"Thank you, sir."},{"id":1129000077,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, call on us when the fighting∠begins, and we will rush to your aid."},{"id":1129000078,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, Master Liukan wishes to return∠home, so I'll be flying him back on my dragon.∨Would you and your party also like a ride?"},{"id":1129000079,"text":"Yes, thank you."},{"id":1129000080,"text":"Very well. I will be waiting with Thrash out front."},{"id":1129000081,"text":"∠Thank you, but we'll walk."},{"id":1129000082,"text":"Understood."},{"id":1129000083,"text":"Take care, Futch. Perhaps someday you'll be able to return∠to us."},{"id":1129000084,"text":"I hope so."},{"id":1129000085,"text":"Hey, don't look so glum. I'll teach you how to use a sword."},{"id":1129000086,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'll fly you back on Thrash now."},{"id":1129000128,"text":"I'm surprised you found me, seeing as I can erase my∠presence and transform myself into shadows...∨That's quite the incredible vision you have. You must be...∨Of course, the leader of the Liberation Army. It all makes∠sense now. My name is Fuma. I follow the way of the ninja.∨Please allow me to join the ranks of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1129000130,"text":"I am honored."},{"id":1129000132,"text":"I'll be here waiting for your return. I believe in you,∠Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1129000133,"text":"The Liberation Army, huh? Who knew the day would come∠when Barbarossa, that bastard who hunted down Emperor∠Geil, would himself become the hunted.∨And that centurion that gravely wounded me? I wonder∠where he is today."},{"id":1129000134,"text":"Kreutz..."},{"id":1129000135,"text":"You're the centurion from back then. Humphrey, wasn't it?∨What happened to you? You fought under Barbarossa against∠my master Emperor Geil, and now you've turned against him?∨Quite the loyal subject, aren't you?"},{"id":1129000136,"text":"Back then, I believed in Emperor Barbarossa."},{"id":1129000137,"text":"Then, what're you doing in the Liberation Army now? Had a∠change of heart?"},{"id":1129000138,"text":"I haven't changed.∨The one who changed was...∨Kreutz...I have a favor to ask."},{"id":1129000139,"text":"Oh? A favor to ask of an old enemy?"},{"id":1129000140,"text":"The Liberation Army's strength remains vastly inferior∠to that of the Imperial Army. We need all the tactical∠advantage we can get.∨As Geil Rugner's only commander to be honored with the title∠Great General, you could be an incredible asset to us.∠So please join us."},{"id":1129000141,"text":".........∨Geil Rugner will be my one and only master.∨.........∨But if this means an opportunity to kill Barbarossa and∠avenge my master's death, then it's an appealing offer.∨I will join you, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1152000029,"text":"Goodbye then."},{"id":1152000030,"text":"The Liberation Army's secret factory? No idea. The town of∠Kalekka is north of here, but it's in ruins now."},{"id":1152000031,"text":"The Imperial Army doesn't patrol these parts very often,∠so there are plenty of smugglers here."},{"id":1152000032,"text":"That large mansion over there belongs to Kun To. He runs∠the city of Kirov."},{"id":1152000033,"text":"There was a terrible battle north in Kalekka. I don't even∠want to remember it."},{"id":1152000034,"text":"Hey, what's up? Will you be staying here? If so, that'll be∠200 potch."},{"id":1152000036,"text":"Who the hell are you people?"},{"id":1152000037,"text":"C'mon, Kun To. That's no way to greet an old friend."},{"id":1152000038,"text":"Tai Ho! It's been too long. Last I heard, you moved to Kaku.∠Have you come back to work with me again?"},{"id":1152000039,"text":"No, actually, I came here to ask you a favor. You still in∠the boat business, Kun To?"},{"id":1152000040,"text":"Yep, that's my work. And if I don't work, I don't eat."},{"id":1152000041,"text":"I want to borrow ten of your boats."},{"id":1152000042,"text":"Ten boats, huh? Knowing you, I'm sure you're up to no good.∨The Imperials have been keeping a close eye on us of late,∠so I can't do anything too risky."},{"id":1152000043,"text":"Wait, are you turning me down?"},{"id":1152000044,"text":"Guess I still owe you one, though. I'll get you your boats.∠Do what you want with 'em."},{"id":1152000045,"text":"Thanks. I'm in your debt now."},{"id":1152000046,"text":"There, that should be all of 'em."},{"id":1152000047,"text":"That old man's a real taskmaster, making a woman do all the∠heavy lifting."},{"id":1152000048,"text":"Hahahah! Guess it was a bit too much for a scrawny gal∠like you."},{"id":1152000049,"text":"Unbelievable."},{"id":1152000050,"text":"Tai Ho, these people..."},{"id":1152000051,"text":"Yep, they're the Liberation Army."},{"id":1152000052,"text":"And you're one of 'em?"},{"id":1152000053,"text":"I'm just along for the ride."},{"id":1152000054,"text":"All right, we're just about ready to go.∠♂㈱, let's get going."},{"id":1152000055,"text":"You tasted the stew. It's exquisite!"},{"id":1152000056,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'll go with you."},{"id":1152000057,"text":"Fine. I'll come along as well."},{"id":1152000066,"text":"Who are you folk? I'm just doing the laundry."},{"id":1152000068,"text":"Join the Liberation Army? Oh my! Sounds like there'll be∠plenty of laundry to keep me busy. All right, I'm in.∨But only if you get me some soap. I just ran out."},{"id":1152000070,"text":"Thanks. As you can see, I'm busy doing the laundry.∠La la la la la!"},{"id":1152000071,"text":"Sure, I've got soap. I can lend you some.∨But I'm out of soy sauce. Could you go get me some?"},{"id":1152000072,"text":"You delivered the soy sauce."},{"id":1152000073,"text":"Thank you, thank you. By the way...there's just one more∠thing I need...∨Hahaha! Just kidding. Here's the soap."},{"id":1152000074,"text":"You acquired the soap."},{"id":1152000075,"text":"Soy sauce? Yeah, sure. But only if you can get me some salt."},{"id":1152000076,"text":"You delivered the salt."},{"id":1152000077,"text":"We agreed to trade soy sauce for salt, right?"},{"id":1152000078,"text":"You acquired the soy sauce."},{"id":1152000079,"text":"Salt? Sure, I've got plenty of extra salt.∨But can you find me a yardstick first? I seem to have lost∠mine."},{"id":1152000080,"text":"You delivered the yardstick."},{"id":1152000081,"text":"You're a lifesaver. Let me see... Here you go!"},{"id":1152000082,"text":"You acquired the salt."},{"id":1152000083,"text":"Yes, yes, I got it. A yardstick, right? I have one.∨But you get that I need sugar, right?"},{"id":1152000084,"text":"You delivered the sugar."},{"id":1152000085,"text":"Thanks. Here's the yardstick as promised."},{"id":1152000086,"text":"You acquired the yardstick."},{"id":1152000087,"text":"Oh, you brought me soap? Turns out I already had some,∠but thanks anyway.∨My name's Sarah. Pleased to meet you."},{"id":1152000088,"text":"I'm Melodye. Who are you?∨Leader of the Liberation Army? That's impressive. Me, on the∠other hand...∨But a rune sage once told me I possess a unique power.∠I need a rune to use it though."},{"id":1152000089,"text":"Wait... That orb you have...∨The Sound Orb... It's calling to me. Please... Let me∠have it."},{"id":1152000090,"text":"Give her the Sound Orb.∠Don't give it to her."},{"id":1152000091,"text":"You gave her the Sound Orb."},{"id":1152000092,"text":"Thank you... This will awaken...my power...∨Commander ♂㈱... ∠Let me join the Liberation Army. ∠I want to use this small power of mine for the good of all."},{"id":1152000094,"text":"Oh...∨I understand... I'll need to rely on my own strength to get∠that rune."},{"id":1152000095,"text":"Oh my, you've gone and tasted all my stews.∨Only someone special could appreciate the taste of my work.∨Leader of the Liberation Army? No wonder. It all makes sense∠now. Very well, let me join you."},{"id":1152000096,"text":"I'm Georges. My occupation? I guess ya can call me a free-∠spirited individual.∨Simply put, I'm a freeloader. How about it? Why don't we∠play a game? If ya beat my record, I'll join ya."},{"id":1152000097,"text":"Ya beat me. As promised, I'll be joinin' ya from today."},{"id":1153000001,"text":"What's your business here, young man?∨Me? Well, I'm the last resident of this ghost of a town..."},{"id":1153000010,"text":"Leader of the Liberation Army, huh? I'm gonna plant∠seeds to mend the fields your battles tear up."},{"id":1153000011,"text":"What're you plannin' to leave behind once all the fightin'∠is said and done?∨............∨Somethin' tells me I can trust you. You have honest eyes."},{"id":1153000012,"text":"Recruit."},{"id":1153000013,"text":"Eventually, the seeds I plant are gonna sprout. I reckon∠I'm gonna have to fight to keep 'em from gettin' trampled."},{"id":1153000014,"text":"∠Don't recruit."},{"id":1153000015,"text":"Y'all get home safe now, you hear?"},{"id":1153000016,"text":"You're ♂㈱, the leader of the Liberation Army,∠aren't you? I know who you are.∨Don't let your guard down. In war, the stronger side wins.∠That's all there is to it. You'd best increase your numbers."},{"id":1153000017,"text":"My, how the Liberation Army has grown. Tell Mathiu I'm∠impressed."},{"id":1153000021,"text":"A letter from Mathiu?"},{"id":1153000022,"text":"You delivered Mathiu's letter!"},{"id":1153000023,"text":"So he's asking for my help, is he..."},{"id":1153000024,"text":"I'm willing to use whatever I can to win this war—even you."},{"id":1153000025,"text":"Mathiu... I know you don't trust me. Yet still you seek my∠aid?"},{"id":1153000026,"text":"You're right. I don't trust you. Even now, I still have my∠suspicions about you. But I do trust your strength.∨Please, lend us your strength. I beg you."},{"id":1153000027,"text":"You bow to me?∨Very well. Though I never expected to fight alongside you∠ever again."},{"id":1153000029,"text":"*crunch*"},{"id":1153000030,"text":"*snap*"},{"id":1153000031,"text":"*crack*"},{"id":1154000001,"text":"What you doing snooping around here? You better have∠a good reason, or this won't end well for you."},{"id":1154000002,"text":"Eep! Can one soul ever be so unlucky?∨First, I get chased off the mountain, and then I get caught∠by a giantess."},{"id":1154000003,"text":"Did you just call me a giantess?"},{"id":1154000004,"text":"No, I-I..."},{"id":1154000005,"text":"I must be losing my edge, too, getting nabbed by a giantess."},{"id":1154000006,"text":"Call me that again and you'll be sorry."},{"id":1154000007,"text":"W-Wait a minute. I only called you \"giantess\" once."},{"id":1154000008,"text":"Yeah, I only called you \"giantess\" once as well."},{"id":1154000009,"text":"Sure, boss, but now you've called her \"giantess\" again."},{"id":1154000010,"text":"Gah! Keep calling me \"giantess\" to my face, will you?!∠I'll make you suffer!"},{"id":1154000011,"text":"Hey, it's Ledon and Kessler."},{"id":1154000012,"text":"You..."},{"id":1154000013,"text":"Wait, you're the one who was with Lady Odessa."},{"id":1154000014,"text":"∠Hey, giantess."},{"id":1154000015,"text":"*exasperated cry*∠Who said it this time?!"},{"id":1154000017,"text":"Wait, ♂㈱, do you know these guys?"},{"id":1154000018,"text":"I do."},{"id":1154000019,"text":"Yes, yes, he knows me. Lady Odessa and the Young Master∠here, once stayed at my inn."},{"id":1154000020,"text":"∠I've never met them before."},{"id":1154000021,"text":"Wh-What do you mean? You and Lady Odessa stayed at my∠inn.∨Don't you remember? I made you Robber's Tea, and...um...∠Well, maybe we can forget about the tea part."},{"id":1154000022,"text":"You all keep mentioning Odessa. Do you mean Lady Odessa∠Silverberg?∨Who are you anyway?∠What? You're the new Commander of the Liberation Army?∠Oh boy. I'd better let old Mose know.∨I'm guessing your business is with the secret factory then.∠Follow me. I'll show you the way."},{"id":1154000023,"text":"It's embarrassing really. The Imperial Army began hunting∠down bandits.∨They chased us off the mountain. That's when I heard talk∠about the rise of the Liberation Army. Figured I'd join up,∠so I came out this way.∨And then as luck would have it, here you are."},{"id":1154000024,"text":"Well, I'll head on down the mountain first. Take care,∠Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1154000025,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I'm down on my luck, so please∠help me out.∨The Imperials destroyed my inn. All I did was serve them∠some tea.∨Please, Commander ♂㈱. ∠Let me join the Liberation Army."},{"id":1154000026,"text":"Okay, I'll find my own way down the mountain."},{"id":1154000027,"text":"You sure took your time, didn't you?∠Not used to the rugged mountain paths?∠Old man Mose is further inside."},{"id":1154000028,"text":"Ah, you must be the new leader of the Liberation Army. We∠were worried after hearing about the attack on your∠headquarters.∨So, where's Odessa now?"},{"id":1154000029,"text":"Odessa's gone..."},{"id":1154000030,"text":"I see... She was a good girl.∨I guess the blueprints for the Fire Spears have become her∠parting gift to us."},{"id":1154000031,"text":"Fire Spears! Are you saying you have Fire Spears?"},{"id":1154000032,"text":"Why, of course we do. Why would you think otherwise?∨These are some of the finest weapons I've ever made. But∠what about boats? You'll need boats to transport them."},{"id":1154000033,"text":"Boats, huh? I've got an idea.∨There's an old friend of mine in Kirov named Kun To. He may∠be able to help us out."},{"id":1154000034,"text":"I need to make some preparations. After that, I'll join∠you in Kirov."},{"id":1154000035,"text":"You acquired the Fire Spears!"},{"id":1154000036,"text":"Why do you keep staring? Don't tell me you've fallen for me."},{"id":1154000037,"text":"Just gotta tidy here first, and I'll be right behind you."},{"id":1154000046,"text":"My name is Kage. I am neither allied with the Imperials nor∠the Liberation Army.∨I work for whoever values my services and is willing to pay∠the highest sum for them."},{"id":1154000048,"text":"You wish for me to join you? I must warn you, I'm quite∠expensive.∨20,000 potch if you require my services until the end of∠this war. Still wish for me to join you?"},{"id":1154000049,"text":"Pay 20,000 potch.∠Don't pay."},{"id":1154000050,"text":"Very well. If you recognize my value, my loyalty is yours."},{"id":1154000051,"text":"Well, it appears you don't have enough money. Price speaks∠to value. And I cannot lower my price."},{"id":1154000052,"text":"Don't pay."},{"id":1154000053,"text":"If you cannot recognize my value, then there's nothing more∠to discuss."},{"id":1177000001,"text":"Now to Rakan Fortress! Those Liberation Army bastards think∠they can make fools of us! It's time we teach them a lesson!"},{"id":1177000002,"text":"Why, Commander Griffith! I-I'm relieved to see you survived.∠We heard you were attacked by the Liberation Army."},{"id":1177000003,"text":"Yes, that's right. They put us through hell. But they∠underestimated me. Look who I've got here.∨This is Military Strategist Mathiu of the Liberation Army.∠I've taken him as my prisoner. Let me in, so I can deliver∠my report to General Kasim."},{"id":1177000004,"text":"Yes, Commander. I will let the General know immediately.∠Please wait here."},{"id":1177000005,"text":"Is this really gonna work? Well, if it doesn't, I can always∠escape on my own. Teehee."},{"id":1177000006,"text":"What a thing to say, Krin. You'd escape and leave Commander∠♂㈱ behind?"},{"id":1177000007,"text":"Heh! I dunno."},{"id":1177000008,"text":"Please enter and await the General in the antechamber."},{"id":1177000009,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, while Griffith and I wait in the∠antechamber, you must find Viktor and Warren."},{"id":1177000010,"text":"The prison should be on the top floor of the castle. Hurry.∠I'm not sure I can fool General Kasim for very long."},{"id":1177000011,"text":"If we get caught here, it's all over. Let's hurry,∠♂㈱."},{"id":1177000012,"text":"We did it, Commander ♂㈱. This looks like it's the∠place."},{"id":1177000013,"text":"What took ya so long, ♂㈱? I've been waitin'∠forever."},{"id":1177000014,"text":"Teehee! Might as well stay a little longer then until your∠head cools off."},{"id":1177000015,"text":"What was that? Who the hell do you think you're talkin' to?!"},{"id":1177000016,"text":"Teehee! Come and get me if it bugs you so much!"},{"id":1177000017,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, I've unlocked the door."},{"id":1177000018,"text":"Yikes!"},{"id":1177000019,"text":"Wh-Whoa! Hey, c'mon now... I-It was just a joke. A joke!"},{"id":1177000020,"text":"You must be Commander ♂㈱. I'm Warren.∠Thank you for rescuing us."},{"id":1177000021,"text":"See, Warren? I told ya they'd come."},{"id":1177000022,"text":"Yes, they certainly did."},{"id":1177000023,"text":"There isn't much time. Let's get out of here fast."},{"id":1177000024,"text":"Mathiu Silverberg. It's been a long time—three, no, four∠years?∨Why did you leave the Imperial Army? Was it because of that∠incident?"},{"id":1177000025,"text":"That's part of the reason. But more than that, I despise the∠person I become when I'm fighting."},{"id":1177000026,"text":"And yet you've sided with the rebels. How strange. Why not∠rejoin us now?∨I'd hate to execute you as a traitor."},{"id":1177000027,"text":"You needn't worry about that."},{"id":1177000028,"text":"What do you mean?"},{"id":1177000029,"text":"General Kasim, we've got trouble. It's the Liberation Army.∠They've surrounded the castle!"},{"id":1177000030,"text":"Well, I see. So the attacks on the fortresses were decoys.∨You've lost your touch, Mathiu. When our reinforcements∠return, your Liberation Army won't stand a chance."},{"id":1177000031,"text":"You mean, \"if\" they return."},{"id":1177000032,"text":"What?"},{"id":1177000033,"text":"We've received word that the troops who were sent to protect∠the fortresses were ambushed by forces from Jowston."},{"id":1177000034,"text":"What?! Why would Jowston...∨Mathiu! Is this your doing as well?!"},{"id":1177000035,"text":"Indeed. I sent the City-States of Jowston a letter informing∠them of the Imperial Army's plans to invade their land.∨They've long been craving for a piece of this region, so it∠didn't take much to convince them."},{"id":1177000036,"text":"You traitor! How dare you sell out the Empire to the∠City-States!"},{"id":1177000037,"text":"I did nothing of the sort. I simply used the City-States as∠a means to an end. We have no alliance with them.∨Is it likely they'll temporarily occupy this northern∠region? Yes.∨But the Liberation Army will allow no more than that."},{"id":1177000038,"text":"You bastard! Damn you and your brazen treachery!"},{"id":1177000039,"text":"Sir Mathiu, are you all right? We've already taken care of∠the soldiers outside."},{"id":1177000040,"text":"...Hey."},{"id":1177000041,"text":"Ah. Looks like we made it just in time."},{"id":1177000042,"text":"General Kasim Hazil. It's my turn to make a request. Please∠do the honorable thing and surrender.∨The Empire you've long idealized and the Emperor you swore∠loyalty to have both changed beyond recognition. Do you∠still insist on clinging to the past?"},{"id":1177000043,"text":"...I do."},{"id":1177000044,"text":"You're a stubborn one, aren't you, Kasim. Just like the∠rest of us Great Generals.∨Think about it. Do you really believe the Emperor is still∠the same man we once knew?"},{"id":1177000045,"text":"I..."},{"id":1177000046,"text":"You know as well as I do he isn't. If you want to remain∠loyal to the Emperor...∨...then isn't it also your duty to make him change his∠wrongful ways? We Five Great Generals were unable to prevent∠the collapse of the Empire.∨The time has come for the Emperor himself to open his eyes.∠Do you not agree, monsieur?"},{"id":1177000047,"text":"............∨All right. I surrender."},{"id":1177000048,"text":"I'm glad you understand, General Kasim."},{"id":1177000049,"text":"Why are you hesitating? You know better.∨How could you be loyal to the Emperor in his current state?∠Is the Empire, as it stands now, really worth protecting?∨You're just a coward, afraid of ruining his own reputation.∠Are you unwilling to be labeled a traitor for the sake of∠your fellow countrymen?"},{"id":1177000050,"text":"Mathiu...∨All right. I surrender."},{"id":1177000051,"text":"Commander ♂㈱, we must retreat immediately.∨If we wait around any longer, we may fall prey to the forces∠of the City-States."},{"id":1177000052,"text":"Hold up, is that really it? Dammit, I was really lookin'∠forward to raisin' some hell."},{"id":1177000053,"text":"Looks like we can't cross here."},{"id":1177000054,"text":"Teehee! Leave it to me."},{"id":1177000055,"text":"Piece of cake. Teeheehee!"},{"id":1177000056,"text":"I'm the record keeper of this castle. What do you want?"},{"id":1177000057,"text":"Don't save.∠Save.∠Rest."},{"id":1177000058,"text":"Oh, ♂㈱, my bosom buddy, you've come to save∠me out of fear for my safety, haven't you?∨What a beautiful thing friendship is! I shall never forget∠this day for as long as I live.∨That Kasim is a terrible man. How dare he lock me in up in∠such a place. The Empire has gone to the dogs, I tell you.∨What's that, ♂㈱? You're the leader of the∠Liberation Army? Well, why didn't you say so sooner!∨Very well. For the sake of our friendship, I, Vincent, renounce∠all my noble titles and vow to fight by your side."},{"id":1202000001,"text":"What're you lookin' at? You can't have this treasure chest."},{"id":1202000002,"text":"We can't give away what we've been protecting for so many∠years."},{"id":1202000003,"text":"Are you Windy?"},{"id":1202000004,"text":"How did you manage to get to the Village of the Hidden Rune?"},{"id":1202000005,"text":"Don't ask me!"},{"id":1202000006,"text":"Owww! What the heck is this place?"},{"id":1202000007,"text":"No idea. Looks like we were thrown out of the cave, thanks∠to a certain careless someone."},{"id":1202000008,"text":"W-Well, look on the bright side. At least we made it out∠alive."},{"id":1202000009,"text":"Hey, mister. Are you the people here to take away the∠treasure?"},{"id":1202000010,"text":"What treasure?"},{"id":1202000011,"text":"∠No, we're not."},{"id":1202000012,"text":"Yeah, I didn't think you were.∨Grandpa was looking real angry, so I got worried."},{"id":1202000013,"text":"Ted! Get over here!"},{"id":1202000014,"text":"Yes, Grandpa!"},{"id":1202000015,"text":"Master ♂㈱... That boy, didn't he just call him∠\"Ted\"?"},{"id":1202000016,"text":"He did sort of look like Ted."},{"id":1202000017,"text":"What is going on?"},{"id":1202000018,"text":"∠No, it must've been someone else."},{"id":1202000019,"text":"Still, he does kinda remind me of Ted."},{"id":1202000020,"text":"Did that woman send you here as her messengers?"},{"id":1202000021,"text":"Woman? Messengers? I got no idea what you're talkin' about."},{"id":1202000022,"text":"So you have nothing to do with her?"},{"id":1202000023,"text":"With who, dammit?!"},{"id":1202000024,"text":"If she didn't send you, you'd best leave this place∠immediately. Come, Ted."},{"id":1202000025,"text":"Wait, Grandpa. I wanna talk with those people."},{"id":1202000026,"text":"Come at once!"},{"id":1202000027,"text":"What? Still haven't left? Strangers aren't welcome here."},{"id":1202000028,"text":"What're you so scared of?∨Is it that woman you keep mentioning?"},{"id":1202000029,"text":"\"That woman\"? Well, that's a rather rude way to speak∠about someone."},{"id":1202000030,"text":"W-Windy... What're you doing here?"},{"id":1202000031,"text":"Neclord! You bastard! How did you manage to follow us here?!∨...By the way, Cleo, where exactly is \"here\"?"},{"id":1202000032,"text":"...Like I know."},{"id":1202000033,"text":"What do you want, Windy?"},{"id":1202000034,"text":"Why, my dear, I'm here because you refused to give me the ∠rune, of course.∨That's the only reason I traveled all the way here today.∠How about showing some gratitude for the effort I've made?∠Come now, give me the Soul Eater."},{"id":1202000035,"text":"I have no idea what you mean!"},{"id":1202000036,"text":"No point in hiding it. I already know this is the Village of∠the Hidden Rune."},{"id":1202000037,"text":"Hey, Cleo, apparently this is the Village of the Hidden Rune.∠Let's try and remember that."},{"id":1202000038,"text":"The Village of the Hidden Rune... A boy named Ted..."},{"id":1202000039,"text":"My, did you see that? It does seem like you're boring Yuber∠with these stubborn denials of yours.∨Give me the rune, now, or watch your village slowly burn∠to the ground."},{"id":1202000040,"text":"Damn you. Fine then, since you're so eager to witness the∠ill-fated power of the Soul Eater...∨O Soul Eater, cursed rune that you are, manifest your power∠and strike down mine enemy."},{"id":1202000041,"text":"Travelers, I'm sorry for having dragged you into this mess."},{"id":1202000042,"text":"As you should be."},{"id":1202000043,"text":"Ted. Come over here."},{"id":1202000044,"text":"Yes, Grandpa."},{"id":1202000045,"text":"Hold out your right hand. That's a good boy. Now listen,∠Ted. You've got to stay still.∨O Soul Eater, Rune of Life and Death, depart from me and∠bestow your power upon this boy."},{"id":1202000046,"text":"G-Grandpa, what is this?"},{"id":1202000047,"text":"Forgive me, Ted. I've passed on to you a painful fate.∨You must remember never to unleash the power of this rune."},{"id":1202000048,"text":"Let's go, Ted."},{"id":1202000049,"text":"O-Okay. Grandpa will follow later, right?"},{"id":1202000050,"text":"That's right. Come on now, let's hurry."},{"id":1202000051,"text":"Lady Windy worries too much. Instead of beating around the∠bush, we should've just razed the village to the ground.∨Instead, I stand guard here as told and look what I'm left∠to play with...a bunch of cowards and a child."},{"id":1202000052,"text":"Say that again, buddy!"},{"id":1202000053,"text":"Don't get too close, Viktor! That guy's strong!"},{"id":1202000054,"text":"Yeah, I know. He's not human. I can tell there's somethin'∠horrific about him even from this distance."},{"id":1202000055,"text":"So you understand my strength, do you? Well then, no point∠in struggling against my blade.∨I'll chop you into tiny pieces, so that you won't feel any∠pain."},{"id":1202000056,"text":"D-Damn."},{"id":1202000057,"text":"Hey, Yuber. Lady Windy wants you. Seems the old fool∠escaped into the forest."},{"id":1202000058,"text":"Neclord!"},{"id":1202000059,"text":"You again? I'm busy at the moment. I'll deal with you some∠other time."},{"id":1202000060,"text":"I think...we're safe."},{"id":1202000061,"text":"Yeah. The fire in the village seems to be dyin' down too,∠although I don't know what became of the villagers."},{"id":1202000062,"text":"What happened to Grandpa?"},{"id":1202000063,"text":"Ted, I'm sorry, but you're going to have to look after∠yourself from now on. Do you understand?∨Master ♂㈱, this boy is definitely the Ted we∠knew. We must be in the past."},{"id":1202000064,"text":"The past? You mean the Celestial Sword's curse sent us back∠in time?"},{"id":1202000065,"text":"Yes, most likely. What just took place was the incident from∠300 years ago that Ted told us about.∨That means he will spend the next 300 years traveling∠alone...∨In any case, we need to find a way to return to the present."},{"id":1202000066,"text":"You're probably right."},{"id":1202000067,"text":"Yes. Let's try going back there."},{"id":1202000068,"text":"Maybe goin' in here will take us back to our own world."},{"id":1202000069,"text":"You might be right. That's actually a half-decent idea,∠coming from you."},{"id":1202000070,"text":"Very funny.∠♂㈱, what should we do about this Ted kid?"},{"id":1202000071,"text":"We'll take him with us."},{"id":1202000072,"text":"But we don't know if that's even possible."},{"id":1202000073,"text":"Let's get goin', ♂㈱. Who knows when the light∠will disappear."},{"id":1202000074,"text":"∠We can't take him with us."},{"id":1202000075,"text":"Ted will be on his own for a very long time. And his journey∠ends with...∨No, I suppose it's wrong to change his fate."},{"id":1202000076,"text":"You're leaving me here? What should I do?∨Just this once, I'm begging you. Please let me go with you."},{"id":1202000077,"text":"Listen to me, Ted. You've got to be strong. You must never∠give up.∨And don't let anyone know about the rune on your right∠hand."},{"id":1202000078,"text":"Okay."},{"id":1202000079,"text":"C'mon, we'd better get goin'. Who knows when the light will∠disappear."},{"id":1202000080,"text":"Take care."},{"id":1202000081,"text":"Travelers, there's a secret passage up ahead that leads∠outside the village.∨Please, take my grandson Ted and run. I'll keep Windy∠distracted to buy you some time."},{"id":1202000082,"text":"It's locked!"},{"id":1202000083,"text":"Hey, ♂㈱. Do you see that light? Isn't that where∠we first came out?"},{"id":1202000084,"text":"Huh? What's wrong? Do I have something on my face?"},{"id":1202000085,"text":"There is delicious flowing water!"},{"id":1452000001,"text":"♂㈱ McDohl, you traitor! Not only did you betray∠the Empire, but you took the life of your own father!∨I, Sonya Shulen, swear on my name as one of the Five Great∠Generals that I will defend the Floating Fortress of∠Shasarazade!"},{"id":1452000002,"text":"All right, unload the oil barrels!∨Commander ♂㈱, we'll use the oil to burn down∠this fortress. But if we're to succeed, you must go shut the∠floodgate located at the far end.∨Once it's shut, we'll pour in the oil and set the entire fortress∠ablaze."},{"id":1452000003,"text":"So the floodgate is at the far end of the fortress."},{"id":1452000004,"text":"Yes. I've already sent Kasumi to scout the area.∨Commander, ♂㈱, please choose who you will∠take with you."},{"id":1452000005,"text":"Please be careful, Commander ♂㈱."},{"id":1452000006,"text":"Okay, we're good to go. Now all that's left is to escape.∠Then we can burn this fortress to ashes."},{"id":1452000007,"text":"Wait, ♂㈱. There's something I must ask you."},{"id":1452000008,"text":"Hey, you're that imperial general!"},{"id":1452000009,"text":"Yes. I am the last of the Five Great Generals.∨Answer me this, ♂㈱. ∠Why did you betray the Empire?∠Why did you betray General Teo...your own father?∨You've incited rebellion, brought on war, and sacrificed∠countless lives... Is this what you call justice?"},{"id":1452000010,"text":"You've got it all wrong."},{"id":1452000011,"text":"∠Well..."},{"id":1452000012,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1452000013,"text":"An all-consuming fire... Is that your answer? Is that what∠you want?∨You have General Teo's blood on your hands. And now, ∠you will pay for it with your life. Prepare to die!"},{"id":1452000014,"text":"Guess I never stood a chance. After all, you did defeat Teo.∨But I will not let you defile my body. I belong to the∠Empire...to the Emperor...and to Teo..."},{"id":1452000015,"text":"Stop! What are you doing..."},{"id":1452000016,"text":"I'd never let a pretty lady like you burn to a crisp.∠Besides, I can see you got your reasons for what you did.∨♂㈱, we're takin' the lady general with us."},{"id":1452000017,"text":"Sir Mathiu! Hang in there, Sir Mathiu!"},{"id":1452000018,"text":"Sir Mathiu..."},{"id":1452000019,"text":"What the hell happened here?"},{"id":1452000020,"text":"Are you all right?"},{"id":1452000021,"text":"Sanchez! You bastard! Why did you stab Sir Mathiu? Why did∠you set fire to the oil before receiving orders?∨Answer me, Sanchez!"},{"id":1452000022,"text":"I'm sorry, Sir Flik. I have been deceiving all of you right∠from the start."},{"id":1452000023,"text":"What?!"},{"id":1452000024,"text":"I have faithfully served His Majesty, the Emperor since the∠War of Succession, seven years ago."},{"id":1452000025,"text":"Then-Then it was you! You were the spy!"},{"id":1452000026,"text":"That's right. During the days of the War of Succession,∠the Emperor was a wonderful man.∨And I, like everyone else, swore allegiance to him."},{"id":1452000027,"text":"So you were behind the attack on the hideout when Odessa...∠Are you to blame for Odessa's death?!"},{"id":1452000028,"text":"My actions led to her death. I won't deny it.∨It has continued to weigh heavily on me. Being around you∠people, I began to question myself. What was just? What was∠the right thing for me to do?∨In the end, I chose to remain loyal to the Emperor. It's∠difficult to change one's way of life at my age.∨I'm sorry about Lady Odessa..."},{"id":1452000029,"text":"Don't you dare speak her name. You've lost that privilege,∠you filth."},{"id":1452000030,"text":"...You're right."},{"id":1452000031,"text":"I'll never forgive you. I swear on my sword, Odessa, that∠I'll take your head!"},{"id":1452000032,"text":"I understand. I have no regrets.∨Just remember this. I've come to care for all of you.∠Sir Flik, you're still inexperienced.∨But the honesty that stems from that is something I've∠coveted. And I'm sure it's something that Lady Odessa∠loved about you..."},{"id":1452000033,"text":"Sanchez! Prepare to die!"},{"id":1452000034,"text":"W-Wait, please."},{"id":1452000035,"text":"Sir Mathiu."},{"id":1452000036,"text":"Sir Mathiu, are you all right?"},{"id":1452000037,"text":"If we kill Sanchez now, and the men discover he was a spy,∠it will affect the morale of the entire Liberation Army.∨We can deal with him later. Right now, we must marshal our∠forces and march on Gregminster."},{"id":1452000038,"text":"Don't be ridiculous, Mathiu. You're gravely wounded. If you∠move about now, you'll die."},{"id":1452000039,"text":"Everything has its time and place, and right now is the time∠to fight.∨If we miss this opportunity, we'll never defeat the Empire!∠Commander ♂㈱, you must decide."},{"id":1452000040,"text":"In any case, we should return to the castle for now."},{"id":1452000041,"text":"I'll go shut the floodgate. You wait here, ♂㈱."},{"id":1452000042,"text":"Why has the fire already been lit? It's too early!"},{"id":1452000043,"text":"Guess I never stood a chance."},{"id":1452000044,"text":"After all, you did defeat General Teo."},{"id":1452000045,"text":"But I will not let you defile my body.∨I belong to the Empire...to the Emperor...and to General Teo..."},{"id":1452000046,"text":"♂㈱, Humphrey and I will pursue the remaining∠enemy soldiers!"},{"id":1452000047,"text":"I have my hands full tending to the wounded."},{"id":1452000048,"text":"♂㈱, let's get this show on the road."},{"id":1452000049,"text":"The fire's too strong. We can't go this way."},{"id":1452000050,"text":"Well, well, well!"},{"id":1452000051,"text":"You there, identify yourself!"},{"id":1452000052,"text":"Who will you take, Commander ♂㈱?"},{"id":1452000053,"text":"Commander ♂㈱... This is the Empire's last point∠of defense."},{"id":1452000054,"text":"Be careful. Despite all my experience, even I can't restore∠a life that has been lost."},{"id":1628000028,"text":"The bandits have all left, along with the Imperial Army.∠I wonder what happened."},{"id":1628000029,"text":"The imperial soldiers are gone. They're finally, finally∠gone."},{"id":1628000030,"text":"∠     This Grave Houses A Troubled Man∨\"Loneliness is a slow-acting yet deadly poison.\""},{"id":1628000031,"text":"∠   These are the Last Words of a Woman Found on the Street∨\"Clive, please forgive me for not dying at your hands.\""},{"id":1628000032,"text":"...Lies.∨I won't be deceived. I swore I would find you, and I'll stop∠at nothing until I do. I will kill you with my own hands."},{"id":1628000033,"text":"∠    An Average Mother Lies Here∨\"Good night. Until we meet again.\""},{"id":1628000034,"text":"∠   Here Lies An Unknown Warrior∨\"For me, the battlefield was life itself.\""},{"id":1628000038,"text":"∠   A Pretty Deep Well∨∠    \"No loitering\""},{"id":1628000039,"text":"Rockland has always been full of rocks. That's why it's∠called Rockland."},{"id":1628000041,"text":"∠     The Grave of a Farmer∨\"Where there was gentle sunlight,∠I could grow anything.\""},{"id":1628000044,"text":""},{"id":1628000045,"text":""},{"id":1628000048,"text":"It's the end of the Emperor, the end of the Empire. But I∠guess nothing much will change here in Rockland."},{"id":1628000049,"text":"That Grady bastard also fled and hasn't been seen since.∠Good riddance."},{"id":1628000050,"text":"I know. The imperial soldiers don't take our food anymore,∠so now I can eat lots of food."},{"id":1628000053,"text":"Are you folk part of the Liberation Army by any chance?∨I wish you all the best. Just don't end up following in the∠Empire's footsteps."},{"id":1628000054,"text":"Yes? Wait, you look familiar... Oh, you're the leader of the∠Liberation Army! ♂㈱, wasn't it?"},{"id":1628000057,"text":"So sorry. We're out of booze."},{"id":1628000072,"text":"It's always war, war, war. I'm sick of it."},{"id":1628000073,"text":"Well then, how about it? Wanna buy one? It'll make a great∠souvenir."},{"id":1628000170,"text":""},{"id":1628000171,"text":""},{"id":1628000172,"text":""},{"id":1629000055,"text":"If you're looking for a place to stay, I recommend the∠Keyaki Inn just down the road. The local girl who works∠there is real easy on the eyes."},{"id":1629000056,"text":"Looks like the war is almost over. I might start stocking up∠on goods."},{"id":1629000058,"text":"Good luck! It won't be long until the Liberation Army is∠victorious! Only then will Lady Odessa be avenged."},{"id":1629000062,"text":"The Imperial Army is finished..."},{"id":1629000063,"text":"I'll let you in on something. Heehee. You know those urns∠you sometimes find 'round the place?∨Some of them are actually quite valuable. Heehee.∨If you were to take them to an appraiser... Heehee.∨Don't worry. No one needs to find out. Well, I guess that∠depends on how devious you are. Heehee..."},{"id":1629000067,"text":"I was transporting goods for my store when bandits showed∠up and robbed me of everything. I returned without a potch∠to my name."},{"id":1629000068,"text":"Hey, you ever hear of a petty thief called Krin? That∠scoundrel took all my money!"},{"id":1629000077,"text":"Just so we're clear, I don't trust any of you yet.☆9∠Including you, Viktor."},{"id":1629000088,"text":"Hey! Where's that lady from last time?"},{"id":1629000089,"text":"Meg, be careful."},{"id":1629000090,"text":"Meg, come back with a husband next time you visit."},{"id":1629000091,"text":"Meg! You tomboy! You can't just leave home without my∠permission!"},{"id":1629000092,"text":"Well, well. How've you been, Meg? Say, who's this with you?"},{"id":1629000093,"text":"Wh-Who's this!? Meg! Is this your husband here?"},{"id":1629000094,"text":"Huh? Who? You mean ♂㈱? He's just a friend. He's∠the leader of the Liberation Army."},{"id":1629000095,"text":"Friend? Wait! Did you say leader of the Liberation Army?!"},{"id":1629000096,"text":"So you're finally home, Meg."},{"id":1629000097,"text":"Nope. I plan on visiting many more places and learning∠everything I can."},{"id":1629000098,"text":"Meg... Well, seems there's no point in talking sense to you."},{"id":1629000099,"text":"Good luck, Meg."},{"id":1629000100,"text":"Thanks!"},{"id":1629000101,"text":"Damn it, all my money...∨Hey! It's you!"},{"id":1629000102,"text":"Yikes! Well, good luck here."},{"id":1629000103,"text":"You! I knew you were in cahoots with that scoundrel!"},{"id":1629000118,"text":"Shut up! Are you willingly harboring rebels?"},{"id":1031027251,"text":"Yes.∠No."},{"id":1031052154,"text":"Yes.∠No."}]}
